english: The upgrade will only be applied to this place. This will automatically adjust shallow water shape on existing shorelines. You might want to review and hand-edit the results afterwards, especially around streams, waterfalls and any other non-horizontal water surfaces. The upgrade can be reverted right after its completion using the Undo command.
translation: 升級只會套用到此地點。既有海岸線的淺水形狀將會自動調整。您之後可能需要審查並手動編輯結果，尤其是水流、瀑布及其他非橫向水面的結果。升級完成後可使用復原指令進行還原。

english:
The server script was updated since you started your draft.

In order to be able to commit your edits back to the server later, accept these changes to ensure that you are working off of the latest server version. No conflicts were detected between the new server version and your draft.

Preview of merged code:
translation:
伺服器指令碼在您開始撰寫草稿後更新了。

請接受這些變更確保您在最新的伺服器版本下工作，並讓您可以在未來向伺服器提交您的編輯。未偵測到新伺服器版本與您的草稿之間的衝突。

english: Manage your assets in a brand new widget, with new features. This replaces the Game Explorer.
translation: 使用全新的小工具和功能管理您的素材。此管理器將會取代遊戲總管。

english: Enables the Convert TerrainTool which can convert Parts into Terrain materials and biomes.
translation: 啟用可以將 Part 轉換成 Terrain 材質和生物群系的轉換 TerrainTool。

english: Migrates the Select/Move/Rotate/Scale tools to a Lua BuiltInPlugin implementation and makes some minor improvements to their functionality.
translation: 將選擇、移動、旋轉、縮放工具移到 Lua BuiltInPlugin，並做出微服性能優化。
Lua 拖曳工具 Beta 版本

english: Fixes Motor6D.Transform to always position parts as if Part0 as the parent part so it will not rotate backwards if Part1 becomes the root internally.
translation: 修復 Motor6D.Transform，讓所有零件的位置都依照 Part0 為母零件放置，防止 Part1 成為內部根時使 Part0 往後旋轉的情況。
Motor6D.Transform 行為 Beta 版本

english: Enable the new CollisionFidelity, which uses a method called HACD to generate collision geometry with precise surfaces.
translation: 啟用 CollisionFidelity，使用 HACD 方法對精細表面生成碰撞幾何。

english: Universe resources are not loaded yet
The following scripts are uncommitted and will not be published with the place. The Drafts widget can be used to commit them. Do you want publish without these script changes?

english: Script changes are local and are not published until committed. Learn More

The Roblox Lua Debugger caught an error and will now take you to the exception in the script.

 You can modify this behavior, when a script is open, by going to the Script Menu tab and changing the 'Break On Error' settings.
translation:
Roblox Lua 偵錯器發現了錯誤，將會帶您到指令碼裡的例外狀況。

若要修改此行為，請在指令碼開啟時前往指令碼選單標籤，並變更'發生錯誤時中斷'設定。
擷取帳號地區設定失敗：%1
法線平滑 Beta 版本

english: Use the SmoothAngle property on CSG part to define threshold angle and smooth normals.
translation: 使用 CSG 零件的 SmoothAngle 屬性即可定義臨界角度和平滑法線。

english: Set `Plugin Debugging Enabled` to true and you can debug local plugins under the PluginDebugService in Explorer
translation: 將 `Plugin Debugging Enabled`（外掛程式偵錯已啟用）改為 true，即可在總管裡的 PluginDebugService 底下對本機外掛程式進行偵錯

translation: 國際版 Studio 開發者無法與羅布版 Studio 開發者進行 TeamCreate 作業。若要一起進行 TeamCreate 作業，請下載羅布版 Studio：www.robloxdev.cn

translation: 羅布版 Studio 開發者無法與國際版 Studio 開發者進行 TeamCreate 作業。若要一起進行 TeamCreate 作業，國際板 Studio 開發者必須下載並使用羅布版 Studio：www.robloxdev.cn

translation: 無法取得使用者協議，請嘗試重新登入。若問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: Failed to accept user agreements. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.
translation: 無法接受使用者協議，請嘗試重新登入。若問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

Studio 內地點版本歷史紀錄

english: Show memory address for expandable tables
translation: 顯示可擴展表格的記憶體位址

english: Output gets an upgrade — expressive UI, filter/search, and copy/paste becomes easier.
translation: 全面升級輸出——使用者介面更加流暢，篩選搜尋、複製貼上等操作更容易

english: Versions %1 and %2 of the script '%3' are identical

translation: 在指定行數畫下的直線，可以用來標明程式碼長度限制。

english: New Beta Features Will Automatically Be Activated
translation: 新的 Beta 功能將會自動啟用

english: Breakpoints now work across DataModels.  Users no longer need to worry about what instance of a script they have open when using breakpoints.
translation: 斷點可以在多個 DataModel 之間使用。使用斷點時不必再注意目前開啟的指令碼個體。

english: Enable game management features in Game Settings. Find Game Settings on the “Home” tab.
translation: 啟用遊戲設定裡的遊戲管理功能。遊戲設定可在「首頁」標籤裡進入。

english: Automatically generate Impostor meshes to be rendered outside of streaming radius. Use LevelOfDetail property on Model to enable it.
translation: 自動生成在動態載入範圍外成像的 Impostor 網格。在 Model 上使用 LevelOfDetail 屬性即可啟用。

english: Enable rich text parsing and rendering in xml format.
translation: 啟用 XML 格式的富文字分析與描寫。

english: Unlocks PBR texture properties on SurfaceAppearance Instances.
translation: 在 SurfaceAppearance 個體解鎖 PBR 紋理屬性。

english: A UIComponent that modifies the shape of corners of parent GuiObject.
translation: 修改父 GuiObject 角落形狀的 UIComponent。

description: Button that a user clicks to dismiss a Teaching Callout. Teaching Callouts are used to showcase new Studio features to users.
Within a Teaching Callout, this text is a link that takes a user to a learning resource for a new feature. Teaching Callouts are used to showcase new Studio features to users.
Warning message that displays if a user tries to import a 3D mesh that contains animation data.
english: Animation data detected! Studio does not support animation data. You may experience issues if the mesh is dependent on the initial position of the animation data.
translation: 偵測到動畫資料！Studio 目前不支援動畫資料。若網格會受到動畫資料的原始位置影響，您將有可能會遇到問題。

description: Error message that displays if a user tries to import a 3D mesh that has no vertices.
english: Your mesh has no vertices! Please check the validity of your mesh and try again.
translation: 您的網格沒有頂點！請確認網格有效再重新嘗試。

description: Error message that displays if a user tries to import a 3D mesh that has too many faces (aka triangles). First argument is the max limit of triangles, second argument is the amount of triangles that were in the uploaded mesh.
english: Your mesh has too many triangles! Limit is %1. Your mesh has %2.
translation: 您的網格擁有過多三角形！三角形上限為 %1 個，您的網格有 %2 個。

description: Warning message that appears if a user tries to import a 3D mesh file that contains multiple meshes. Studio reacts to this by joining the meshes together, but this could mess up the textures of the mesh.
english: Multiple meshes detected! The meshes were joined together, and textures may now be incorrect.
translation: 偵測到多個網格！網格已經結合，紋理可能會不正確。

description: Warning message that appears if a user tries to import a 3D mesh that contains multiple textures. Studio only allows one of these textures, but this may result in the texture not looking correct.
english: Multiple textures detected! We only allow one texture per MeshPart which may now result in the mesh texture not looking correct.
translation: 偵測到多個紋理！每一個 MeshPart 只能擁有一個紋理，網格紋理可能會異常顯示。

description: Error message that displays if the mesh file that a user tried importing into their game has no contents.

Error message that displays if a user tries to import a 3D rig that has too many faces (aka triangles). First argument is the max limit of triangles, second argument is the amount of triangles that were in the uploaded rig.
english: Your rig has too many triangles! Limit is %1. Your rig has %2.
translation: 您的骨架擁有過多三角形！三角形上限為 %1 個，您的骨架有 %2 個。

description: Error message that displays if one of the meshes in a 3D rig that a user uploaded has too many triangles. First argument is the name of the specific mesh, second argument is the max limit of triangles, and third argument is the amount of triangles that were in the mesh.
english: %1 has too many triangles! Limit is %2. Your mesh has %3.
translation: %1 擁有過多三角形！三角形上限為 %2 個，您的網格有 %3 個。
所有 Roblox 模型檔案
所有 Roblox 地點檔案

english: You are not authorized to configure this game.
translation: 您沒有設定此遊戲的權限。

description: Warning message that displays in the Studio Output window when a user tries to alter the BrickColor property of a part while the Studio Lua Debugger is paused at a breakpoint.
english: BrickColor property cannot be edited. Please make sure debugger is not paused.
translation: 無法編輯 BrickColor 屬性。請確認偵錯工具未暫停。

description: Short message that appears in the Terrain.MaterialColors property in the Properties widget to let the user know that they can expand the property to see all the individual color values of each terrain material
Label for the color of a terrain material
Error message that displays if Studio can't find a texture file at a certain path. The argument of this string is the path to the supposed texture file.
english: Could not find texture %1. Please verify that the texture is located at that location, or in the same folder as the FBX/OBJ file
translation: 找不到紋理 %1。請確認紋理位於該位置，或與 FBX 或 OBJ 檔案同一個資料夾

description: Tooltip that displays on both the 'Influenced by' and 'Overridden by' texts that lets the user know that double clicking on the text will navigate them to the Instance that is influencing/overriding a property. The parameter is the name of the Instance that is influencing/overriding the property.
One of the reasons that an uploaded MeshPart would be rejected.

Text which displays under a property in the Properties widget if the property is being influenced by another Instance. 'Influenced', in this case, means that the property's value will only be set by the other Instance under certain circumstances (e.g. a UISizeConstraint clamping a UI element's Size property down if it exceeds a certain maximum).
Error message that displays in the output widget when Studio encounters an error when importing a texture. The parameter is the specific issue.
Title of error message shown to users who try to import meshes while not logged in.
Message which displays if there were multiple errors when importing a mesh
english: There were errors while importing your Mesh
translation: 匯入網格時發生多個錯誤

description: Message which displays in an error pop-up window that tells the user that they are trying to import a mesh with no vertices
english: No vertices found! Please check the mesh you are attempting to import and try again.
translation: 找不到頂點！請檢查您要匯入的網格再重新嘗試。

description: Text which displays under a property in the Properties widget if the property is being overridden by another Instance. 'Overridden', in this case, means that the property's value will always be set by the other Instance regardless of what the user sets the property's value to in the Properties widget (e.g. a UIGridLayout always overriding a UI element's Size and Position properties).

Tooltip that displays if a certain Instance's property is being influenced by another Instance(s). Parameter 1 is the name of the Instance whose property is being altered, parameter 2 is the name of the property being altered, and parameter 3 is the name(s) of the Instance(s) that is/are altering the property. 'Influenced', in this case, means that the property's value will only be set by the other Instance(s) under certain circumstances (i.e. a UISizeConstraint clamping a UI element's size down if it exceeds a certain maximum).
translation: %1 的 %2 屬性受到 %4 的影響

description: Tooltip that displays if a certain Instance's property is being overridden by another Instance(s). Parameter 1 is the name of the Instance whose property is being altered, parameter 2 is the name of the property being altered, and parameter 3 is the name(s) of the Instance(s) that is/are altering the property. 'Overridden', in this case, means that the property's value will always be set by the other instance(s) regardless of what the user sets the property's value to in the Properties widget.
Message that displays if a mesh importation was successful but there was a warning
english: There was an issue when importing the mesh

description: Message that displays if a mesh importation was successful but there were multiple warnings
english: There were issues when importing the mesh
translation: 匯入網格時發生多個問題

description: Tooltip that displays if a certain Instance's property is being overridden by another Instance(s), but when Studio is unaware of what the other Instance(s) is/are.
Error message that appears in the Studio output window if Studio cannot locate a terrian icon. The argument is the supposed path to said icon.
Error message that displays in the output widget when the Studio backend rejects an uploaded MeshPart. The parameter is the reason for the rejection.
One of the issues that could be encountered when uploading a texture.
Message which displays in the bottom left of the screen when a MeshPart's mesh is being updated
Body of error message shown to users to try to import meshes while not logged in.
english: You must log in to create meshes.
translation: 你必須登入才能建立網格。

english: Automatically insert a closing bracket following an opening bracket.
translation: 自動在左括號後插入右括號。

english: Automatically insert a closing quotation following an opening quotation.
translation: 自動在左引號後插入右引號。

english: Off: No automatic indentation. Relative: Auto-indent relative to the current line. Absolute: Auto-indent globally.
translation: 關閉：關閉自動縮進。相對：相對於目前所在的行進行自動縮進。絕對：全部進行自動縮進。

english: Enable code suggestions to show up while typing.
translation: 啟用打字時顯示的程式碼建議。

english: Change the text font family, typeface, and size.
translation: 變更文字的字型、字體及大小。

english: Automatically format the code after typing.
translation: 輸入代碼後自動將其格式化。

english: Prefer indent with spaces over tabs. This will affect Auto Indent and pressing Tab behavior.
translation: 偏向空格縮進而非 Tab 縮進。此選項將會影響自動縮進與按下 Tab 鍵後的行為。

english: Skip over a closing bracket/quote instead of inserting another.
translation: 跳過右括號或右引號，而非進行插入。

english: The width of a tab, measured in number of spaces. Value can only be between 1 and 8.
translation: Tab 縮進的寬度，以空格數為單位。值只能在 1 到 8 之間。

english: Wrap the line of text below when the line character limit has been reached.
translation: 單行文字達字元上限時換行。

Should we highlight the line we are currently editing in script editor

translation: 在內容中搜尋核心指令碼

english: The plugin you are trying to save would have no contents.  You cannot save an empty plugin.
translation: 目前外掛程式沒有內容，無法儲存空白的外掛程式。
無法儲存空白外掛程式
儲存標準化套件【內部功能】

Rotate dragged objects to align them with the target surface
translation: 旋轉拖曳物件即可使其對齊目標表面

Quitting Roblox Studio will cause you to lose data that is currently syncing.
translation: 若退出 Roblox Studio，目前正在同步的資料將會遺失。

english: Quitting Roblox Studio will cause you to lose data that is currently syncing and might corrupt your Terrain.
translation: 若退出 Roblox Studio，目前正在同步的資料將會遺失，Terrain 也有可能遭到損壞。

translation: 無法載入遊戲素材，部分 Studio 功能已停用。

description: Error message that appears if the user tries to import a 3D FBX mesh that is not properly formatted.
english: Your file does not seem to contain a FBX mesh! Make sure the file extension is correct.
translation: 您的檔案似乎沒有 FBX 網格！請確認副檔名正確。

english: Beginning in October 2020 we will be discontinuing support for MacOS 10.10. Please upgrade to MacOS 10.11+ to continue to use Roblox Studio.
translation: 我們從 2019 年 11 月開始將會停止支援 MacOS 10.10。若要繼續使用 Roblox Studio，請升級到 MacOS 10.11 或更新版本。

Copy Row in the WatchWidget copies all the variable info via context menu

Edit the point around which the selected object rotates and translates

The color of the line we have stopped on in the debugger because it produced an error.

Save and Reload All Plugins in Debugger

translation: 將偵錯工具裡所有外掛程式儲存回磁碟上。停止執行外掛程式。從磁碟重新載入。

english: New beta features have been automatically enabled above as you are enrolled in Beta Channel. You must restart Studio for them to be activated. Restart Now
translation: 因為您已加入 Beta 平台，新的 Beta 功能已自動為您啟用。若要使用這些功能，請重新啟動 Studio。重新啟動

translation: 啟用皮膚網格的匯入、顯示及動畫。

translation: 素材管理器已取代 Studio 的遊戲總管，讓開發者可以更有效地管理遊戲素材！

Beginning in November 2020 we will be discontinuing support for MacOS 10.10. Please upgrade to MacOS 10.11+ to continue to use Roblox Studio.
translation: 我們從 2020 年 11 月開始將會停止支援 MacOS 10.10。若要繼續使用 Roblox Studio，請升級到 MacOS 10.11 或更新版本。

translation: 確定將套件變更到 %1 版本？

translation: 停止執行外掛程式並從磁碟重新載入。（注意：您將會失去在外掛程式偵錯服務裡對外掛程式進行的變更）

description: Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to add a new entry to the list of flag overrides by opening a new dialog.
Title of Add Override dialog that appears after clicking add button in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
The name of a flag in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to remove all entries from the list of flag overrides.
Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to remove the currently selected entry in the list of flag overrides.
The type of a flag (FFlag, FLog, DFString, etc.) in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
The value of a flag in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).

translation: 對 Color3 建構子的引數無效

translation: 若您持續碰到此錯誤，請前往開發者論壇回報錯誤。

translation: 正在載入遊戲（第 %1 次嘗試）

發生內部錯誤，伺服器拒絕了編輯套用。

translation: 移動物件時運用物理引擎和限制式模擬真實世界行為。為了使功能正常運作，部分設定將會進行調整。

translation: 外掛程式 %1 正在嘗試在您的遊戲裡插入或編輯指令碼。請按下「允許」批准此外掛程式在未來進行此操作，否則請按下「拒絕」。您可以在外掛管理視窗編輯此設定。

english: Failed to login. Please restart Studio or contact support if the problem persists.

translation: 登入失敗。如果問題持續，請重新嘗試或聯絡客服人員。

translation: 確定關閉此視窗？Roblox Studio 將會關閉。

english: Please check that you are connected to the internet and try again. Please contact support if the problem persists.
translation: 請檢查您的網路連線並重新嘗試。如果問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: Randomize instance order during join for test clients. This helps uncover bugs by approximating the behavior of real clients & servers, where the order of instances will change over time as more players join. Randomization may slightly increase join time bandwidth usage compared to real client-server joins.
translation: 測試用戶端時加入順序將會隨機化。在實際用戶端和伺服器上，個體的順序將會隨著更多玩家加入而改變。此動作可藉由模擬此情形而發現可能的問題。與實際用戶端加入伺服器相比，隨機化可能會稍微增加加入時間的寬頻使用量。

english: Choose an instance as parent in game explorer to save %1

translation: 使用更新、更快的 CSG 引擎。

english: (! Works better with "Scripts Are Non-Strict By Default" Beta Feature ON !) Luau type inference now powers the Go To Declaration feature in Script Editor, enhancing performance and reliability.
translation: （！「指令碼預設為非嚴格模式」Beta 功能啟用時效果更佳！）指令碼編輯器裡的前往宣告功能將會由 Luau 類型推理驅動，讓效能和可靠性更佳。

english: (! Works better with "Scripts Are Non-Strict By Default" Beta Feature ON !) Luau type inference now powers the Script Function Filter feature in Script Editor, adding type information to the widget while enhancing performance and reliability.
translation: （！「指令碼預設為非嚴格模式」Beta 功能啟用時效果更佳！）指令碼編輯器裡的指令碼函式篩選功能將會由 Luau 類型推理驅動，讓效能和可靠性更佳，並在小工具裡增加類型資訊。
Luau 驅動指令碼函式篩選

english: The WrapTarget and WrapLayer instances can be used to deform meshes without changing their topology using another Mesh (aka CageMesh).
translation: WrapTarget 和 WrapLayer 個體可以使用另外一個網格（即 CageMesh），在不變更拓撲性質的情況下使網格變形。

english: (! Works better with "Scripts Are Non-Strict By Default" Beta Feature ON !) Displays Luau type information when hovering over code in the script editor.
translation: （！「指令碼預設為非嚴格模式」Beta 功能啟用時效果更佳！）在指令碼編輯器裡將游標停放在指令碼上時，Luau 類型資訊將會顯示。
Luau 驅動停放顯示類型

english: Script Analysis Widget and linting logic get an upgrade! No major changes but many bug fixes and more intuitive behavior.
translation: 指令碼分析小工具和 Lint 邏輯升級了！沒有大規模變動，但我們修正了許多問題並讓一些操作更加直觀。
指令碼編輯器 Lint 檢查

translation:
部分指令碼被使用者鎖定時無法使用取代。
請在所有指令碼解鎖後重新嘗試。

english: How thick is the box shown around the item your mouse is hovering over?
translation: 游標在物件上停放時，物件邊框應有多厚？

english: When snapping the pivot to geometry in the Pivot Editor, what color should the interesting points be highlighted with?
translation: 在軸點編輯器將軸點貼齊到幾何時，重點應以什麼顏色標示？

description: Autocomplete should show Plugin security level methods in Script Editor
translation: 自動完成外掛程式保護方式

english: Do you want to restart Studio and update now?
translation: 要現在重新啟動並更新 Studio 嗎？
切換 Lint 錯誤顯示
切換 Lint 警告顯示

english: (! Works better with "Scripts Are Non-Strict By Default" Beta Feature ON !) Luau type inference now powers Autocomplete in Script Editor, allowing Autocomplete to offer suggestions based on the type of a variable, while enhancing performance and reliability.
translation: （！「指令碼預設為非嚴格模式」Beta 功能啟用時效果更佳！）指令碼邊其器的自動完成功能將會由 Luau 類型推理驅動，讓自動完成可以依照變數類型提供建議，並讓效能和可靠性更佳。

english: Enables property for excluding BaseParts from spatial queries such as raycasts. Only accesible when CanCollide is disabled.
translation: 啟用將 BasePart 從光線投射等空間查詢排除的屬性。只有在 CanCollide 停用時可以使用。

english: Enable Script Editor error and warning detection
translation: 啟用指令碼編輯器錯誤和警告偵測

english: Enable showing the types/names of function arguments when relevant
translation: 啟用適用時顯示函式引數類型和名稱的功能

english: Enable showing object type on cursor hover.
translation: 啟用游標停放物件時顯示類型的功能。

english: An error occurred while reading the response from the server. Please try again later, or contact support if the problem persists.
translation: 讀取伺服器回應時發生錯誤，請稍後再試。如果問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: Reduces the minimum limit on part sizes from 0.05 to 0.001. Parts can be visually smaller, but will still limit to 0.05 for collision geometry for now.
translation: 將零件大小下限從 0.05 降到 0.001。零件視覺上會看起來更小，但在碰撞幾何方面仍會視大小為 0.05。

english: Your OS is not up to date, some functions may not be fully supported
translation: 您的作業系統未更新，部分功能可能不完全支援

english: Got an empty list of assets to split. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
translation: 分離素材清單空白，請重新嘗試。如果問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: Upload retry limit for this asset has been reached. If daily limit hasn't been exceeded try again later.
translation: 此素材已達上傳重試次數上限。若未超過單日上限，請稍後再試。

english: Retry limit hit. Try again later
translation: 已達重試次數限制，請稍後再試

description: Internal feature. Text in output window.

translation: 分析埠字串因 std::invalid_argument 失敗

description: Internal feature. Text in output window.

translation: 分析埠字串因 std::out_of_range 失敗

description: Internal feature. Text in output window.
Internal feature. Text in output window.
Internal feature. Text in output window.
english: This error usually means that robloxdev-cli could not be found. Have you made sure that robloxdev-cli is in your PATH or you have set FFlagDebugStudioCoreScriptBuilderExecutable to point to the right location?
translation: 此錯誤通常代表找不到 robloxdev-cli。您確定 robloxdev-cli 的路徑正確，或 FFlagDebugStudioCoreScriptBuilderExecutable 指向正確的位置嗎？

translation: 無法以 %1 初始化 CoreScriptBuilder

translation: 已傳送要發布的訊息到伺服器。

english: This object has 3D content but is not a Model, so moving or rotating it will count as modifying the Package. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation: 此物件含有 3D 內容但不是 Model，移動或旋轉物件將視為修改 Package。確定繼續？

english: Set the selection as the default for future created instances
translation: 將選取內容設為未來新個體的預設選項

translation: 找不到素材，或素材無法由 ContentProvider 存取

english:
On August 16th, the Roblox application will require DirectX 10 or higher feature level support.

To keep using the Roblox application, please use a device that is compatible with Roblox’s system requirements.
translation:
Roblox 應用程式從 8 月 16 日開始將需要 DirectX 10 或更高版本。

若要繼續使用 Roblox 應用程式，請使用符合 Roblox 系統需求的裝置。

english:
Your computer's graphics card is not compatible with Roblox's minimum system requirements.

Visit https://www.roblox.com/drivers for more information.
translation:
您的電腦的顯示卡未達 Roblox 的最低系統需求。

若要了解更多資訊，請前往 https://www.roblox.com/drivers。
往回瀏覽標籤歷史紀錄
往前瀏覽標籤歷史紀錄

english:
Your account is associated with an @roblox.com email address or has Soothsayer permissions. You also have internal-only features turned on.
Do you want to disable Internal Features? This will make your Studio experience identical to developers.
You can go to Settings > Studio > Advanced to re-enable Internal Features.
translation:
您的帳號正在使用 @roblox.com 電子郵件地址，或擁有占卜師權限。另外，您目前已開啟內部限定功能。
確定停用內部功能？您的 Studio 功能將會與開發者相同。
若要重新啟用內部功能，請前往設定 > Studio > 進階。

english: Roblox Studio need to restart to disable Internal Features
translation: 若要停用內部功能，請重新啟動 Roblox Studio

english: Global Studio does not support joining a TeamCreate session with a Luobu Studio developer. Please download Luobu Studio to use TeamCreate together: www.robloxdev.cn
translation: 國際版 Studio 開發者無法與羅布版 Studio 開發者進行 TeamCreate 作業。若要一起進行 TeamCreate 作業，請下載羅布版 Studio：www.robloxdev.cn

english: Luobu Studio does not support joining a TeamCreate session with a global Studio developer. Please ask your teammates to download Loubu Studio to use TeamCreate together: www.robloxdev.cn
translation: 羅布版 Studio 開發者無法與國際版 Studio 開發者進行 TeamCreate 作業。若要一起進行 TeamCreate 作業，國際板 Studio 開發者必須下載並使用羅布版 Studio：www.robloxdev.cn

english: When typechecking scripts, incorporate the shape of the game's DataModel
translation: 檢查指令碼型別時參考遊戲的 DataModel 形狀

english: The current identity (%1) cannot execute command (%2), lacking permission (%3)
translation: 目前身分（%1）因權限不足（%3）無法執行指令（%2）

english: Fold a block of code in the script
translation: 摺疊指令碼裡的程式碼區塊

english: Unfold a block of code in the script
translation: 展開指令碼裡的程式碼區塊

english: How thick is the box shown around the selected Instances?
translation: 選擇個體周圍的框應該多厚？
指令碼編輯器選單邊框
Luau 驅動自動完成和語言功能

english: Luau type inference now powers Autocomplete, Go To Declaration, Linting and the Script Function Filter in Script Editor, enhancing performance and reliability of all features. Autocomplete can now offer suggestions based on the type of a variable, while the Function Filter can preview these types.
translation: Luau 類型推理現在可在指令碼編輯器內驅動自動完成、前往宣告、Lint 及指令碼函式篩選，提升所有功能的效能和可靠性。自動完成可以根據變數類型給予建議，而函式篩選可以預覽這些類型。

english: Cannot fetch team test launch config.
translation: 無法擷取團隊測試啟動設定。

english: Cannot open place file for read.
translation: 無法開啟並讀取地點檔案。

english: Enable Script Editor error and warning detection
translation: 啟用指令碼編輯器錯誤和警告偵測

english: Enable the FaceControls instance which supports facial animation for avatars that have a dynamic-head.
translation: 啟用 FaceControls 個體，支援擁有動態頭部的虛擬人偶的臉部動畫。

english: Roblox Studio encountered an error and must close. Please try restarting Studio.
translation: Roblox Studio 遇到錯誤，必須關閉。請嘗試重新啟動 Studio。

english: Web request to load GUAC policies failed. The backend UniversalAppConfiguration service may be down.
translation: 載入 GUAC 政策的網路請求失敗，後端 UniversalAppConfiguration 服務可能未開啟。
顯示全部搜尋 / 全部取代視窗
取得模型內容時發生錯誤：%1

english: Repeat a command in the command history some number of times
translation: 重複指令歷史紀錄中的指令一定次數

english: List all commands with optional filtering
translation: 列出所有包含過濾選項的指令

english: Replace text in an open script
translation: 在開啟的指令碼中取代文字

english: Insert text at the given position

translation: 執行自動完成提示文字
執行停放顯示類型提示文字

english: Clear text selection and dismiss floating widgets
translation: 清除選取文字並關閉浮動小工具
執行 Color3 選擇器小工具

english: Unable to publish this place as you do not have access to use one or more Packages. Get permission from the Package owner or remove Package link.
translation: 沒有存取部分套件的權限，無法發布此地點。請向套件主人取得權限或移除套件連結。

english: Roblox Studio will now close, continue on the browser.
translation: Roblox Studio 即將關閉，請在瀏覽器中繼續。

english: If the conditional expression is evaluated to true (or missing), breakpoint execution will pause or the specified actions will occur.
translation: 如果條件運算式結果為 true（或 missing），斷點執行會暫停，或指定的動作會發生。

english: The log message will be displayed in the Output widget when a Logpoint is hit.
translation: 擊中紀錄點時，輸出小工具將會顯示紀錄訊息。

english: Operation '%1' is not allowed for conditional breakpoints
Invalid breakpoint condition '%1' entered previously has been reverted. Please edit again if required.
translation: 之前輸入的無效斷點條件「%1」已被還原，需要的話請重新編輯。

english: Operation '%1' is not allowed for log expression
translation: 紀錄運算式不允許操作「%1」

english: Invalid log expression '%1' entered previously has been reverted. Please edit again if required.
translation: 之前輸入的無效紀錄運算式「%1」已被還原，需要的話請重新編輯。

english: Reload a script after modifying it, while playing
translation: 在遊戲中重新載入修改後的指令碼

english: Switches dropdown menu for Parts, Effects, Materials, and Physics constraints to use a gallery view from a list view.
translation: 將零件、特效、材質及物理限制式的下拉式選單從清單改成畫廊

english: Attached to Parts (if non-collidable, such Parts are used as volumes), their property Label can be used in the Cost table argument of CreatePath to make traversal cost non-unity.
translation: 修改器可以附加零件上（若零件無法法碰撞，零件會視為體積），Label 屬性可以用在 CreatePath 的 Cost 表格引述，讓穿越成本非整合。

english: Enables MaterialService and MaterialVariant, which allows Part Material appearance customization.
translation: 啟用 MaterialService 和 Material Variant，允許自訂零件材質外觀。

description: Failed to fetch place or universe info when opening a place
translation: 無法擷取地點 / 宇宙資訊

english: Enable the new smart, unified Avatar and Mesh Importer
translation: 啟用全新智慧型統一的虛擬人偶和網格匯入器

english: Can only add Folder or Script.
translation: 只能新增資料夾或指令碼。

english: Display only the current script in the Script Analysis widget
translation: 僅在指令碼分析小工具中顯示目前指令碼

english: Display errors in the Script Analysis widget
translation: 在指令碼分析小工具中顯示錯誤

english: Display warnings in the Script Analysis widget
translation: 在指令碼分析小工具中警告

english: Timeout on certification check, might due to unstable internet. If you can't see the login page, try refreshing or using external brower to login.
translation: 憑證檢查逾時，可能是網路不穩定而致。如果您看不到登入頁面，請重新整理頁面或使用外部瀏覽器登入。

english: We failed the certificate check on your machine. If you can't see the login page, try refreshing or using external brower to login.
translation: 無法完成主機的憑證檢查。如果您看不到登入頁面，請重新整理頁面或使用外部瀏覽器登入。

english: Enables Logpoints and the new Edit Breakpiont dialog in the Debugger.
translation: 在偵錯工具裡啟用紀錄點和心的編輯斷點對話框

english: Go to a line in the script
Use Accessory Fitting Tool to edit caged clothing items as well as rigid accessories.
translation: 您可以使用飾品調整工具編輯網格服裝道具和固定飾品。

english: Login requires Two Step Verification. Please try again.
translation: 必須通過雙步驟驗證才可登入，請重新嘗試。
無法執行未登記的指令（%1）

english: Cannot execute command (%1) while another instance of it is still running
translation: 無法再另一個個體運行時執行指令（%1）

english: Cannot execute command (%1) due to unexpected arguments
translation: 因意外引數無法執行指令（%1）

description: Enable scrollbar markers for Script Editor inside Roblox Studio.

english: Show markers over the vertical scrollbar in Script Editor.
translation: 在指令把編輯器中的縱向捲軸上顯示標記。

english: Id from mesh part is invalid for asset type
translation: 網格零件的 ID 與素材類型不符

english: Id from mesh part not found for content id: %1
translation: 找不到此內容 ID 的網格零件 ID：

english: Enable 3D Layered Clothing in your experiences.
translation: 在體驗中啟用 3D 層疊服飾。

description: Message shown when Studio experiences an error that it can't recover from, and must exit. %1 is the message for the error that occurred.
english: Studio encountered an unrecoverable error and must shut down: %1
translation: Studio 遇到無法復原的錯誤，必須終止：%1

english: A visual editor for the SliceCenter property of ImageLabels and ImageButtons.
translation: 編輯 ImageLabels 和 ImageButtons 兩個 SliceCenter 屬性的視覺化編輯器。

description: Failed to open file during open place process
english: Cannot open place file for reading.
translation: 無法開啟並讀取地點檔案。

description: Game has disappeared during the dm loading process
english: Game has disappeared while loading dm (client).
translation: 遊戲在載入資料模型（用戶端）時消失。
說明程式碼區塊背景顏色

english: Enable documentation view to alongside code suggestion.
translation: 在程式碼建議旁邊啟用說明檢視。

english: Enable documentation view alongside signature help view.
translation: 在簽名協助檢視旁邊啟用說明檢視。

english: Allows saving games to the cloud without publishing.
translation: 在遊戲未發布狀態下允許儲存遊戲到雲端。

english: Save the active place to the location currently open in Studio
translation: 將活躍地點儲存到目前在 Studio 開啟的位置

english: CTRL+S saves the place to the location (Local or Roblox) currently open in Studio.
translation: CTRL+S 會將地點儲存到目前在 Studio 開啟的位置（本機或 Roblox）。

description: Error message that displays if an internal error occurred while importing head with facial animation
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: %1
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：%1

description: Success message when importing head with facial animation.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Successfully loaded FACS control data: found %1 of %2 controls
translation: 成功載入 FACS 控制項資料：找到 %1/%2 個控制項

description: Error message when imported FBX file contains multiple joints with the same name.  "joint", also known as skeleton or bones, is a technical term in 3d animation that refers to a single part of a rig that can deform a 3d mesh geometry.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "joint" is used in the translation.
english: Found more than one joint named %1.  All joints must have unique names.
translation: 找到多個名稱為 %1 的接合。接合的名稱無法重複。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Correctives refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformations in a rig in 3d animation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "corrective" is used in the translation.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Correctives can be for at most 3 control names.  Found %1 in "%2"
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：最多可以對控制項名稱使用校正。在「%2」找到 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Unrecognized FACS control name "%1"
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無法識別的 FACS 控制項名稱「%1」

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Invalid corrective name "%1": Neutral cannot be part of a corrective
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無效校正名稱「%1」：Neutral 無法成為校正的一部分

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective". Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Found duplicate FACS control name %1 for corrective %2
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：校正%2中找到重複 FACS 控制項名稱 %1

description: Frame refers to a frame of animation.  "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Couldn't parse the frame number in Extra Attribute named "%1".
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無法從額外特性「%1」分析影格數。

description: "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data
english: Failed importing dynamic head: Empty value found for Extra Attribute named "%1".
translation: 無法匯入動態頭部：額外特性「%1」中找到空白值。

description: "frame" refers to a frame of animation.  "control" refers to a FACS control, where FACS stands for Facial Action Coding System
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Duplicate control name found: "%1" in frame %2 and frame %3
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：影格 %2 和 %3 中找到重複控制項名稱「%1」

description: Warning message indicating that some key/value pair was missed.  attribute refers to a specific metadata that is attached to objects in an FBX file

Error message when expected metadata is not found.  "Head_Geo" should not be translated as this refers to a string in the FBX file.  "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data. Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Head_Geo has no Extra Attributes that map FACS controls to animation frames.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：Head_Geo 沒有將 FACS 控制項配對到動畫影格的額外特性。

description: "frame" refers to a frame of animation.  "Neutral" should not be translated as this refers to a string expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: No frame was set to "Neutral" in animation.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：動畫中沒有設為「Neutral」的影格。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: You have corrective %1, but missing corrective %2 to support it.  This may cause odd deformations.
translation: 您有校正%1，但沒有輔助的校正%2。這可能會導致異常變形。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: "%1" has not been specified. This is needed for corrective "%2".
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：未指定「%1」，需要指定才可使用校正「%2」。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "key frame" refers to an animation frame between which other frames are interpolated.  Please use the appropriate technical term for "key frame".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Missing key frame %1 for %2
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：%2 沒有關鍵格 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file. "key frame" refers to an animation frame between which other frames are interpolated.  Do not translate "Neutral".  This is a particular string that is expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Missing key frame %1 for Neutral
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：Neutral 沒有關鍵格 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file. "joint", also known as skeleton or bones, is a technical term in 3d animation that refers to a single part of a rig that can deform a 3d mesh geometry.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "joint" is used in the translation.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: No joints were found under facial animation root joint.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：臉部動畫根接合底下沒有接合。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file. "Control" refers to a FACS control, where FACS stands for Facial Action Coding System. "Neutral" should not be translated as this refers to a string expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Control %1 is nearly identical to Neutral
translation: 控制項 %1 與 Neutral 幾乎一樣

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  "base poses" refers to the main facial expressions for an avatar.  "character" refers to the 3d avatar
english: Found only %1 base poses. Your character may not be able to express itself.
translation: 只找到 %1 個基本表情，您的角色可能無法充分自我表達。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Could not load FACS control data
translation: 無法載入 FACS 控制項資料

english: A new UI object that renders descendants as a single layer that can be tinted and made transparent.
translation: 新 UI 物件，可以將後代當作單一層面成像，該層面可以設成不同色調或透明。

english: Pathfinding link can be used to connect areas in the place which otherwise are unconnected.
translation: 路徑搜尋連接可以連起地點中未連接的區域。

description: Item text for the default value of the combobox created by MaterialVariantPropertyItem.

english: Enable single-channel animations with new curve-based format in the Animation Clip Editor.
translation: 在動畫片段編輯器中啟用新的彎曲形式的單頻道動畫

english: Enable all Script and LocalScript instances
translation: 啟用所有 Script 和 LocalScript 個體

english: Disable all Script and LocalScript instances
translation: 停用所有 Script 和 LocalScript 個體

english: We could not join the Team Create session for place "%1". %2
translation: 無法加入地點「%1」的團隊創作作業。%2

english: We could not join the Team Create session for place [%1]. %2
translation: 無法加入地點 [%1] 的團隊創作作業。%2

english: Fail to get moderation status. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.
translation: 無法取得審查狀態，請嘗試重新登入。若問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: (INTERNAL) Export selection for upload via admin site
translation: （內部）匯出選取項目後透過管理員網站上傳
發布素材相依時發生錯誤
儲存捷徑將依情境而定

english: Saves the place to the location (Local or Roblox) currently open in Studio.
translation: 將地點儲存到目前在 Studio 開啟的位置（本機或 Roblox）。

description: Note to localization: Make sure <font></font> remain unchanged, they are needed for text wrapping with rtf. Tooltip that displays if a MaterialOverride is set to a MaterialVariant that is not a descendant of MaterialService.
english: <font>The Override will not function unless the MaterialVariant is placed in MaterialService. Place the variant in MaterialService or choose another variant.</font>
translation: <font>Override 將無法運作，除非 MaterialVariant 在 MaterialService 之內。請將變體放入 MaterialService 或選擇其他變體。</font>

description: Note to localization: Make sure <font></font> remain unchanged, they are needed for text wrapping with rtf. Tooltip that displays if a MaterialOverride is set to a MaterialVariant whose BaseMaterial does not equal to the Material it is supposed to be overriding.
english: <font>The Base Material for the MaterialVariant does not match the Override material. Select matching materials for the variant to function.</font>
translation: <font>MaterialVariant 的基底材質與 Override 材質不相符。若要變體運作，請選擇相符材質。</font>

description: Note to localization: Make sure <font></font> remain unchanged, they are needed for text wrapping with rtf. Tooltip that displays if a MaterialOverride is set to a MaterialVariant that has been deleted.
english: <font>The Override will not be functional because the MaterialVariant no longer exists. Apply a new variant or set the Override to None.</font>
translation: <font>因 MaterialVariant 以不存在，覆寫將無法運作。請套用新的變體或將 Override 設為 None。</font>

english: Please check that you are connected to the internet and try again.
translation: 請檢查您的網路連線再重新嘗試。

english: Please restart your application and try again.
translation: 請重啟應用程式再重新嘗試。

english: %1 mode is not enabled for your game.
translation: 您的遊戲未啟用 %1 模式。

english: To enable it, stop the experience if running, and set the %1 setting of %2 to one of the following: %3
translation: 若要啟用，請終止運行中的體驗，並將 %2 的 %1 設定改成下列其中一項：%3

english: Adding current script versions to Script Version History before closing place %1.
translation: 在地點 %1 關閉之前正在將目前指令碼版本加到指令碼版本紀錄。

english: Your uncommitted script changes have not been saved.
translation: 您未提交的指令碼變更尚未儲存。

english: Your uncommitted script changes have not been published.
translation: 您未提交的指令碼變更尚未發布。

english: Your uncommitted script changes have been saved to the new place.
translation: 您未提交的指令碼變更已儲存到新地點。

english: Your uncommitted script changes have been published to the new place.
translation: 您未提交的指令碼變更已發布到新地點。

english: No changes detected. Did not save.
Updates not available for this build

description: Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to a file. %1 is the file path.
Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox.
Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox, %1 is place name and %2 is game name.
translation: 已將「%1」儲存到 Roblox 中的「%2」。

translation: 已將「%1」的新變更儲存到 Roblox。

translation: 已將「%1」儲存到 Roblox，但您還在編輯「%2」。

english: Saved "%1" to "%2" in Roblox, but you are still editing "%3".
translation: 已將「%1」儲存到 Roblox 的「%2」，但您還在編輯「%3」。

description: Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox.
Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox, %1 is place name and %2 is game name.
translation: 已將「%1」發布到 Roblox 中的「%2」。

description: Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox.
english: Published new changes in "%1" to Roblox.
translation: 已將「%1」的新變更發布到 Roblox。

description: Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox. %1 and %2 are both place names.
english: Published "%1" to Roblox, but you are still editing "%2".
translation: 已將「%1」發布到 Roblox，但您還在編輯「%2」。

description: Message displayed when a user successfully saves a place to Roblox, %1 and %3 are place names and %2 is game name.
english: Published "%1" to "%2" in Roblox, but you are still editing "%3".
translation: 已將「%1」發布到 Roblox 的「%2」，但您還在編輯「%3」。

english: Failed to load settings with %s. Please restart Studio or contact support if the problem persists.
translation: 無法以 %s 載入設定，請重新啟動 Studio。如果問題持續，請聯絡客服人員。

english: Enable a new debugging experience with a more powerful backend architecture and Lua-based UI for the Callstack, Watch, and Breakpoint windows.
translation: 給您全新的偵錯體驗，背後有更強大的後端架構，Callstack、Watch 及 Breakpoint 視窗也會使用以 Lua 為基礎的使用者介面。

english: By uploading this content, you certify that you have the rights to put this on Roblox and that the content does not infringe on anyone else's intellectual property rights.
translation: 您在上傳此內容的同時，您證明自己有權將此內容上傳至 Roblox，且該內容不會侵犯任何人的智慧財產權。

english: You also allow this experience to use these assets.
translation: 您也允許此體驗使用這些素材。

english: Enables Sound Instances that are children of Cylinder, Block, and Ball parts to emit audio from every point on the surface of the part, rather than only the center.
translation: 允許為 Cylinder、Block、及 Ball 零件的子零件的音訊個體在零件表面所有點發出音訊，而不是只從中間。

english: Login requires Security Questions Verification. Please try again.
translation: 必須通過安全問題驗證才可登入，請重新嘗試。

english: Enables the new TextChatService feature. Once enabled, you can change the ChatVersion property on TextChatService to 'TextChatService', which will prevent the legacy Lua system from loading and enable the new chat.
translation: 啟用全新的 TextChatService 功能。啟用後，您可以將 TextChatService 的 ChatVersion 屬性變為「TextChatService」，避免舊版 Lua 系統載入和啟用新寮天空能。

english: Do you want to allow this game to use this asset?
translation: 允許此遊戲使用此素材？

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  "joint" refers to a bone or joint as used in computer animation.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data for %1: No joint named %2.
translation: 無法匯入 %1 的 FACS 控制資料：沒有名稱為 %2 的接合。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  "joint" refers to a bone or joint as used in computer animation.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data for %1: Multiple joints named %2 were found.  Joint names must be unique.
translation: 無法匯入 %1 的 FACS 控制資料：有多個名稱為 %2 的接合。接合名稱不可重複。

english: Enables the new particle flipbook feature, allowing the use of animated textures on particles (needing a 1024x1024 grid-layout texture of individiual frames).
translation: 啟用新的粒子翻書功能，允許粒子使用動畫紋理（需要 1024x2014 網格格局的單一影格）

english: Audio file could not be uploaded at this time.
translation: 目前無法上傳音訊檔案。

english: %1 of %2 audio uploads left until %3. (Learn more)
translation: %3 前還有 %1 / %2 個音訊上傳。 （了解更多）

english: You've reached your audio upload limit. It refreshes on %1. (Learn more)
translation: 您已到達音訊上傳上限，上限會在 %1 重置。 （了解更多）

english: Audio uploads are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
translation: 暫時無法上傳音訊，請稍後再試。

english: You have %1 audio uploads per 30 days. (Learn more)
translation: 您每 30 天可以上傳 %1 個音訊。 （了解更多）

description: Description title for warning pop-up that lets users know they have to grant audio permissions
Description of warning that users need to give their universe permission to use audio or else, their audio won't play in the experience they publsih
english: You are publishing an Experience that includes assets that may be private. Please consider granting access to the destination Experience. If you do not grant access, any private assets will not work.
translation: 您即將發布可能含有私人素材的體驗，請考慮授予目的地體驗權限。如果您未授權，私人素材將無法使用。

description: Name of audio file in the place file
warning modal button that publishes game without granting permission
warning modal button that grants the universe permission to all assets in the game during publish

translation: 使用週框方塊移動手把

english: Position Move handles at the edges of the bounding box instead of at the pivot.
translation: 將移動手把放在週框方塊的邊邊，而不是在軸點。

名稱：%1
素材 ID：%2
類型：%3

description: Message that's output after user fails to grant their universe permission to use asset
english: Failed to grant Universe permission to use asset %1
translation: 無法授予宇宙使用素材 %1 的權限

description: Message that's output after user sucessfully grants their universe permission to use asset
english: Successfully granted Universe permission to use asset %1
translation: 已成功授予宇宙使用素材 %1 的權限

translation: 無法加入地點 [%1] 的團隊創作作業。%2

We could not open the place [%1]. %2

description: Appears in output window when permission granting fails. %1 and %2 are replaced by assed ids, and %3 is replaced by an error code.
english: Failed to grant universe [%1] permission to asset [%2]: %3
translation: 無法授予宇宙 [%1] 使用素材 [%2] 的權限：%3

english: Can only add Folder, Script, LocalScript, ModuleScript or StringValue.
translation: 只能新增 Folder、Script、LocalScript、ModuleScript 或 StringValue。

description: No material was found for the override.
english: Unable to find a MaterialVariant matching the name and override material in MaterialService.
translation: 無法在 MaterialService 中找到符合名稱和覆寫材質的 MaterialVariant。

description: No material was found as a variant.
english: Unable to find a MaterialVariant matching the name and base material in MaterialService.
translation: 無法在 MaterialService 中找到符合名稱和基礎材質的 MaterialVariant。

description: Multiple MaterialVariants match the given name and override.
english: Found multiple MaterialVariants matching the name and override material in MaterialService, this may cause unexpected behavior at runtime.
translation: MaterialService 中找到多個符合名稱和覆寫材質的 MaterialVariant，執行階段可能會發生異常行為。

description: Multiple MaterialVariants match the given name and variant.
english: Found multiple MaterialVariants matching the name and base material in MaterialService, this may cause unexpected behavior at runtime.
translation: MaterialService 中找到多個符合名稱和基礎材質的 MaterialVariant，執行階段可能會發生異常行為。

description: Appears in output window when permission granting fails. %1 is replaced by universe id, %2 is replaced by assed id and %3 is replaced by user id.
english: Your User ID %3 is not authorized to grant asset permissions. Failed to grant the Universe %1 permission to use asset %2.
translation: 無法授予宇宙 %1 使用素材 %2 的權限。您的使用者 ID %3 沒有權限授予素材權限。

description: Message that's output after user sucessfully grants their experience permission to use asset
english: Successfully granted the experience permission to use asset %1
translation: 已成功授予體驗使用素材 %1 的權限

english: An unexpected error has occurred and Studio needs to quit. Please restart Studio or contact support if the problem persists.
translation: 發生意外錯誤，Studio 必須退出。如果問題持續，請重新啟動 Studio 或聯絡客服人員。

description: Displayed as a label in the popup image picker
Displayed as a label in the popup image picker

english: Animation clip editor will save the rig along with keyframes to make the animation retargetable.
translation: 動畫片段編輯器可以將骨架和關鍵格一起儲存，使動畫可以重新指定。

english: Enables the auto-skinning property on the WrapDeformer’s WrapLayer instances which allows deformation of accessories based on the skinning information of the character it’s attached to.
translation: 啟用 WrapDeformer 的 WrapLayer 個體的自動帶皮屬性，讓飾品可以根據所屬的角色的皮膚資訊變形。

english: Unable to load universe. Permission denied.
translation: 權限不足，無法載入宇宙。

english: File is too large; must be less than %1MB
translation: 檔案過大，大小必須小於 %1 MB

english: Iteration with for loops in Luau now supports directly iterating tables without pairs/ipairs as well as __iter metamethod.
translation: Luau 的 for 迴圈迭代現在可以直接對沒有 Pair 或 Ipair 和 __iter Metamethod 的表格進行迭代。

english: Animation clip editor will have a "Live Animation Creator" option in the Import menu to transfer 3D pose from a video to an avatar.
translation: 匯入選單的動畫片段編輯器將含有「即時動畫生成器」的選項，讓您將影片的 3D 姿勢轉入虛擬人偶。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  Do not translate "RootFaceJoint".  This is a particular string that is expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data: "%1" must be exactly "RootFaceJoint" with no spaces or underscores.
translation: 無法匯入 FACS 控制資料：「%1」必須與「RootFaceJoint」一致，不可含有空格或下橫線。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  Do not translate "Frame#" and leave "#" as is.  These refer to specific computer-readable strings.
english: Ignoring "%1" because it contains underscores or spaces.  Must be of the form "Frame#" where "#" is an integer with no spaces or underscores.
translation: 「%1」因含有空格或下橫線而遭到忽略。型態必須為「Frame#」，「#」應為整數並不包含有空格或下橫線。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  Do not translate "Frame#" or "RootFaceJoint".
english: Found "Frame#" attributes in mesh "%1" but no "RootFaceJoint" attribute.  No FACS mapping will be created for this mesh.
translation: 網格「%1」找到「Frame#」特性，但找不到「RootFaceJoint」特性。無法建立此網格的 FACS 配對。

description: "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data
english: Empty value found for Extra Attribute named "%1".  Ignoring this.
translation: 額外屬性「%1」因找到空白值而被忽略。

description: Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data: Animation does not exist.
translation: 無法匯入 FACS 控制資料：動畫不存在。

english: An error occurred during video uploading.
An error occurred during video processing.
The file does not meet our requirement.
The package instance matched the newest version; no new version was created.
translation: 套件個體與最新版本相符，未創作新版本。

english:
This nonuniformly scaled union contains parts which can't be exactly represented separately, before separating:
Reset the scale to make re-unioning easier, or Apply the scale as closely as possible.
translation:
此未統一縮放聯集含有無法完整分開呈現的零件，在分離之前：
重置比例讓重新聯合過程更容易，或以最接近的方式套用比例。

description: Remove the 3d scale that an object had resetting it back to its original size.
Apply the 3d scale that on object had to all of its children instead.

english: Allow unions created with the CSG system to scale nonuniformly in the same way as MeshParts. Change the interpretation of existing nonuniformly scaled unions.
translation: 允許透過 CSG 系統創作的聯集與 Meshpart 一樣進行未統一縮放。變更現有未統一縮放聯集的解讀方式。

english: Allow plugins to access the ScriptEditorService and ScriptDocument objects, permitting them to interact with an active editor.
translation: 允許外掛程式存取 ScriptEditorService 和 ScriptDocument 物件，進而允許他們與活躍的編輯器互動。

english: Paste Into Selected At Original Location
translation: 在原位置貼入選取區域

english: Import snippet pack from json file as user snippet pack.
translation: 從 JSON 檔案匯入片段包為使用者片段包。

english: Toggle snippet or snippet pack in autocomplete menu
translation: 在自動完成選單中切換片段或片段包

description: %1 is the number of modified packages detected. %2 is the total number of packages detected. e.g. Warning: Did not update 8/10 packages due to modifications
english: Warning: Did not update %1/%2 packages due to modifications
translation: 警告：%1 / %2 個套件因修改而未更新

english: A new "Collaborate" button that enables you to immediately add, view, or manage collaborators and their permissions for your game. If collaborators are added, Team Create is turned on so that you can work together with your friends.
translation: 新的「合作」按鈕可以讓您立刻新增、查看或管理遊戲的合夥人，並調整他們的權限。若您有新增合夥人，我們將會為您們開啟團隊創作功能。

description: Description title for no permissions granted dialog pop-up that lets users know they have to grant audio permission
english: No permission to use Audio file(s)
translation: 沒有使用音訊檔案的權限

description: Description of warning that users need to give their universe permission to use audio or else, their audio won't play in the experience they publsih
english: This experience has no permission to use some assets. Please consider granting permissions to the destination Experience. If you do not grant permissions, assets will not be available for this experience.
translation: 此體驗缺少使用部分素材的權限，請考慮為目的地體驗授予權限。如果您未授予權限，此體驗將無法使用該素材。

description: Description title for permissions successfully granted dialog
Description for permissions successfully granted dialog and continue with publish
english: All asset permissions have been granted to this experience.
translation: 已為此體驗授予所有素材權限。

description: Description title for permissions cannot be granted dialog to some assets by the user
english: You cannot grant permissions for some assets
translation: 您無法為部分素材授予權限

description: Description of dialog with assets that cannot be granted permission by the user. Have options to publish without permissions or cancel publish
english: You don't have the ability to grant permissions for assets below. Please reach out to the asset creator to grant permissions to this experience, or these assets will not be available.
translation: 您沒有為下列素材授予權限的能力。請聯絡素材創作者為此體驗授予權限，否則這些素材將無法被使用。

description: warning modal button that grants the universe permission to all assets in the game
warning modal button that publishes game after granting permission
warning modal button that publishes game without granting permission
warning modal button that cancel the publish

translation: 實驗 Luau 語言功能

english: Adds lower-bounds calculation to script analysis for more accurate type inference.
translation: 在指令碼分析中新增下限運算，獲得更準確的類型推斷。
1 個聯集正在被重新詮釋

english:
Do you want Studio to perform a one-time migration resizing one union to retain its original appearance?

The migration should only be used on content created under the old scaling behavior. In particular this means you should not use the migration on new content you've been working on under the Nonuniform Unions beta feature.
translation:
要 Studio 執行一次性移植，調整 1 個聯集的大小，使其維持原來樣貌嗎？

移植應僅用於使用舊版縮放行為建立的內容。除了使用未統一聯集 Beta 功能建立的新內容，您不應對其他新內容使用移植功能。
%1 個聯集正在被重新詮釋

english:
Do you want Studio to perform a one-time migration resizing %1 unions to retain their original appearance?

The migration should only be used on content created under the old scaling behavior. In particular this means you should not use the migration on new content you've been working on under the Nonuniform Unions beta feature.
translation:
要 Studio 執行一次性移植，調整 %1 個聯集的大小，使其維持原來樣貌嗎？

移植應僅用於使用舊版縮放行為建立的內容。除了使用未統一聯集 Beta 功能建立的新內容，您不應對其他新內容使用移植功能。
請稍後……已載入 %1 個遊戲。

english: ROBLOX INTERNAL: Please check if you or an existing user in this Team Create session are in a channel. All users in a Team Create session must be on the same RCC channel.
translation: Roblox 內部：請確認您或其他在此團隊創作作業中的使用者是否在一個頻道。所有在團隊創作作業中的使用者必須在同一個 RCC 頻道。

english: Enables the new list mode feature for Studio's Start Page, allowing you to view and manage your Roblox games from a condensed list view.
translation: 啟用 Studio 初始頁面的全新清單模式功能，讓您使用精簡的清單查看和管理您的 Roblox 遊戲。

english: Toggles visibility of UI in the 3D View
translation: 切換 3D 檢視中的 UI 能見度

事件 ID：%1

地點名稱：%3

translation: 無法取得選擇套件的連結 latestVersionNum：無資料
