translation: 只能在編輯模式發布套件

english: Failed to prepare instance for upload
Animation Editor will have a "Face Capture" button to use a camera to record your own face movements onto an avatar.
translation: 動畫編輯器將含有「臉部捕捉」按鈕，讓您將自己的臉部動作錄到虛擬人偶上。

english: Making edits to this package will disable the ability to update it until those edits have been published or reverted.
translation: 若編輯此套件，變更發布或還原前將無法更新此套件。

description: %1 is a small number typically 2 or 3.
english: Making edits to %1 packages. You will not be able to update those packages until the edits are published or reverted.
translation: 正在編輯 %1 個套件。變更發布或還原前將無法更新此套件。

description: The user modified a package, and we told them that this will have consequences. We're offering them a chance to avoid this by clicking a button and reverting the changes.

english: Modifying packages will prevent you from updating them until you publish or revert the changes
translation: 修改套件後，發布或還原變更之前將無法更新套件。

description: Label for the button, not normally shown.
Tooltip for a button that toggles bold on/off in TextLabel/etc objects.
english: Whether the text should be displayed emboldened.

description: Label for the button, not normally shown.
Tooltip for a button that toggles italic on/off in TextLabel/etc objects.
english: Whether the text should be displayed in an italicized font.
Enables trying the ControllerManager and Controller instances for better simulated character movement and customization.
translation: 啟用嘗試 ControllerManager 和 Controller 個體，使模擬角色動作和自訂過程更佳。

english: Enables a new UI for selecting fonts which supports previews and provides access to more weights and styles than before.
translation: 啟用新的字型選擇介面，此介面支援預覽功能，並給您更多粗細和字體選項。

english: Enables IK Controls, which allow you to create realistic procedural animations using IK (Inverse Kinematics)
translation: 啟用 IK 控制選項，讓您使用逆運動學（Inverse Kinematics，簡稱 IK）建立真實的漸進式動畫

english: Enables strafing animations to be played when characters walk/run in directions they are not facing.
translation: 當角色往面向方向以外的方向移動時啟用側移動畫

english: Group the selected Instances under a new Folder
translation: 將選取個體組合在新資料夾底下

english: Group the selected Instances into a new Folder
translation: 將選取個體組合成新資料夾
限制式小工具比例（Alt + 滾輪）

english: This script is read-only as it is part of a package. Click here to unlink the package.
translation: 此指令因屬於套件而為唯讀。點擊此處與套件解除連接。

english: Enables the new sampling profiler feature for Dev Console.
translation: 為開發者控制台啟用新的樣本性能分析器功能。

english: Enables a new selection outline style, the ability to select objects that are behind other objects, a new option for showing bounding boxes, and a context menu item for selecting parents of objects.
translation: 啟用新的選取外框風格、選擇在其他物件後面的物件的能力、顯示綁定方塊的新選項及選取物件的父項目的情境選單項目。

description: Group together a set of Instances under a Model, shorter text to be used in the ribbon bar to save space

english: Edit and Preview Cage Mesh for Clothing and Accessories.
translation: 編輯和預覽服裝和飾品的圍籠網格。

english: Select one or multiple Models to convert into Accessories
translation: 選擇要轉換成飾品的模型（可複選）

english: Bulk Create Accessories from Imported Model
translation: 從匯入模型大量建立飾品

english: Import an Avatar with a .fbx file
translation: 使用 .fbx 檔案匯入虛擬人偶

english: Import a mesh rig or avatar from a file using the import UI.
translation: 使用匯入 UI 從檔案匯入網格骨架或虛擬人偶
插入要製成動畫的骨架

english: Create, preview, and publish Animation clips
translation: 創作、預覽和發布動畫片段

english: This script is part of a package. Click here to modify.
translation: 此指令屬於套件。點擊此處即可修改。

english: Workflow improvements and support for physical properties and terrain detail
translation: 工作留改良、支援物理屬性和詳細地形

english: "%1" has been moved to your game list.”

translation: 新體驗將啟用團隊創作

english: New experiences in Studio are immediately saved to Roblox and enable Team Create by default.,
translation: Studio 中的新體驗將會立刻儲存到 Roblox 並預設啟用團隊創作。

description: This is shown as title text for a dialog that is displayed to the user when Studio is running low on memory.
This is shown as a description for a dialog that is displayed to the user when Studio is running low on memory to tell them to close Studio and try again.
english: Please restart Studio and try again.
translation: 請重啟 Studio 再重新嘗試。
必須重新啟動 Studio 才可重置配置

english: New experiences created in Studio are immediately saved to Roblox and have Team Create enabled by default.
translation: 在 Studio 創作的新體驗將會立刻儲存到 Roblox 並預設啟用團隊創作。

description: This is text for a button that is shown to the user to let them restart Studio
This is text for a button that is shown to the user to let them cancel and not restart Studio

english: Error getting metadata for related place
translation: 取得相關地點元資料時發生錯誤。

english: Unable to get place id from place metadata
translation: 無法從地點原資料取得地點 ID

english: Add new emulation devices with non-rectangular aka "notched" screens.
translation: 新增擁有非長方形（「瀏海」）螢幕的模擬裝置。

english: Selection and Navigation Improvements in Explorer
translation: 總管的選擇和導覽功能改良

english: The ability to expand and collapse all folders in the Explorer and easier bulk selection of search results in the Explorer.
translation: 允許在總管展開和折疊所有資料夾，並更容易在總管大量選擇搜尋結果。

english: Enable the new terrain upgrade which provides a smooth connection where water joins the shores. This upgrade also allows water edges to animate following the water's movement. After enabling the beta, you can choose to apply the shorelines upgrade for each of your places independently, through the Terrain Editor. The upgrade can be reverted with the Undo command.
translation: 啟用全新的地形升級，呈現較為平順的海岸線。此升級亦允許水緣跟著水的移動方向移動。啟用 Beta 版本後，您可以透過地形編輯器個別為地點套用海岸線升級。您可以使用復原指令還原升級。

english: Failed to remove game from archive.
translation: 無法從封存庫移除遊戲。

english: Failed to remove game from archive.
translation: 無法從封存庫移除遊戲。

english: How thick is the outline shown around the selected Instances?
translation: 選擇個體的邊框應該多厚？

english: How thick is the outline shown around the item your mouse is hovering over?
translation: 游標在物件上停放時，物件邊框應有多厚？

english: File > New creates a place with Team Create off
translation: 「檔案」→「新增」將在團隊創作停用之下建立地點

english: Display Team Create toggle when creating a new experience
translation: 建立新體驗時顯示團隊創作切換選項

english: Create new snippet in selected pack
translation: 在選取片段包創作新片段
從片段包刪除選取片段。

english: Fail to open file from path.
This is not valid snippet pack json file.
translation: 片段包 json 檔案無效。

english: Fail to open file %1 to write.
translation: 無法開啟檔案 %1 進行寫入。

english: Snippet pack name (%1) is too long, shouldn't be longer than %2
translation: 片段包名稱（%1）過長，長度上限為 %2

english: Snippet pack description (%1) is too long, shouldn't be longer than %2
translation: 片段包說明（%1）過長，長度上限為 %2

english: Snippet name (%1) is too long, shouldn't be longer than %2
translation: 片段名稱（%1）過長，長度上限為 %2

english: Snippet description (%1) is too long, shouldn't be longer than %2
translation: 片段說明（%1）過長，長度上限為 %2

english: Snippet prefix (%1) is too long, shouldn't be longer than %2
translation: 片段字首（%1）過長，長度上限為 %2

english: Invalid character in prefix (%1), it can only be  '_', number, or letter.
translation: 字首（%1）含有無效字元，只能使用「_」、數字或字母。

english: Add a cursor to all occurrences of the current selection
translation: 為目前選取項目的所有事故新增游標

english: Remove the most recently added cursor
The script is currently not available because it is not loaded into the Client data model yet. Once the Client data model starts executing, the script will be available.
translation: 指令碼尚未載入到客戶端資料模型，目前無法使用。指令碼在客戶端資料模型開始執行後即可使用。

english: Published package %1 has an older metadata format. Please republish it for better version control related supports.
translation: 發布的套件 %1 有較舊的元資料格式。請重新發布以獲得更好的版本控制相關支援。

description: Particle flipbooks require a square image.
english: Flipbook only supports particle Textures of sizes 8x8, 16x16, 32x32, 64x64, 128x128, 256x256, 512x512 or 1024x1024.
Sets selection rendering mode to bounding boxes
translation: 將選項成像模式設為邊界框

description: Error message that displays if an internal error occurred while importing head with facial animation
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: %1
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：%1

description: Success message when importing head with facial animation.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Successfully loaded FACS control data: found %1 of %2 controls
translation: 成功載入 FACS 控制項資料：找到 %1/%2 個控制項

description: Error message when imported FBX file contains multiple joints with the same name.  "joint", also known as skeleton or bones, is a technical term in 3d animation that refers to a single part of a rig that can deform a 3d mesh geometry.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "joint" is used in the translation.
english: Found more than one joint named %1.  All joints must have unique names.
translation: 找到多個名稱為 %1 的接合。接合的名稱無法重複。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Correctives refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformations in a rig in 3d animation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "corrective" is used in the translation.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Correctives can be for at most 3 control names.  Found %1 in "%2"
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：最多可以對控制項名稱使用校正。在「%2」找到 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Unrecognized FACS control name "%1"
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無法識別的 FACS 控制項名稱「%1」

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Invalid corrective name "%1": Neutral cannot be part of a corrective
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無效校正名稱「%1」：Neutral 無法成為校正的一部分

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective". Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Found duplicate FACS control name %1 for corrective %2
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：校正%2中找到重複 FACS 控制項名稱 %1

description: Frame refers to a frame of animation.  "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Couldn't parse the frame number in Extra Attribute named "%1".
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：無法從額外特性「%1」分析影格數。

description: "frame" refers to a frame of animation.  "control" refers to a FACS control, where FACS stands for Facial Action Coding System
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Duplicate control name found: "%1" in frame %2 and frame %3
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：影格 %2 和 %3 中找到重複控制項名稱「%1」

description: Warning message indicating that some key/value pair was missed.  attribute refers to a specific metadata that is attached to objects in an FBX file

Error message when expected metadata is not found.  "Head_Geo" should not be translated as this refers to a string in the FBX file.  "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data. Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Head_Geo has no Extra Attributes that map FACS controls to animation frames.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：Head_Geo 沒有將 FACS 控制項配對到動畫影格的額外特性。

description: "frame" refers to a frame of animation.  "Neutral" should not be translated as this refers to a string expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: No frame was set to "Neutral" in animation.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：動畫中沒有設為「Neutral」的影格。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: You have corrective %1, but missing corrective %2 to support it.  This may cause odd deformations.
translation: 您有校正%1，但沒有輔助的校正%2。這可能會導致異常變形。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "corrective" is a technical term that refers to a corrective shape that is used to handle bad deformation.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term is used in the translation for "corrective".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: "%1" has not been specified. This is needed for corrective "%2".
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：未指定「%1」，需要指定才可使用校正「%2」。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  "key frame" refers to an animation frame between which other frames are interpolated.  Please use the appropriate technical term for "key frame".
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Missing key frame %1 for %2
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：%2 沒有關鍵格 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file. "key frame" refers to an animation frame between which other frames are interpolated.  Do not translate "Neutral".  This is a particular string that is expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: Missing key frame %1 for Neutral
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：Neutral 沒有關鍵格 %1

description: Error message when importing FBX file. "joint", also known as skeleton or bones, is a technical term in 3d animation that refers to a single part of a rig that can deform a 3d mesh geometry.  Please ensure the appropriate technical term for "joint" is used in the translation.
english: Failed importing head with facial animation: No joints were found under facial animation root joint.
translation: 無法匯入臉部動畫頭部：臉部動畫根接合底下沒有接合。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file. "Control" refers to a FACS control, where FACS stands for Facial Action Coding System. "Neutral" should not be translated as this refers to a string expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Control %1 is nearly identical to Neutral
translation: 控制項 %1 與 Neutral 幾乎一樣

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  "base poses" refers to the main facial expressions for an avatar.  "character" refers to the 3d avatar
english: Found only %1 base poses. Your character may not be able to express itself.
translation: 只找到 %1 個基本表情，您的角色可能無法充分自我表達。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Could not load FACS control data
translation: 無法載入 FACS 控制項資料

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  "joint" refers to a bone or joint as used in computer animation.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data for %1: No joint named %2.
translation: 無法匯入 %1 的 FACS 控制資料：沒有名稱為 %2 的接合。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  "joint" refers to a bone or joint as used in computer animation.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data for %1: Multiple joints named %2 were found.  Joint names must be unique.
translation: 無法匯入 %1 的 FACS 控制資料：有多個名稱為 %2 的接合。接合名稱不可重複。

description: Error message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  Do not translate "RootFaceJoint".  This is a particular string that is expected to be in the FBX file.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data: "%1" must be exactly "RootFaceJoint" with no spaces or underscores.
translation: 無法匯入 FACS 控制資料：「%1」必須與「RootFaceJoint」一致，不可含有空格或下橫線。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  Do not translate "Frame#" and leave "#" as is.  These refer to specific computer-readable strings.
english: Ignoring "%1" because it contains underscores or spaces.  Must be of the form "Frame#" where "#" is an integer with no spaces or underscores.
translation: 「%1」因含有空格或下橫線而遭到忽略。型態必須為「Frame#」，「#」應為整數並不包含有空格或下橫線。

description: Warning message when importing FBX file.  Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.  Do not translate "Frame#" or "RootFaceJoint".
english: Found "Frame#" attributes in mesh "%1" but no "RootFaceJoint" attribute.  No FACS mapping will be created for this mesh.
translation: 網格「%1」找到「Frame#」特性，但找不到「RootFaceJoint」特性。無法建立此網格的 FACS 配對。

description: "Extra Attribute" refers to a specific data section of an FBX file that contains extra key/value pairs of data
english: Empty value found for Extra Attribute named "%1".  Ignoring this.
translation: 額外屬性「%1」因找到空白值而被忽略。

description: Note FACS refers to the acronym Facial Action Coding System.  FACS may not need to be translated if the English acronym is used.
english: Failed importing FACS Control data: Animation does not exist.
translation: 無法匯入 FACS 控制資料：動畫不存在。

description: Display the video uploading progress in percent.
Display the video processing progress in percent.

english: No video stream is found in the file.
translation: 檔案中找不到影片串流。

english: Too many video streams are found in the file.
Too many audio streams are found in the file.
The duration of the file is too long.
The bitrate of the file is too high.

translation: 未支援的影片編解碼器。
未支援的影片編解碼器。
未支援的影片像素格式。
未支援的影片色彩空間。
未支援的音訊樣本格式。

english:
An unexpected problem has occurred with the docking layout. The current layout will be reset and Studio must be restarted.
We are investigating this issue further and apologize for the inconvenience.
translation: 介面配置發生意外錯誤。目前的配置將被重置，Studio 必須重新開啟。我們將會進一步調查此問題，很抱歉造成您的困擾。

description: User typed a search like 'Barrier or'
User typed a search like Position.* = 3
english: wildcards are not supported in property checks
translation: 屬性檢查不支援萬用字元

english: property indexing can only be done through something like '%1'. if you want to check children and match a property, use multiple searches.
translation: 屬性索引只能透過「%1」等完成。如果想要檢查子項並進行屬性配對，請另外進行搜尋。

description: User typed a search like Locked=$ -- the $ is an example of a character that is not allowed.

english: unexpected '%1' after '%2%3', expected a value for filter, such as %4
translation: 「%2%3」後有預期之外的「%1」，應有「%4」等篩選值

description: User typed a search like Foo.$

english: unexpected '%1'. if you are trying to search for a name instead, try "%2" (with quotes)
translation: 預期之外的「%1」。如果您想改搜尋名稱，請使用 "%2"（含引號）

description: User typed a search like Position.What = true -- Position does not have a 'What' field
english: '%1' is not a valid field for '%2'

description: User typed a search like Locked.What = true -- Locked does not have fields, like 'What'
User typed a search like Locked>true -- the > should instead be an equals sign
english: '%1' cannot be used to compare '%2', try '%3' or '%4'

description: User typed a search like Locked=100 -- Locked is only true or false, it cannot be 100
english: '%1' is not a valid value for '%2'
'%1' is unsupported. please file a feature request if you believe it to be useful.
translation: 不支援「%1」。如果您覺得有用，請填寫功能請求。

english: Enables the use of string interpolation to Luau scripts, which let you create formatted strings without explicit string.format calls.
translation: 允許在 Luau 指令碼使用字串內插，讓您可以不需要明確 string.format 呼叫就可建立格式化字串。

english: Selects the word at the cursor, or the next occurrence of the current selection
translation: 選擇游標的單字，或是目前選取項目的下一個事故

english: Select previous occurrence of current selection
translation: 選擇目前選取項目的上一個事故

english: Automatically commit locked scripts when you save or publish to Roblox
translation: 儲存或發布到 Roblox 時自動提交已鎖定的指令碼
變更已同步到團隊創作

english: Check your internet connection to avoid delays during saves and collaboration.
translation: 確認網路連線狀態，避免儲存與合作時發生延遲。
未找到上傳的伺服器/端點。

english: Too many upload requests, please wait before retrying.
translation: 上傳請求次數過多，請稍後再重試。

english: User does not have the correct permissions to manage this experience.
translation: 使用者沒有管理此體驗的權限。

english: This operation requires an authenticated user.
translation: 此操作需要完成驗證的使用者進行。

english: Attempted to upload to a Team Create place, but Team Create is not enabled.
translation: 已嘗試上傳到團隊創作地點，但團隊創作未啟用。

english: Place upload failed when attempting to publish descendant assets.
translation: 嘗試發布後續資產時上傳失敗。

english: Create and manage groupings of instances.
Enable the terrain upgrade changing the way voxels are rendered to make them much smoother in cases where there were terracing issues and LOD artefacts before. (NOTE: Requires Upgrade Shorelines!)
translation: 啟用地形升級，變更體素成像的方式；若之前有斷層和細節層次物件情形，此升級會讓地形更平滑。（注意：需要升級海岸線！）

english: Enable methods to add multiple cursors to the script editor.
translation: 啟用新增多個游標到指令碼編輯器的方式。

description: User typed a search like Locked.What = true -- Locked does not have fields, like 'What'

translation: 反斜線沒有跳脫任何字元

english: Models now have a Scale property, and packages can be scaled without it counting as a modification.
translation: 模型現在擁有縮放屬性，套件可以在不視為修改的情況下進行縮放。

english: You can now search by properties, tags, and more. Click the link to open the Creator Hub to learn more.

The model is trained on no private developer data and uses only public marketplace assets.

提醒您，根據 Roblox 使用條款（下稱「條款」）的定義，該工具屬於 Roblox 服務的一部分。因此，你使用服務時受條款（包括創作者條款和 Roblox 社群標準）的約束，並且必須 (i) 以合法的方式使用該工具並遵守所有適用法律，(ii) 不得透過逆向工程、反編譯或以其他方式試圖推導或獲得存取工具的權限；(iii) 使用該工具時不得侵犯或試圖侵犯、盜用或以其他方式侵犯 Roblox 或任何其他個人或實體的任何權利。
由於工具性質的緣故，該工具可能產生不正確、誤導、冒犯或對你無幫助的其他資訊，並且這些資訊在使用者之間可能相同、相似或不同。該工具非旨在提供事實資訊或建議。因此，你使用該工具的風險由你自行承擔，該工具以「原樣」提供，且不帶任何條件、保證、擔保或任何形式的明示或默認（包括但不限於任何適銷性、特定用途適用性、標題、非侵權或服務無錯誤或無中斷的任何擔保）。Roblox 對透過該工具存取或從中存取的內容或資訊不提供保證，並明確聲明你使用該工具所產生或相關的任何資料、內容或資訊均準確無誤或可以或應該被你用於任何用途。
該模型未訓練任何私人資料，僅使用公開市集資產。

description: Terms and conditions for being able to use the AI Material Generator
english:
Material Generator is a tool provided by Roblox as an option to access material creation features in Studio. BY PROCEEDING OR USING MATERIAL GENERATOR, YOU ACCEPT AND AGREE TO THE BELOW.

You remain responsible for ensuring that all language, data and other information that you upload to Roblox, and all images and other materials suggested by Material Generator, complies with the Roblox Terms of Use (the “Terms”) including the Roblox Community Standards. Material Generator is part of the “Services” as defined in the Terms. Accordingly, your use of Material Generator is subject to the Terms, including the Creator Terms and the Roblox Community Standards, and, among other things, you must (i) use Material Generator in a lawful manner and in compliance with all applicable laws, (ii) not reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to derive or gain access to Material Generator; and (iii) use Material Generator in a manner that does not infringe or attempt to infringe, misappropriate or otherwise violate any rights of Roblox or any other person or entity.

Due to its nature, Material Generator may generate irrelevant, inaccurate, offensive, or other material that is not useful for your purposes and that may be the same, similar, or different among users. Material Generator is not intended to provide factual information or advice. YOUR USE OF MATERIAL GENERATOR IS AT YOUR OWN RISK, AND MATERIAL GENERATOR IS PROVIDED “AS IS” AND WITHOUT CONDITION, WARRANTY, GUARANTEE OR REPRESENTATION OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, AVAILABILITY, OR ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED USE). ROBLOX MAKES NO WARRANTY ABOUT CONTENT OR MATERIALS ACCESSIBLE THROUGH OR FROM MATERIAL GENERATOR, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS THAT ANY CONTENT, IMAGES OR INFORMATION RESULTING FROM OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF MATERIAL GENERATOR IS ACCURATE OR RELIABLE OR CAN OR SHOULD BE RELIED UPON BY YOU FOR ANY PURPOSE.
translation:
「材質產生器」是 Roblox 提供的一個工具，讓你可以在 Studio 中使用材質建立功能。請閱讀以下內容，如果你使用或繼續使用材質產生器，即表示你同意以下內容。

你需要確保所有語言、資料和其他上傳到 Roblox 的資訊，以及材質產生器建議的所有圖像和其他材料都符合 Roblox 使用條款（下稱「條款」），包括 Roblox 社群標準。材質產生器是條款中「服務」的一部分。因此，你使用材質產生器需遵守條款，包括創作者條款和 Roblox 社群標準，你必須（i）以合法方式使用材質產生器，遵守所有適用的法律，（ii）不得反向工程、反編譯或以其他方式嘗試推導或獲取材質產生器的存取權；以及（iii）使用材質產生器的方式不得侵犯或嘗試侵犯、盜用或以其他方式違反 Roblox 或任何其他人或實體的權利。

由於材質產生器的特性，它可能會產生與使用者無關、不準確、冒犯或其他不適用於用戶目的的材料，且這些材料可能會在不同用戶之間相同、類似或不同。材質產生器非旨在提供事實資訊或建議。你使用材質產生器的風險自負，且材質產生器是按「原樣」提供，並且沒有任何條件、保證、擔保或表示，包括但不限於任何適銷性、特定用途適用性、標題、非侵權性、可用性、或錯誤免責或無中斷使用的保證。Roblox 對於材質產生器可存取的內容或材料不提供任何保證，並明確聲明由材質產生器產生或相關的任何內容、圖像或信息都不準確、可靠，且你不應該為任何目的而依賴這些內容、圖像或資訊。

description: Displays when a user's place fails to upload.
english: Server is busy and unable to process your upload request. Please try again in a couple minutes.
translation: 伺服器忙碌中，且無法處理您的上傳請求。請在幾分鐘後再度嘗試。

english: Tags for selected instances can now be added and removed from the properties panel.
translation: 現在可以在屬性面板中為選定個體新增與移除標籤。
當檔案變更時，重新載入外掛程式

english: Reload a plugin when its file on the filesystem changes
translation: 當檔案系統上的檔案變更時，重新載入外掛程式

english: Reload builtin plugins on file changed
translation: 當檔案變更時，重新載入內建外掛程式

english: Reload a builtin plugin when its file on the filesystem changes
translation: 當檔案系統上的檔案變更時，重新載入內建外掛程式

english: Some of these setting changes will not take effect until you reopen the place file

english: Continue execution to the current text cursor position
translation: 持續執行至目前文字游標位置

english: This beta feature allows creators to incorporate aerodynamic forces on parts and their assemblies. Once enabled, creators will have access to the workspace enum 'FluidForces' allowing them to opt-into this new force model via toggling it to 'Experimental'. This feature also exposes the workspace property 'AirDensity', and the BasePart property 'EnableFluidForces' in the Studio UI.
translation: 此 Beta 測試功能讓創作者能在零件與組件上結合空氣動力。啟用後，創作者就能使用工作區的列舉「FluidForces」，玩家可藉由切換至「實驗」選擇使用這種新的力模型。此功能亦會於 Studio UI 上顯示工作區屬性「AirDensity」與 BasePart 屬性「EnableFluidForces」。
使用 LUA 的角色狀態機器

english: A Lua replacement for the native Humanoid State Machine, allowing you to define and manage the various states, events, and transitions of your characters with ease. This beta feature needs New Character Controller beta feature enabled
translation: 這是用以取代原生人形狀態機器的 Lua 替代方式，能讓您輕鬆定義並管理角色的各種狀態、事件與轉場。如欲使用此 Beta 測試功能，必須先啟用新角色控制器的 Beta 測試功能。

english: We have disabled some language features because this script is too long and it's affecting system performance. You can change this in Settings
translation: 由於此指令碼過長而影響了系統效能，我們已停用某些語言功能。您可以在設定中變更這部分

english: Enable tools to create a Roblox Classic experience (R15 experience that plays like an R6).
translation: 啟用工具以創作 Roblox 經典體驗（玩起來像 R6 的 R15 體驗）。
R6 至 R15 的移植工具

english: Enable tools to convert an R6 experience to R15. These include tools to convert characters, animations, and scripts from R6 to R15.
translation: 啟用將 R6 體驗移植至 R15 上的工具。這包含可將角色、動畫與指令碼自 R6 體驗轉換為 R15 的工具。

english: ROBLOX INTERNAL: Please check if you or an existing user in this Team Create session are in a channel. All users in a Team Create session must be on the same RCC channel.
translation: Roblox 內部：請確認您或其他在此團隊創作作業中的使用者是否在一個頻道。所有在團隊創作作業中的使用者必須在同一個 RCC 頻道。

warning modal button that grants the universe permission to all assets in the game

english:
Hi!

Here are some ways I can help:
- Suggest code
- Answer questions related to your code
- Explain code
translation:
嗨！

以下為我能協助的一些方式：
- 建議程式碼
- 回答與您的程式碼相關的問題

translation: 匯入使用者創作內容身體與頭部，使用虛擬人偶預覽工具預覽，並將它們上傳至市集。

english: Are you sure you want to quit Roblox Studio?
Quitting Roblox Studio will cause you to lose data that is currently syncing.
translation: 若退出 Roblox Studio，目前正在同步的資料將會遺失。

english: Quitting Roblox Studio will cause you to lose data that is currently syncing and might corrupt your Terrain.
translation: 若退出 Roblox Studio，目前正在同步的資料將會遺失，地形也有可能遭到損壞。
要將變更儲存到 %1 嗎？

translation: 啟用新的現代化 Roblox 選單與相關 API，運用更流暢的 UI 進行主要系統控制設定。

translation: 為維護系統效能，當指令碼超過此字元數量時，將會停用某些語言功能。

translation: 此 Beta 測試功能允許創作者在幾何服務中測試與開發新的 CSG API，此外還改進了效能。

translation: 對核心的 Studio 拖曳工具改進了許多的小型一般體驗。請見 DevForum 公告以查看完整的變更內容清單。

translation: 伺服器忙碌中，且無法處理您的上傳請求。請在幾分鐘後再度嘗試。

english:
Adding plugin window failed with error: %1 
 Your plugin windows may not work correctly. Please close and reopen the place to restore plugin window functionality. If this problem persists, please contact Roblox customer support.
translation:
由於遇到錯誤，新增外掛程式視窗失敗：%1
您的外掛程式可能無法正常運作。請關閉並重新開啟空間，以還原外掛程式視窗的功能。若此問題持續發生，請聯絡 Roblox 的客服人員。
由於遇到錯誤，新增 AuxiliaryView 失敗

translation: 顯示所選或懸停機制的流體力

translation: 在 Studio 啟用地形草長自訂。

english: A collaborator has disabled LiveScripting after the server was started. To apply, all collaborators must leave the session so the server can restart.
translation: 伺服器開啟後，一名合夥人已停用 LiveScripting。如欲套用，則所有合夥人都必須離開作業，這樣伺服器才能重新啟動。
必須進行年齡與 ID 驗證。

translation: 顯示所選或懸停機制的流體力

english: To change access for the "{roleName}" role, visit the Configure Group page on the website.
translation: 若要變更「{roleName}」階級的權限，請在網站上前往設定群組頁面。

english: The user access granted here applies to all versions of this package.
translation: 在此授予的使用者權限將適用此套件所有版本。

english: Group roles that have not been assigned in Group Configuration can be set here. Permissions set here affect all users with the group role for all versions of this package.
translation: 群組設定中尚未指派的群組階級可以在此設定。在此設定的權限將會在影響此套件所有版本中所有擁有此群組階級的使用者。

english: The creator always has full access.
translation: 創作者永遠會擁有完整權限。

description: StarterPack is a Roblox API term that should not be translated.
english: Put this tool into the StarterPack?
To set the asset as free, enter 0.
translation: 若要將素材設為免費，請輸入「0」。

english: The minimum price for this item type is {minPrice}.
translation: 此道具類型的最低價格為 {minPrice}。

english: Assets from unverified sources add more risk of malicious behavior or damage
translation: 來自未驗證來源的素材有更高的安全風險

english: Unverified creators have not confirmed their real life identity via an ID or phone
translation: 未驗證創作者未使用證件或手機號碼確認真實身分

english:
• Machine learning blocks more harmful assets
• Content from verified creators now highlighted by default
translation:
• 透過機器學習過濾更多有害素材
• 驗證創作者的內容將在預設情況下被標記

description: Advertisements that users can put in their game
Materials you can apply to stylize assets, e.g. metal, stone, cloth, etc.

english: Cannot convert to package unless package has a single root instance.
translation: 無法轉換成套件，除非套件只有一個根個體。

english: Cannot convert to package while the instance contains packages with unpublished changes.
translation: 個體包含的套件具有未發布的變更，因此無法轉換成套件。

english: Cannot publish a Model package when the PrimaryPart is not archivable.
translation: PrimaryPart 無法封存，因此無法發布模型套件。

english: This object has 3D content but is not a Model, so moving or rotating it will count as modifying the package.
translation: 此物件含有 3D 內容但不是 Model，移動或旋轉物件將視為修改套件。

english: Enables versioning and updates for this asset.
translation: 為此素材啟用版本管理和更新。

english: You can select up to {limit} screenshots
translation: 最多可選擇 {limit} 個截圖

english: Items will be reviewed by moderators before being made visible to other users

english: Distributing this updateable asset to marketplace will give all users use and view access.
translation: 發布此可更新的素材到商城後，所有人都會獲得使用和檢視權限。

english: The Creator Marketplace is testing a new set of features, so you may see a change in search behaviors. Try out more complicated queries like “brick house with smoke coming out the chimney” or “skyscraper with blue glass” and see what you find!
translation: 創作者市集將會測試一系列新功能，您可能會看到搜尋行為的改變。您可以試試看「煙囪冒煙的磚屋」、「藍玻璃高樓大廈」等複雜字串，看看找得到什麼東西！

description: A message displayed to the user after asset upload success informing them that they can configure and put assets on sale in the Creator Dashboard web interface a link to it.

translation: 在你的資產獲得批准後，你可以將其上架販售並在{creatorDashboardLink}上進行設定。

description: Creator Dashboard is the name of the web interface for managing user generated content.

translation: 你可以將此項目上架販售並在{creatorDashboardLink}上進行設定。

Sentence: That person is giving off good vibes

description: This string will be used as a title of a section that contains collection of assets that are deemed highly useful during the creation of a Roblox game.

english: We recommend that you delete the local animation data to improve your experience's loading performance. You will always be able to reimport the animation to continue working on it.
translation: 我們建議您刪除本機動畫資料，以增進您的載入效能體驗。您隨時都能重新匯入動畫以繼續進行工作。

description: a sound other than speech or music made artificially for use in a play, movie, or other broadcast production. Plural
A type of sound effect meant to scare, startle, shock, and even repulse audiences
Sound effects that would come from a fire or other emergency alarm system.
Sound effects that come from a car including motor sounds, door slams, braking etc.
Sound effects of a violent and destructive shattering or blowing apart of something, as is caused by a bomb.
Sound effects from guns including shooting, reloading, cocking, etc
Sound effects from animals including roars, grunts, growls, etc
Sound effects for a user interface including button clicks, error alert sounds, dings, etc
Cartoon sound effects such as slaps, slide whistles, wobbly sounds any anything you would hear in a Bugs Bunny cartoon
Sound effects of industry including motors, hammer strikes, belts turning, etc
Sound effects heard in cities such as distant car horns, people taking, bugs chirping, etc
Mechanical sound effects such as gears grinding, engines running, metal grating, etc
Train sound effects such as passing over rails, crossings, horns, etc
Sounds of magical powers being charged up, used, etc
feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility. Will be used for audio tracks that are full of rage and negative emotion
very relaxed or easygoing. Will be used to describe music that is calm and relaxing
gloomily pessimistic and mysterious. Used to describe audio tracks that are ominous and creepy.
related to middle-of-the-road music and encompasses instrumental recordings of standards, hit songs, non-rock vocals and instrumental covers of selected popular rock songs
causing great enthusiasm and eagerness. Will be used to describe upbeat and energetic audio tracks
feeling or showing pleasure or contentment. Used to describe audio tracks that are positive and have an uplifting tone.
feeling or inspiring optimism about a future event. Will be used to describe songs that are inspirational and convey a sense of a promising future.
feeling or showing sorrow; unhappy. Will be used to describe songs that invoke feelings of sadness
frightening; causing fear. Will be used to describe audio that is good for use in horror games.
arousing excited expectation or uncertainty about what may happen. Will be used to describe music that can be used in high tension games.
Music that primarily features the acoustic instruments rather than electronic instruments
A genre of music that is used to enhance the atmosphere of a place
Describes music that has rhythmic pulsing beats as the main part of the music
Music played around holidays such as Christmas
Short for low fidelity. A genre of music where elements usually regarded as imperfections in the context of a recording or performance are present
World music genre. Styles of music from non-Western countries, including quasi-traditional, intercultural, and traditional music.

translation: 建立組合時發生錯誤。組合說明無效。

translation: 建立組合時發生錯誤。提供的組合類型並不支援。

english: ID Verification is required to upload Avatar Assets. Premium 1000 or Premium 2200 is also required to upload to groups.
translation: 必須進行 ID 驗證才可上傳虛擬人偶素材。還需要 Premium 1000 或 Premium 2200 會員才可上傳至群組。

english: Add a note or select to restore versions.
translation: 新增備註或選擇還原版本。

english: Publish your asset before distributing it for a price
translation: 在將素材定價出售前，請先發佈素材

english: A mismatch in creation fee was found.
translation: 發現作品費用不相符的情況。

english: Insufficient Robux. You can not upload this bundle until you get more Robux.
translation: Robux 不足。在您取得更多 Robux 前，您無法上傳此組合。

english: Error creating bundle. The creation fee is invalid.
translation: 建立組合時發生錯誤。作品費用無效。

english: Allow functions defined in one script to be called by another script
translation: 允許一個指令碼定義的函式被另一個指令碼呼叫

english: Causes the function assigned to OnInvoke to be called. Arguments passed to this function get passed to OnInvoke function.
translation: 呼叫指派到 OnInvoke 的函式。傳到此功能的引數會傳到 OnInvoke 功能。

english: Should be defined as a function. This function is called when Invoke() is called. Number of arguments is variable.
translation: 應定義為函式。呼叫 Invoke() 時會呼叫此函式。引數數量不定。

english: Allow events defined in one script to be subscribed to by another script
translation: 允許一個指令碼定義的事件被另一個指令碼訂閱

english: Used to make the custom event fire (see Event for more info). Arguments can be variable length.
translation: 用來觸發自訂事件（更多資訊請查看 Event）。引數長度不定。

english: This event fires when the Fire() method is used.  Receives the variable length arguments from Fire().
translation: 使用 Fire() 方式時會觸發此事件。 從 Fire() 接收不定長度引數。

english: Used by networking and replication code to transmit touch events - no other purpose
translation: 被網路與複製程式碼用來傳輸觸碰事件 - 無其它用途

english: Prevents joint breakage from explosions, and stops Humanoids from taking damage
translation: 防止爆炸造成接合斷裂，並停止讓 Humanoid 受到傷害

english: Allows players to seamlessly leave a game and join another
translation: 允許玩家順暢地離開一個遊戲並加入另一個遊戲

english: A service which provides collections of instances based on tags assigned to them.
translation: 根據個體的指派標籤提供個體群組的服務。

english: Returns an array of all of the instances in the data model which have the given tag.
translation: 傳回擁有指定標籤的資料模型裡所有個體的陣列。

english: Adds a tag to an instance.
Removes a tag to an instance.
Returns a list of all the collections that an instance belongs to.
translation: 傳回一個個體所屬的所有群組的清單。

english: Returns whether the given instance has the given tag.
translation: 傳回指定個體是否擁有指定標籤的答案。

english: Returns a signal that fires when the given tag either has a new instance with that tag added to the data model or that tag is assigned to an instance within the data model.
translation: 傳回訊號，在包含指定標籤的新個體被加到資料模型，或標籤被指派到資料模型裡的個體時，訊號將會觸發。

english: Returns a signal that fires when the given tag either has an instance with that tag removed from the data model or that tag is removed from an instance within the data model.
translation: 傳回訊號，在包含指定標籤的個體從資料模型裡移除，或標籤從資料模型裡的個體移除時，訊號將會觸發。

english: A service used to set and get information about assets stored on the Roblox website.
translation: 此服務用來設定和取得關於儲存在 Roblox 網站上的素材的資訊。

english: Reverts a given place id to the version number provided. Returns true if successful on reverting, false otherwise.
translation: 將指定地點 ID 還原到提供的版本號碼。還原成功將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Sets the permissions for a placeID to the place accessType. An optional table (inviteList) can be included that will set the accessType for only the player names provided. The table should be set up as an array of usernames (strings).
translation: 在地點 accessType 設定 placeID 的權限。可以使用額外表格（inviteList）只對提供的玩家名稱設定 accessType。表格應設定為使用者名稱（字符串）的排列。

english: Given a placeID, this function will return a table with the permissions of the place. Useful for determining what kind of permissions a particular user may have for a place.
translation: 此函式在有 placeID 時會傳回地點權限資料的表格，可以用來判斷特定使用者對特定地點的權限。

english: Given a placeID, this function will return a table with the version info of the place. An optional arg of page number can be used to page through all revisions (a single page may hold about 50 revisions).
translation: 此函式有 placeID 時將會傳回含有地點版本資訊的表格。另外可以使用頁面引數翻閱所有版本（一個頁面可含有大約 50 個版本）。

english: Given a creationID, this function will return the asset that created the creationID. If no other asset created the given creationID, 0 is returned.
translation: 有指定 creationID 時，此功能會傳回建立該 creationID 的素材。若沒有其它素材建立指定 creation ID，傳回值將會為 0。
正在啟用指令碼 http 請求

english: A service used to insert objects stored on the website into the game.
translation: 此服務用來將儲存在網站上的物件插入遊戲裡。

english: Can be set in non-filtering-enabled places to allow LoadAsset to be used in LocalScripts.
translation: 可以在未啟用防用戶端修改的地點設定，允許在 LocalScripts 裡使用 LoadAsset。

english: Allows free models to be inserted into place.
translation: 允許在地點插入免費模型。

english: Returns a table for the assets stored in the category. A category is an setId from www.roblox.com that links to a set. More info on table format. More info on sets
translation: 傳回表格，裡面包含儲存在該類別的素材。類別是 www.roblox.com 上連結到套件的 setId。更多關於表格格式的資訊。更多關於套件的資訊

english: Inserts the Instance into the workspace.  It is recommended to use Instance.Parent = game.Workspace instead, as this can cause issues currently.
translation: 將 Instance 插入工作區。此動作可能會出現問題，我們推薦改用 Instance.Parent = game.Workspace。

english: Returns a table containing a list of the various setIds that are ROBLOX approved. More info on sets
translation: 傳回表格，裡面包含 ROBLOX 核准的 setID 的清單。 更多關於套件的資訊

english: Returns a table containing a list of the various setIds that correspond to argument 'userId'. More info on sets
translation: 傳回表格，裡面包含與引數 'userId' 對應的 setID 的清單。更多關於套件的資訊

english: Returns a Model containing the Instance that resides at AssetId on the web. This call will also yield the script until the model is returned. Script execution can still continue, however, if you use a coroutine.
translation: 傳回在網路上 AssetID 的個體的模型。模型傳回前也會暫停指令碼。若您使用協程，指令碼將可以繼續執行。

english: Similar to LoadAsset, but instead an AssetVersionId is passed in, which refers to a particular version of the asset which is not neccessarily the latest version.
translation: 與 LoadAsset 相似，但傳入的是 AssetVersionId。AssetVersionId 表示的素材版本不一定是最新版本。

english: Euler angles applied in YXZ order
translation: 以 YXZ 順序套用歐拉角

english: Euler angles applied in YXZ order
translation: 以 YXZ 順序套用歐拉角

english: Primary axis. Corresponds to the LookVector, or the first column in the part-local Attachment CFrame rotation matrix
translation: 主軸。與 LookVector 或半主機 Attachment CFrame 旋轉矩陣第一行對應

english: Secondary axis. Corresponds to the UpVector, or the second column in the part-local Attachment CFrame rotation matrix
translation: 副軸。與 UpVector 或半主機 Attachment CFrame 旋轉矩陣第二行對應

english: Primary axis in world space. Corresponds to the LookVector, or the first column in the world space Attachment CFrame rotation matrix.
translation: 世界空間的主軸。與 LookVector 或半主機 Attachment CFrame 旋轉矩陣第一行對應

english: Secondary axis in world space. Corresponds to the UpVector, or the second column in the world space Attachment CFrame rotation matrix.
translation: 世界空間的副軸。與 UpVector 或半主機 Attachment CFrame 旋轉矩陣第二行對應

english: Toggles whether or not this constraint is enabled. Disabled constraints will not render in game.
translation: 切換此限制式的啟用狀態。停用的限制式不會在遊戲裡成像。

english: The color of the in-game visual.
Toggles the in-game visual associated with this constraint.
translation: 切換與此限制式相關的遊戲內圖像。

english: Read-only boolean, true if the Constraint is active in world.
translation: 唯讀布林值，限制式在世界中啟用時為 true。

english: Enables the angular limit between the axis of Attachment0 and the axis of Attachment1.
translation: 啟用 Attachment0 的軸與 Attachment1 的軸之間的角度限制。

english: Maximum angle between the two main axes. Value in [0, 180].
translation: 兩個主軸之間的最大角度。值的範圍為 [0, 180]。

english: Restitution of the limit, or how elastic it is. Value in [0, 1].
translation: 限制的恢復係數，即它的彈性。值的範圍為 [0, 1]。

english: Enables the angular limits around the main axis of Attachment1.
translation: 啟用環繞 Attachment1 的主軸的角度限制。

english: Upper angular limit around the axis of Attachment1. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 環繞 Attachment1 的軸的角度上限。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Lower angular limit around the axis of Attachment1. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 環繞 Attachment1 的軸的角度下限。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Radius of the in-game visual. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內圖像的半徑。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The length of the rope or the maximum distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 繩索的長度，或兩個接點之間的最大距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Restitution of the rope, or how elastic it is. Value in [0, 1].
translation: 繩索的恢復係數，即它的彈性。值的範圍為 [0, 1]。

english: Current distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 兩個附件之間目前的距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The thickness of the in-game visual (diameter). Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內圖像的厚度（直徑）。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The length of the rod or the distance to be maintained between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 連桿的長度，或兩個接點之間應維持的距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Current distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 兩個附件之間目前的距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The thickness of the in-game visual (diameter). Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內圖像的厚度（直徑）。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Enables limits on the length of the spring.
The stiffness parameter of the spring. Force is scaled based on distance from the free length. The units of this property are force / distance. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧的剛度參數。力量會根據與自由長度的距離變更。此屬性的單位為力量 / 距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The damping parameter of the spring. The force is scaled with respect to relative velocity. The units of this property are force / velocity. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧的阻尼參數。力量會根據相對速度變更。此屬性的單位為力量 / 速度。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The distance (in studs) between the two attachments at which the spring exerts no stiffness force. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧未施剛度力時兩個接點之間的距離，單位為磚塊。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum force that the spring can apply. Useful to prevent instabilities. The units are mass * studs / seconds^2. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧可以施加的最大力度。可以維持彈簧穩定性。單位為質量 * 磚塊 / 秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Maximum spring length, or the maxium distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧的最大長度，或兩個接點之間的最大距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Minimum spring length, or the minimum distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 彈簧的最小長度，或兩個接點之間的最小距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The radius of the in-game spring coil visual. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內線圈圖像的半徑。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The thickness of the spring wire (diameter) in the in-game visual. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內圖像裡彈簧線的的厚度（直徑）。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The number of coils in the in-game visual. Value in [0, 8].
translation: 遊戲內圖像的線圈數。值的範圍為 [0, 8]。

english: Current distance between the two attachments. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 兩個附件之間目前的距離。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Read-only boolean, true if the joint is active in world. Rigid joints may be inactive if they are redundant or form cycles.
translation: 唯讀布林值，接合在世界啟用時將為 true。固定接合多餘或形成循環時可能會遭到停用。

english: If true Part0 and Part1 will not collide, if false the parts will collide.
translation: true 時 Part0 與 Part1 不會碰撞，false 時則兩個零件會碰撞。

english: Type of the rotational actuator: None, Motor, or Servo.
translation: 旋轉驅動器的類型：None、Motor 或 Servo。

english: Enables the angular limits on rotations around the main axis of Attachment0.
translation: 啟用 Attachment0 環繞主軸旋轉的角度限制。

english: Upper limit for the angle from the SecondaryAxis of Attachment0 to the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 從 Attachment0 的 SecondaryAxis 到 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 環繞旋轉軸的角度上限。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Lower limit for the angle from the SecondaryAxis of Attachment0 to the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 從 Attachment0 的 SecondaryAxis 到 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 環繞旋轉軸的角度下限。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Restitution of the two limits, or how elastic they are. Value in [0,1].
translation: 兩個限制的恢復係數，即它們的彈性。值的範圍為 [0, 1]。

english: The target angular velocity of the motor in radians per second around the rotation axis. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達環繞旋轉軸的目標角速度，單位為弧度每秒。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum torque the motor can apply to achieve the target angular velocity. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達達到目標角速度可以施加的最大力矩。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum angular acceleration of the motor in radians per second square. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達的最大角加速度，單位為弧度每秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target angular speed. This value is unsigned as the servo will always move toward its target. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 目標角速度。因伺服永遠會移向目標，此值無符號。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Maximum torque the servo motor can apply. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 伺服馬達可以施加的最大力矩。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target angle for the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 from the SecondaryAxis of Attachment0 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 從 Attachment0 的 SecondaryAxis 環繞旋轉軸的目標角度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Signed angle between the SecondaryAxis of Attchement0 and the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: Attachment0 的 SecondaryAxis 與 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 之間環繞旋轉軸的有符號角度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Radius of the in-game visual. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 遊戲內圖像的半徑。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Type of linear actuator (along the axis of the slider): None, Motor, or Servo.
translation: 線性驅動器器類型（沿滑動條的軸）：None、Motor 或 Servo。

english: Enables the limits on the linear motion along the axis of the slider.
translation: 啟用線運動沿滑動條軸的限制。

english: Lower limit for the position of Attachment1 with respect to Attachment0 along the slider axis. Value in (-inf, inf).
translation: Attachment1 根據 Attachment0 沿滑動條軸的位置下限。值的範圍為 (-inf, inf)。

english: Upper limit for the position of Attachment1 with respect to Attachment0 along the slider axis. Value in (-inf, inf).
translation: Attachment1 根據 Attachment0 沿滑動條軸的位置上限。值的範圍為 (-inf, inf)。

english: Restitution of the two limits, or how elastic they are. Value in [0, 1].
translation: 兩個限制的恢復係數，即它們的彈性。值的範圍為 [0, 1]。

english: The target linear velocity of the motor in studs per second along the slider axis. Value in (-inf, inf).
translation: 馬達沿滑動條軸的目標限速度，單位為磚塊每秒。值的範圍為 (-inf, inf)。

english: The maximum force the motor can apply to achieve the target velocity. Units are mass * studs / seconds^2. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達達到目標速度可以施加的最大力量。單位為質量 * 磚塊 / 秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum acceleration of the motor in studs per second squared. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達的最大加速度，單位為磚塊每秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target speed in studs per second. This value is unsigned as the servo will always move toward its target. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 目標速度，單位為磚塊每秒平方。因伺服永遠會移向目標，此值無符號。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Maximum force the servo motor can apply. Units are mass * studs / seconds^2. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 伺服馬達可以施加的最大力矩。單位為質量 * 磚塊 / 秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target position of Attachment1 with respect to Attachment0 along the slider axis. Value in (-inf, inf).
translation: Attachment1 根據 Attachment0 沿滑動條軸的目標位置。值的範圍為 (-inf, inf)。

english: Current position of Attachment1 with respect to Attachment0 along the slider axis. Value in (-inf, inf).
translation: Attachment1 根據 Attachment0 沿滑動條軸的目前位置。值的範圍為 (-inf, inf)。

english: Size of the in-game visual associated with this constraint. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 與此限制式相關的遊戲內圖像的大小。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Direction of the rotation axis as an angle from the x-axis in the xy-plane of Attachment0. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 旋轉軸與 Attachment0 的 xy 平面上的 x 軸形成的夾角。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Type of angular actuator: None, Motor, or Servo.
translation: 角驅動器的類型：None、Motor 或 Servo。

english: Enables the angular limits around the rotation axis.
translation: 啟用環繞旋轉軸的角度限制。

english: Upper limit for the angle (in degrees) between the reference axis and the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 參考軸與 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 之間環繞旋轉軸的角度上限，單位為度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Lower limit for the angle (in degrees) between the reference axis and the SecondaryAxis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 參考軸與 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 之間環繞旋轉軸的角度下限，單位為度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Restitution of the two limits, or how elastic they are. Value in [0, 1].
translation: 兩個限制的恢復係數，即它們的彈性。值的範圍為 [0, 1]。

english: The target angular velocity of the motor in radians per second around the rotation axis. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達環繞旋轉軸的目標角速度，單位為弧度每秒。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum torque the motor can apply to achieve the target angular velocity. The units are mass * studs^2 / second^2. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達達到目標角速度可以施加的最大力矩。單位為質量 * 磚塊平方 / 秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: The maximum angular acceleration of the motor in radians per second squared. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 馬達的最大角加速度，單位為弧度每秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target angular speed. This value is unsigned as the servo will always move toward its target. In radians per second. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 目標角速度。因伺服永遠會移向目標，此值無符號。單位為弧度每秒。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Maximum torque the servo motor can apply. The units are mass * studs^2 / second^2. Value in [0, inf).
translation: 伺服馬達可以施加的最大力矩。單位為質量 * 磚塊平方 / 秒平方。值的範圍為 [0, inf)。

english: Target angle (in degrees) between the reference axis and the secondary axis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 參考軸與 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 之間環繞旋轉軸的目標角度，單位為度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: Signed angle (in degrees) between the reference axis and the secondary axis of Attachment1 around the rotation axis. Value in [-180, 180].
translation: 參考軸與 Attachment1 的 SecondaryAxis 之間環繞旋轉軸的有符號角度，單位為度。值的範圍為 [-180, 180]。

english: The unit vector direction of the rotation axis in world coordinates.
translation: 旋轉軸的單位向量方向，以世界座標表示。

english: Enable the visibility of the rotation axis.
translation: 啟用時可以看到旋轉軸。

english: Used to receive input from the user. Actually tracks mouse events and keyboard events.
translation: 用來接收使用者輸入。會記錄滑鼠與鍵盤事件。

english: The CoordinateFrame of where the Mouse ray is currently hitting a 3D object in the Workspace.  If the mouse is not over any 3D objects in the Workspace, this property is nil.
translation: Mouse 射線目前擊中工作區裡 3D 物件的位置的 CoordinateFrame。如果滑鼠不在工作區裡 3D 物件上面，此屬性為 nil。

english: The current Texture of the Mouse Icon. Stored as a string, for more information on how to format the string go here
translation: Mouse Icon 目前的 Texture，以字符串儲存。若要了解更多關於字符串格式的資訊，請前往此處

english: The CoordinateFrame of where the Mouse is when the mouse is not clicking.  This CoordinateFrame will be very close to the Camera.CoordinateFrame.
translation: Mouse 在滑鼠沒有點擊動作時的 CoordinateFrame。此 CoordinateFrame 會與 Camera.CoordinateFrame 非常接近。

english: The Part the mouse is currently over. If the mouse is not currently over any object (on the skybox, for example) this property is nil.
translation: 滑鼠目前觸碰的 Part。若滑鼠不在任何物件上面（例如在天空盒上面），此屬性為 nil。

english: A Part or Model that the Mouse will ignore when trying to find the Target, TargetSurface and Hit.
translation: Mouse 嘗試尋找 Target、TargetSurface 及 Hit 時會忽略的 Part 或 Model。

english: The NormalId (Top, Left, Down, etc.) of the face of the part the Mouse is currently over.
translation: 滑鼠觸碰的零件表面的 NormalId。（Top、Left、Down 等等）

english: The Unit Ray from where the mouse is (Origin) to the current Mouse.Target.
translation: 滑鼠位置（Origin）到目前 Mouse.Target 的 Unit Ray。

english: The viewport's (game window) width in pixels.
translation: 視角（遊戲視窗）寬度，以像素為單位。

english: The viewport's (game window) height in pixels.
translation: 視角（遊戲視窗）高度，以像素為單位。

english: The absolute pixel position of the Mouse along the x-axis of the viewport (game window). Values start at 0 on the left hand side of the screen and increase to the right.
translation: Mouse 沿視角（遊戲視窗）X 軸的絕對像素位置。值在螢幕左側從 0 開始，並向右側上升。

english: The absolute pixel position of the Mouse along the y-axis of the viewport (game window). Values start at 0 on the top of the screen and increase to the bottom.
translation: Mouse 沿視角（遊戲視窗）Y 軸的絕對像素位置。值在螢幕上方從 0 開始，並向下方上升。

english: Fired when the first button (usually the left, but could be another) on the mouse is depressed.
translation: 按下滑鼠第一個按鈕時觸發。（通常為左鍵，但有可能為其它鍵）

english: Fired when the first button (usually the left, but could be another) on the mouse is release.
translation: 放開滑鼠第一個按鈕時觸發。（通常為左鍵，但有可能為其它鍵）

english: Fired constantly when the mouse is not firing any other event (i.e. the mouse isn't moving, nor any buttons being pressed or depressed).
translation: 滑鼠未觸發其它事件時（例如滑鼠沒有移動、滑鼠按鍵沒有按下或放開）會持續觸發。

english: Fired when a user presses a key on the keyboard. Argument is a string representation of the key.  If the key has no string representation (such as space), the string passed in is the keycode for that character. Keycodes are currently in ASCII.
translation: 使用者按下鍵盤按鍵時觸發。引數為按鍵的字符串表述。若按鍵沒有字符串表述（例如空白鍵），傳入的字符串則為該字元的按鍵值。按鍵值目前為 ASCII 編碼。

english: Fired when a user releases a key on the keyboard. Argument is a string representation of the key.  If the key has no string representation (such as space), the string passed in is the keycode for that character. Keycodes are currently in ASCII.
translation: 使用者放開鍵盤按鍵時觸發。引數為按鍵的字符串表述。若按鍵沒有字符串表述（例如空白鍵），傳入的字符串則為該字元的按鍵值。按鍵值目前為 ASCII 編碼。

english: Fired when the mouse X or Y member changes.
translation: 滑鼠 X 或 Y 變數變更時觸發。

english: Raises mouse events for parent object
translation: 觸發父物件的滑鼠事件

english: The maximum distance a Player's character can be from the ClickDetector's parent Part that will allow the Player's mouse to fire events on this object.
translation: 在允許 Player 的滑鼠在此物件觸發事件的情況下，Player 的角色與 ClickDetector 的父 Part 的最大距離。

english: Fired when a player clicks on the parent Part of ClickDetector. The argument provided is always of type Player.
translation: 玩家按下 ClickDetector 的父 Part 時將會觸發。提供的引數永遠為 Player 類型。

english: Fired when a player's mouse enters on the parent Part of ClickDetector. The argument provided is always of type Player.
translation: 玩家的滑鼠在 ClickDetector 的父 Part 上時將會觸發。提供的引數永遠為 Player 類型。

english: Fired when a player's mouse leaves the parent Part of ClickDetector. The argument provided is always of type Player.
translation: 玩家的滑鼠離開 ClickDetector 的父 Part 時將會觸發。提供的引數永遠為 Player 類型。

english: Makes the parent part or model object emit smoke
translation: 使父零件或模型物件發出煙霧

english: Makes two attachments emit trail when moving
translation: 使兩個接點在移動時發出軌跡
在兩個接點之間建立接線

english: Specifies the amount of influence lighting has on the particle emmitter. A value of 0 is unlit, 1 is fully lit. Fractional values blend from unlit to lit.
translation: 指定照明對粒子發射器的影響。值為 0 時表示粒子亮度不受照明影響，值為 1 時表示完全受到照明影響，值為分數時表示受到照明局部影響。

english: Makes the parent part or model object fantastic
translation: 使父零件或模型物件發出閃光

english: Creates an Explosion! This can be used as a purely graphical effect, or can be made to damage objects.
translation: 建立 Explosion！Explosion 可以純粹用來當作視覺效果，也可以用來對物件造成傷害。

english: How much force this Explosion exerts on objects within it's BlastRadius. Setting this to 0 creates a purely graphical effect. A larger number will cause Parts to fly away at higher velocities.
translation: 此 Explosion 對 BlastRadius 內的物件施加的力。若值為 0，Explosion 將只有視覺效果。值越大，Part 就會以越快的速度飛走。

english: How big the Explosion is. This is a circle starting from the center of the Explosion's Position, the larger this property the larger the circle of destruction.
translation: Explosion 的大小。此為從 Explosion 的 Position 的圓心開始的圓圈。此屬性越大，破壞範圍也越大。

english: Where the Explosion occurs in absolute world coordinates.
translation: 爆炸發生的位置，以絕對世界座標表示。

english: Defines the behavior of the Explosion. More info
translation: 定義 Explosion 的行為。更多資訊

english: Makes the parent part or model object emit fire
translation: 使父零件或模型物件發出火焰

english: The color of the base of the fire.  See SecondaryColor for more.
translation: 火焰底部的顏色。若要更多資訊，請查看 SecondaryColor。

english: How hot the fire appears to be. The flame moves quicker the higher this value is set.
translation: 火焰的熱度。此值越高，火焰移動的速度會越快。

english: The color the fire interpolates to from Color. The longer a particle exists in the fire, the close to this color it becomes.
translation: 火焰從 Color 變色到的新顏色。粒子在火焰裡的時間越長，它就會越靠近此顏色。

english: How large the fire appears to be.
Equivalent to a seat, except that the character stands up rather than sits down.
translation: 與座位相同，但角色不是坐下，而是站立。

english: Automatically finds and powers hinge joints in an assembly.  Ignores motors.
translation: 自動尋找並啟動組合內的鉸鏈接合。忽略馬達。

english: If someone is carrying this flag, this bool determines whether or not they can drop it and run.
translation: 若有人擁有此旗幟，此布林值將決定他可不可以放下旗幟並離開。

english: The Team this flag is for. Corresponds with the TeamColors in the Teams service.
translation: 此旗幟所屬的 Team。與 Teams 服務的 TeamColors 對應。

english: Describes a texture that is placed on one of the sides of the Part it is parented to.
translation: 形容放在依附 Part 的一面的紋理。

english: Describes the face of the Part the decal will be applied to. More info
translation: 形容將套用貼花的 Part 的一面。更多資訊

english: How much light will appear to reflect off of the decal.
How light will react to the surface of the decal.
translation: 光與貼花表面的反應方式。

english: How visible the decal is.  1 is completely invisible, while 0 is completely opaque
translation: 貼花的可見度。1 為完全隱形，0 為完全不透明

english: Read-only boolean, true if the joint is active in world. Rigid joints may be inactive if they are redundant or form cycles.
translation: 唯讀布林值，接合在世界啟用時將為 true。固定接合多餘或形成循環時可能會遭到停用。

english: Stores a int value in it's Value member. Useful to share int information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 int 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 int 資訊。

english: Stores a Ray value in it's Value member. Useful to share Ray information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 Ray 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 Ray 資訊。

english: Stores an int value in it's Value member.  Value is clamped to be in range of Min and MaxValue. Useful to share int information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 int 值。Value 的範圍鎖定在 MinValue 與 MaxValue 之間。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 int 資訊。

english: The maximum we allow this Value to be set.  If Value is set higher than this, it automatically gets adjusted to MaxValue
translation: 此 Value 允許的最大值。若 Value 大於此值，Value 將會自動調回 MaxValue

english: The minimum we allow this Value to be set.  If Value is set lower than this, it automatically gets adjusted to MinValue
translation: 此 Value 允許的最小值。若 Value 小於此值，Value 將會自動調回 MinValue

english: Stores a double value in it's Value member.  Value is clamped to be in range of Min and MaxValue. Useful to share double information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 double 值。Value 的範圍鎖定在 MinValue 與 MaxValue 之間。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 double 資訊。

english: The maximum we allow this Value to be set.  If Value is set higher than this, it automatically gets adjusted to MaxValue
translation: 此 Value 允許的最大值。若 Value 大於此值，Value 將會自動調回 MaxValue

english: The minimum we allow this Value to be set.  If Value is set lower than this, it automatically gets adjusted to MinValue
translation: 此 Value 允許的最小值。若 Value 小於此值，Value 將會自動調回 MinValue

english: Stores a boolean value in it's Value member. Useful to share boolean information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 boolean 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 boolean 資訊。

english: Renders a thin cylinder than can be adorned with textures that 'flow' from one object to the next. Has basic pathing abilities and attempts to to not intersect anything. More info
translation: 生出細的圓柱，可以放置從一個物件「流向」另一個物件的紋理。擁有基本尋路能力，並會嘗試避免與其它東西交集。更多資訊

english: Controls how the decals are positioned along the wire. More info
translation: 控制貼花在線上的位置。更多資訊。

english: The space between two textures on the wire. Note: studs are relative depending on how far the camera is from the FloorWire.
translation: 線上兩個紋理之間的空間。注意：磚塊數為相對值，會因攝影機與 FloorWire 的距離而改變。

english: The image we use to render the textures that flow from beginning to end of the FloorWire.
translation: 用來生出從 FloorWire 起點流向終點的紋理的圖像。

english: The size in studs of the Texture we use to flow from one object to the next.
translation: 從一個物件流向下一個物件的紋理的大小，單位為磚塊。

english: The rate of travel that the textures flow along the wire.
translation: 紋理沿線上流動的速度。

english: Stores a CFrame value in it's Value member. Useful to share CFrame information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 CFrame 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 CFrame 資訊。

english: Stores a Color3 value in it's Value member. Useful to share Color3 information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 Color3 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 Color3 資訊。

english: Stores a BrickColor value in it's Value member. Useful to share BrickColor information across multiple scripts.
translation: 在 Value 成員變數儲存 BrickColor 值。可以用來在多個指令碼之間分享 BrickColor 資訊。

english: The base class to all Value Objects.
translation: 所有 Value 物件的基礎類別。

english: The sound will play when it is removed from the Workspace. Looped sounds don't play
translation: 從 Workspace 移除時播放的音效，循環音效不會播放

english: An echo audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的回音音效。

english: A Flanging audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的鑲邊音效。

english: A Distortion audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的失真音效。

english: A Pitch Shifting audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的變調音效。

english: A Chorus audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的和聲音效。

english: A Tremolo audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的顫音音效。

english: A Reverb audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的混響音效。

english: An Three-band Equalizer audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的三波段均衡器音效。

english: A Compressor audio effect that can be applied to a Sound or SoundGroup.
translation: 可以套用在 Sound 或 SoundGroup 的壓縮器音效。

english: The ambient sound environment.  May not work when using hardware sound
translation: 自然音效環境。使用硬體音效時可能無法運作

english: The doppler scale is a general scaling factor for how much the pitch varies due to doppler shifting in 3D sound. Doppler is the pitch bending effect when a sound comes towards the listener or moves away from it, much like the effect you hear when a train goes past you with its horn sounding. With dopplerscale you can exaggerate or diminish the effect.
translation: 都卜勒刻度是表示 3D 音效因都卜勒效應造成的音調變更的比例係數。都卜勒效應在聲音接近或遠離聆聽者時發生，例如火車經過您時聲音的變化。使用都卜勒刻度可以加強或減弱此效果。

english: the relative distance factor, compared to 1.0 meters.
translation: 與 1.0 公尺比較的相對距離係數。

english: Setting this value makes the sound drop off faster or slower. The higher the value, the faster volume will attenuate, and conversely the lower the value, the slower it will attenuate. For example a rolloff factor of 1 will simulate the real world, where as a value of 2 will make sounds attenuate 2 times quicker.
translation: 設定此值會加快或減慢音量衰減的速度。值越高音量衰減越快，值越小音量衰減越慢。下降係數為 1 時衰減速度會模擬真實世界，為 2 時衰減會加快 2 倍。

english: When SortOrder is set to Custom, this lua function is used to determine the ordering of elements. Function should take two arguments (each will be an Instance child to compare), and return true if a comes before b, otherwise return false. In other words, use this function the same way you would use a table.sort function. The sorting should be deterministic, otherwise sort will fail and fall back to name order.
translation: SortOrder 設為 Custom 時，此 lua 函式會用來決定元素的順序。函式應取兩個引數（都會是 Instance 子件以做比較），a 在 b 之前時將會傳回 true，否則將會傳回 false。換句話說，此函式的使用方式與 table.sort 函式相同。排序應有確定性，否則排序會失敗並回到名稱排序。

english: Forces a relayout of all elements. Useful when sort is set to Custom.
translation: 強迫所有元素重新布局。排序方式為 Custom 時可以使用。

english: Determines how we decide which element to place next. Can be Name or Custom. If using Custom, make sure SetCustomSortFunction was called with an appropriate sort function.
translation: 決定下一個元素的放置方式。可為 Name 或 Custom。若使用 Custom，請確認 SetCustomSortFunction 被合適的排序函式呼叫。

english: Determines which direction to fill the grid. Can be Horizontal or Vertical.
translation: 決定填滿網格的方向。可為 Horizontal 或 Vertical。

english: Determines how grid is placed within it's parent's container in the x direction. Can be Left, Center, or Right.
translation: 決定網格在父容器內 x 方向的放置方式。可為 Left、Center 或 Right。

english: Determines how grid is placed within it's parent's container in the y direction. Can be Top, Center, or Bottom.
translation: 決定網格在父容器內 y 方向的放置方式。可為Top、Center 或 Bottom。

english: Sets the position of UI elements in a list. You can use a UIListLayout by parenting it to a GuiObject. The UIListLayout will then apply itself to all of its GuiObject siblings.
translation: 設定清單中 UI 元素的位置。將一個 GuiObject 設為一個 UIListLayout 的父件時就可以使用該 UIListLayout，將自己套用在 GuiObject 的所有同級物件。

english: Determines the amount of free space between each element. Can be set either using scale (Percentage of parent's size in the current direction) or offset (a static spacing value, similar to pixel size).
translation: 決定每個元素之間的可用空間大小。可以設為比例（在目前方位父元素大小的百分比）或偏移量（靜態間距值，與像素大小相似）。

english: Sets the position of UI elements inline. You can use a UIInlineLayout by parenting it to a GuiObject. The UIListLayout will then apply itself to all of its GuiObject siblings.
translation: 設定軸線上 UI 元素的位置。將一個 GuiObject 設為一個 UIInlineLayout 的父件時就可以使用該 UIInlineLayout，將自己套用在 GuiObject 的所有同級物件。

english: Sets the position of UI elements in a 2D grid (this can be modified to 1D grid for list layout). This will also set the elements to a particular size, although this can be overridden with particular constraints on elements. You can use a UIGridLayout by parenting it to a GuiObject. The UIGridLayout will then apply itself to all of its GuiObject siblings.
translation: 設定 2D 網格中 UI 元素的位置（可以改為 1D 網格進行清單配置）。這也會將元素設定為特定大小，但可以由元素上特定限制式覆蓋。將一個 GuiObject 設為一個 UIGridLayout 的父件時就可以使用該 UIGridLayout，將自己套用在 GuiObject 的所有同級物件。

english: Denotes what size each element should be. Can be overridden by elements using constraints on individual elements.
translation: 表示每個元素的大小。可以在個別元素上使用限制式，再用該元素覆蓋。

english: How much space between elements there should be.

Determines how many cells over in the FillDirection we go before starting a new row or column. Set to 0 for max cell count.  Will be clamped if this is set higher than the parent container allows room for.
translation: 決定在進入新列或新行之前，可以在 FillDirection 方向使用的儲存格數。值為 0 時將會使用最大儲存格數。若值超過父容器允許的空間，值將會被鎖定。

english: Returns the current size of the grid. If more elements are added, this can increase. If elements are removed this can decrease.
translation: 傳回網格目前的大小。增加元素時大小會上升，移除元素時則會下降。

english: Which corner we start laying the elements out from. Can be TopLeft, TopRight, BottomLeft, BottomRight.
translation: 開始鋪設元素的角落。可為 TopLeft、TopRight、BottomLeft 或 BottomRight。

english: Creates a paged viewing window, like the home screen of a mobile device. You can use a UIPageLayout by parenting it to a GuiObject. The UIPageLayout will then apply itself to all of its GuiObject siblings.
translation: 建立類似行動裝置主頁的分頁檢視視窗。將一個 GuiObject 設為一個 UIPageLayout 的父件時就可以使用該 UIPageLayout，將自己套用在 GuiObject 的所有同級物件。

english: The page that is either currently being displayed or is the target of the current animation.
translation: 目前顯示的頁面，或目前動畫的目標頁面。

english: Whether or not the page layout wraps around at the ends.
translation: 頁面配置是否限制在外框邊緣內。

english: Determines the amount that pages are separated from each other by. Can be set either using scale (Percentage of parent's size in the current direction) or offset (a static spacing value, similar to pixel size).
translation: 決定頁面之間的空間大小。可以設為比例（在目前方位父元素大小的百分比）或偏移量（靜態間距值，與像素大小相似）。

english: Whether or not to animate transitions between pages.
translation: 是否在頁面之間使用轉場動畫。

english: The easing style to use when performing an animation.
translation: 執行動畫時使用的緩動風格。

english: The easing direction to use when performing an animation.
translation: 執行動畫時使用的緩動方向。

english: Sets CurrentPage to the page after the current page and animates to it, or does nothing if there isn't a next page.
translation: 將 CurrentPage 設為目前頁面的下一頁，並以動畫切換到該頁面。沒有下一頁時將不會執行任何動作。

english: Sets CurrentPage to the page after the current page and animates to it, or does nothing if there isn't a next page.
translation: 將 CurrentPage 設為目前頁面的下一頁，並以動畫切換到該頁面。沒有下一頁時將不會執行任何動作。

english: If the instance is in the layout, then it sets CurrentPage to it and animtes to it. If circular layout is set, it will take the shortest path.
translation: 若個體在配置裡，CurrentPage 將會設到該個體，並以動畫切換到該個體。已設定環狀配置時將會採用最短路徑。

english: If the index is >= 0 and less than the size of the layout, acts like JumpTo. If it's out of bounds and circular is set, it will animate the full distance between the in-bounds index of CurrentPage and the new index.
translation: 若索引值大於或等於 0，並小於配置大小，此功能將與 JumpTo 相似。若索引值為範圍外而環狀配置開啟，此功能前進的距離將為 CurrentPage 範圍內索引值與新索引值的距離。

english: Fires when a page comes into view, and is going to be rendered.
translation: 頁面顯示並即將成像時將會觸發。

english: Fires when a page leaves view, and will not be rendered.
translation: 頁面消失並不會成像時將會觸發。

english: Fires when an animation to CurrentPage is completed without being cancelled, and the view stops scrolling.
translation: 切換到 CurrentPage 的動畫未被取消而完成，畫面停止捲動時將會觸發。

english: Provides a layout of rows and columns that are sized based on the cells in them.
translation: 提供行列配置，大小會根據儲存格調整。

english: The amount of padding to insert in between the cells of the table.
translation: 表格儲存格之間的邊距量。

english: Whether the table should expand to fill the available space of its container, row-wise.
translation: 表格是否應展開填滿容器的可用橫列空間。

english: Whether the table should expand to fill the available space of its container, column-wise.
translation: 表格是否應展開填滿容器的可用直行空間。

english: Whether the direct siblings are considered the rows or the columns. The children of the direct siblings are the columns or rows, respectively.
translation: 指明同級 UI 屬性應被視為列或行。該屬性的子屬性將會分別視為行或列。

english: Ensures a GuiObject does not become smaller or larger than the min and max size. If an element with a constraint is under the control of a layout, the constraint takes precedence in determining the element’s size, but not position. You can use a Constraint by parenting it to the element you wish to constrain.
translation: 確保 GuiObject 不會超出大小範圍。若有限制式的元素在配置的控制下，元素的大小會以限制式為優先，但位置不會。若要在元素使用限制式，您可以將元素設為 Contraint 的父件。

english: The smallest size the GuiObject is allowed to be.
The biggest size the GuiObject is allowed to be.

Ensures a GuiObject with text does not allow the font size to become larger or smaller than min and max text sizes. If an element with a constraint is under the control of a layout, the constraint takes precedence in determining the element’s size, but not position. You can use a Constraint by parenting it to the element you wish to constrain.
translation: 確保 GuiObject 裡的文字不會超出文字大小範圍。若有限制式的元素在配置的控制下，元素的大小會以限制式為優先，但位置不會。若要在元素使用限制式，您可以將元素設為 Constraint 的父件。

english: The smallest size the font is allowed to be.
The biggest size the font is allowed to be.

Ensures a GuiObject will always have a particular aspect ratio. If an element with a constraint is under the control of a layout, the constraint takes precedence in determining the element’s size, but not position. You can use a Constraint by parenting it to the element you wish to constrain.
translation: 確保 GuiObject 永遠維持特定長寬比。若有限制式的元素在配置的控制下，元素的大小會以限制式為優先，但位置不會。若要在元素使用限制式，您可以將元素設為 Constraint 的父件。

english: The aspect ratio to maintain. This is the width/height. Only positive numbers allowed.
translation: 要維持的長寬比，為寬度與高度。只允許正數。

english: Describes how the aspect ratio will determine its size. Options are FitWithinMaxSize, ScaleWithParentSize. FitWithinMaxSize will make the element the maximum size it can be within the current possible AbsoluteSize of the element while maintaining the AspectRatio. ScaleWithParentSize will make the element the closest to the parent element’s maximum size while maintaining aspect ratio.
translation: 形容長寬比如何決定大小。選項有 FitWithinMaxSize 與 ScaleWithParentSize。FitWithinMaxSize 會在維持 AspectRatio 的情況下，將元素設為其目前 AbsoluteSize 所允許的最大大小。ScaleWithParentSize 會在維持長寬比的情況下，將元素設為與父元素最大大小最接近的大小。

english: Describes which axis to use when determining the new size of the element, while keeping respect to the aspect ratio.
translation: 在維持長寬比的情況下，形容決定元素的新大小時使用的軸。

english: Uniformly scales a GUI object and all its children.
translation: 統一縮放 GUI 物件與其所有子件。

english: The padding to apply on the left side relative to the parent's normal size.
translation: 左側的邊距量，依父件正常大小而變。

english: The padding to apply on the right side relative to the parent's normal size.
translation: 右側的邊距量，依父件正常大小而變。

english: The padding to apply on the top side relative to the parent's normal size.
translation: 上方的邊距量，依父件正常大小而變。

english: The padding to apply on the bottom side relative to the parent's normal size.
translation: 下方的邊距量，依父件正常大小而變。

english: The current state of how the tween is animating. Possible values are Begin, Playing, Paused, Completed and Cancelled. This property is modified by using functions such as Tween:Play(), Tween:Pause(), and Tween:Cancel(). Read-only.
translation: 補間動畫目前的狀態。可能的值有 Begin、Playing、Paused、Completed 及 Cancelled。此屬性可以使用 Tween:Play()、Tween:Pause()、Tween:Cancel() 等函式修改。唯讀。

english: Starts or resumes (if Tween.PlaybackState is Paused) the tween animation. If current PlaybackState is Cancelled, this property will reset the tween to the beginning properties and play the animations from the beginning.
translation: 開始補間動畫，或在 Tween.PlaybackState 為 Paused 時繼續播放補間動畫。若目前 PlaybackState 為 Cancelled，此屬性將使補間動畫重置到初始屬性，並從起始點播放動畫。

english: Temporarily stops the tween animation. Animation can be resumed by calling Play().
translation: 暫時停止補間動畫。呼叫 Play() 可以繼續播放動畫。

english: Stops the tween animation. Animation can be restarted by calling Play(). Animation will start from the beginning values.
translation: 停止補間動畫。呼叫 Play() 可以重新開始動畫。動畫會從初始值開始。

english: Fires when the tween either reaches PlaybackState Completed or Cancelled. PlaybackState of one of these types is passed as the first arg to the function listening to this event.
translation: 補間動畫的 PlaybackState 到達 Completed 或 Cancelled 時將會觸發。其中一個類型的 PlaybackState 將會第一個船到聽取此事件的函式的引數。

english: An object linked to an instance that animates properties on the instance over a specified period of time. Useful for easily moving UI objects around, rotating objects, etc. without having to write a lot of code. To create a new tween, please use TweenService:Create.
translation: 連結到個體的物件，在指定的時間內會在個體上的屬性值行動畫。可以不需要編寫大量程式碼而輕易地移動 UI 物件、旋轉物件等等。若要建立新的補間動畫，請使用 TweenService:Create。

english: The object this tween is operating on. Read-only.
translation: 補間動畫的目標對象。唯讀。

english: Specifies how the tween animates. Read-only.
translation: 補間動畫的執行方式。唯讀。

english: Service responsible for creating tweens on instances.
translation: 負責在個體上建立補間動畫的服務。

english: Creates a Tween object bound to a particular Instance. The first arg is the Instance to tween. The second arg is a TweenInfo struct, which specifies how a tween should behave. The third arg is a table, which should specify the properties to tween as keys, with the end value specified as values to the keys.
translation: 建立綁定到特定 Instance 的 Tween 物件。第一個引數是要建立補間動畫的 Instance。第二個引數是指定補間動畫行為的 TweenInfo 結構體。第三個引數是表格，應指定要製成關鍵補間動畫點的屬性，其尾值為關鍵點的值。

english: Transforms a linear alpha to a given EasingStyle and EasingDirection.
