translation: 將線性 Alpha 值轉換成指定的 EasingStyle 和 EasingDirection。

english: Will stop/begin certain core gui elements being rendered. See CoreGuiType for core guis that can be modified.
translation: 會停止 / 開始部分核心 GUI 元素的丞相。若要了解可以修改的核心 GUI，請參考 CoreGuiType。

english: Returns a boolean describing whether a CoreGuiType is currently being rendered.
translation: 傳回表示一個 CoreGuiType 是否正在成像的布林值。

english: The GuiService is a special service, which currently allows developers to control what GuiObject is currently being selected by the Gamepad Gui navigator, and allows clients to check if Roblox's main menu is currently open. This service has a lot of hidden members, which are mainly used internally by Roblox's CoreScripts.
translation: GuiService 是特殊服務，允許開發者控制 Gamepad Gui 導覽器目前選擇的 GuiObject，並允許用戶端檢查 Roblox 主選單目前是否開啟。此服務有許多 Roblox CoreScripts 內部使用的成員變數。

english: Returns a Tuple containing two Vector2 values representing the offset of user GUIs in pixels from the top right corner of the screen and the bottom right corner of the screen respectively.
translation: 傳回包含兩個 Vector2 值的 Tuple，分別代表使用者 GUI 與螢幕右上角的偏移量、使用者 GUI 與螢幕右下角的偏移量。單位為像素。

english: A service used to bind input to various lua functions.
translation: 用來將輸入綁定到不同 Lua 函式的服務。

english: Binds 'functionToBind' to fire when any 'inputTypes' happen. InputTypes can be variable in number and type. Types can be Enum.KeyCode, single character strings corresponding to keys, or Enum.UserInputType. 'actionName' is a key used by many other ContextActionService functions to query state. 'createTouchButton' if true will create a button on screen on touch devices.  This button will fire 'functionToBind' with three arguments: first argument is the actionName, second argument is the UserInputState of the input, and the third is the InputObject that fired this function. If 'functionToBind' yields or returns nil or Enum.ContextActionResult.Sink, the input will be sunk. If it returns Enum.ContextActionResult.Pass, the next bound action in the stack will be invoked.
translation: 綁定 'funtionToBind'，使其在任何 'InputType' 發生時觸發。InputType 的數字和類型可為變數。類型可以為 Enum.KeyCode、對應案件的單一字元或 Enum.UserInputType。'actionName' 是多個 ContextActionService 函數用來查詢狀態的案件。若 'createTouchButton' 為 true，觸控式裝置上將會出現一個按鈕。此按鈕將會在三個引數成立時觸發 'functionToBind'，三個引數分別為 actionName、輸入的 UserInputState 及觸發此函式的 InputObject。若 'functionToBind' 暫停，若傳回的值為 nil 或 Enum.ContextActionResult.Sink，輸入將會被掩埋。若傳回的值為 Enum.ContextActionResult.Pass，堆疊裡下一個綁定動作將會執行。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, then 'title' is set as the title of the touch button. Does nothing if a touch button was not created. No guarantees are made whether title will be set when button is manipulated.
translation: 若 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作，'title' 將會設為觸控按鈕的標題。未建立觸控按鈕時將不會有任何動作。按鈕被操作時不保證標題會被設置。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, then 'description' is set as the description of the bound action. This description will appear for users in a listing of current actions availables.
translation: 若 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作，'description' 將會設為綁定動作的說明。使用者會在目前可執行動作的清單上看到此說明。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, then 'image' is set as the image of the touch button. Does nothing if a touch button was not created. No guarantees are made whether image will be set when button is manipulated.
translation: 若 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作，'image' 將會設為觸控按鈕的圖像。未建立觸控按鈕時將不會有任何動作。按鈕被操作時不保證圖像會被設置。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, then 'position' is set as the position of the touch button. Does nothing if a touch button was not created. No guarantees are made whether position will be set when button is manipulated.
translation: 若 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作，'position' 將會設為觸控按鈕的未置。未建立觸控按鈕時將不會有任何動作。按鈕被操作時不保證位置會被設置。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, removes function from being called by all input that it was bound by (if function was also bound by a different action name as well, those bound input are still active). Will also remove any touch button created (if button was manipulated manually there is no guarantee it will be cleaned up).
translation: 若 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作，函式將不會被任何將其綁定的輸入呼叫。（若函數也被其它動作名稱綁定，其綁定輸入依然正常運作。）也會移除任何建立的觸控按鈕。（按鈕被手動操作時不保證按鈕會被清理。）

english: Removes all functions bound. No actionNames will remain. All touch buttons will be removed. If button was manipulated manually there is no guarantee it will be cleaned up.
translation: 移除所有綁定的函式。不會保留任何 actionName。所有觸控按鈕將被移除。按鈕被手動操作時不保證按鈕會被清理。

english: Returns a table with info regarding the function bound with 'actionName'. Table has the keys 'title' (current title that was set with SetTitle) 'image' (image set with SetImage) 'description' (description set with SetDescription) 'inputTypes' (tuple containing all input bound for this 'actionName') 'createTouchButton' (whether or not we created a touch button for this 'actionName').
translation: 傳回表格，表格包含與 'actionName' 綁定的函式的相關資訊。表格包含以下鍵值：'title'（目前透過 SetTitle 設置的標題）、'image'（透過 SetImage 設置的圖像）、'description'（透過 SetDescription 設置的說明）、'inputTypes'（包含所有綁定此 'actionName' 的輸入的元組）及 'createTouchButton'（是否為此 'actionName' 建立觸控按鈕）。

english: Returns a table with all bound action info. Each entry is a key with 'actionName' and value being the same table you would get from ContextActionService:GetBoundActionInfo('actionName').
translation: 傳回包含所有綁定動作資訊的表格。每一個條目都是擁有 'actionName' 的鍵值，值與從 ContextActionService:GetBoundActionInfo('actionName') 取得的值表格相同。

english: If 'actionName' key contains a bound action, then this will return the touch button (if was created). Returns nil if a touch button was not created. No guarantees are made whether button will be retrievable when button is manipulated.
translation: 'actionName' 鍵值包含綁定動作時將會傳回觸控按鈕（若已建立）。未建立觸控按鈕時將會傳回 nil。按鈕被操作時不保證標題會被設置。

english: A service used to query and award points for Roblox users using the universal point system.
translation: 用來為使用通用點數系統的 Roblox 使用者查詢與給予點數的服務。

english: Fired when points are successfully awarded 'userId'. Also returns the updated balance of points for usedId in universe via 'userBalanceInUniverse', total points via 'userTotalBalance', and the amount points that were awarded via 'pointsAwarded'. This event fires on the server and also all clients in the game that awarded the points.
translation: 積分成功給予 'userId' 時將會觸發，也會透過 'userBalanceInUniverse' 傳回 userId 在站上的最新點數餘額、'userTotalBalance' 傳回點數總額及 'pointsAwarded' 傳回給予的點數。此事件會在伺服器與所有給予點數的遊戲用戶端觸發。

english: Will attempt to award the 'amount' points to 'userId', returns 'userId' awarded to, the number of points awarded, the new point total the user has in the game, and the total number of points the user now has. Will also fire PointsService.PointsAwarded. Works with server scripts ONLY.
translation: 將會嘗試給予 'userId' 'amount' 點數，並傳回給予點數的目標 'userId'、給予的點數額、使用者在遊戲裡新的點數總額及使用者目前的點數總額。也會觸發 PointsService.PointsAwarded。只適用於伺服器指令碼。

english: Returns the overall balance of points that player with userId has (the sum of all points across all games). Works with server scripts ONLY.
translation: 傳回對應該 userId 的玩家的整體點數餘額（所有遊戲獲得的積分的總額）。只適用於伺服器指令碼。

english: Returns the balance of points that player with userId has in the current game (all placeID points combined within the game). Works with server scripts ONLY.
translation: 傳回對應該 userId 的玩家在目前遊戲裡的點數餘額（所有遊戲裡的 placeID 積分的總額）。只適用於伺服器指令碼。

english: Returns the number of points the current universe can award to players. Works with server scripts ONLY.
translation: 傳回目前宇宙可以給予玩家的點數總額。只適用於伺服器指令碼。

english: A database of strings used in the game and their translations.
translation: 遊戲內字符串與經翻譯的字符串的資料庫。

english: Gets the system's preferred language (A Language enum).
translation: 取得系統的慣用語言（Language 列舉）。

english: Will prompt 'player' to purchase the item associated with 'assetId'.  'equipIfPurchased' is an optional argument that will give the item to the player immediately if they buy it (only applies to gear).  'currencyType' is also optional and will attempt to prompt the user with a specified currency if the product can be purchased with this currency, otherwise we use the default currency of the product.
translation: 將會提示 'player' 購買與 'assetId' 相關的道具。'equipIfPurchased' 為可選引數，使玩家購買道具時直接將其給予玩家（只適用於裝備）。'currencyType' 亦為可選引數，產品可以以指定貨幣購買時將會提示玩家使用該貨幣，否則將使用產品的預設貨幣。

english: Takes one argument "assetId" which should be a number of an asset on www.roblox.com.  Returns a table containing the product information (if this process fails, returns an empty table).
translation: 取得引數 "assetId"，應為 www.roblox.com 上素材的編號，並傳回包含產品資訊的表格。（此程序失敗時將會傳回空白表格。）

english: Checks to see if 'Player' owns the product associated with 'assetId'. Returns true if the player owns it, false otherwise. This call will produce a warning if called on a guest player.
translation: 檢查 'Player' 是否擁有 'assetId' 相關的產品。擁有時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。呼叫訪客玩家時會生出警告。

english:
Callback that is executed for pending Developer Product receipts.

If this function does not return Enum.ProductPurchaseDecision.PurchaseGranted, then you will not be granted the money for the purchase!

The callback will be invoked with a table, containing the following informational fields:

  • PlayerId: int64 - the id of the player making the purchase.
  • PlaceIdWherePurchased: int64: - the specific place where the purchase was made.
  • PurchaseId: string - a unique identifier for the purchase, should be used to prevent granting an item multiple times for one purchase.
  • ProductId: int64 - the id of the purchased product.
  • CurrencyType: CurrencyType - the type of currency used (Tix, Robux).
  • CurrencySpent: int - the amount of currency spent on the product for this purchase.
translation:
為待處理的開發者產品收據執行的回調函式。

若此函式未傳回 Enum.ProductPurchaseDecision.PurchaseGranted，您將不會收到買賣所得的金錢！

回調函式將會使用表格執行，表格裡包含以下欄位：

  • PlayerId：int64 - 執行購買的玩家的 ID。
  • PlaceIdWherePurchased：int64 - 進行購買的地點。
  • PurchaseId：string - 用來防止單筆購買重複給予道具的唯一識別字符串。ProductId：int64 - 購買的產品的 ID。
  • CurrencyType: CurrencyType - 使用的貨幣種類（Tix、Robux）。CurrencySpent：int - 購買產品所花的貨幣金額。

english: Fired when a 'player' dismisses a purchase dialog for 'assetId'.  If the player purchased the item 'isPurchased' will be true, otherwise it will be false. This call will produce a warning if called on a guest player.
translation: 'player' 關閉 'assetId' 的購買對話框時將會觸發。玩家已購買道具時 'isPurchased' 為 true，否則為 false。呼叫訪客玩家時會生出警告。

english: Returns true if the local device accepts touch input, false otherwise.
translation: 本機裝置接受觸控輸入時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Returns true if the local device accepts keyboard input, false otherwise.
translation: 本機裝置接受鍵盤輸入時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Returns true if the local device accepts mouse input, false otherwise.
translation: 本機裝置接受滑鼠輸入時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Returns true if the local device has an accelerometer, false otherwise.
translation: 本機裝置有加速規時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Returns true if the local device has an gyroscope, false otherwise.
translation: 本機裝置有陀螺儀時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。

english: Fired when a user taps their finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the tap gesture. This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上輕點螢幕時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表明所有與觸碰動作相關的手指的位置。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user pinches their fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the pinch gesture. 'scale' is a float that indicates the difference from the beginning of the pinch gesture. 'velocity' is a float indicating how quickly the pinch gesture is happening. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上捏合手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與捏合動作相關的手指的位置。'scale' 是一個浮點數，表示與捏合動作開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個浮點數，表示捏合動作進行的速度。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user swipes their fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'swipeDirection' is an Enum.SwipeDirection, indicating the direction the user swiped. 'numberOfTouches' is an int that indicates how many touches were involved with the gesture.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上捏合手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與捏合動作相關的手指的位置。'scale' 是一個浮點數，表示與捏合動作開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個浮點數，表示捏合動作進行的速度。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user holds at least one finger for a short amount of time on the same screen position on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上將至少一隻手指短時間內壓在同一個螢幕位置時將會觸發。'touchPositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user rotates two fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'rotation' is a float indicating how much the rotation has gone from the start of the gesture. 'velocity' is a float that indicates how quickly the gesture is being performed. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上旋轉兩隻手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'rotation' 是一個浮點數，表示旋轉與動作開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個浮點數，表示動作進行的速度。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user drags at least one finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'totalTranslation' is a Vector2, indicating how far the pan gesture has gone from its starting point. 'velocity' is a Vector2 that indicates how quickly the gesture is being performed in each dimension. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上至少拖曳一隻手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'totalTranslation' 是一個 Vector 2，表示平移動作與開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個 Vector2，表示動作在每一個次元進行的速度。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user places their finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touch' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上放置手指時將會觸發。'touch' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user moves their finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touch' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上移動手指時將會觸發。'touch' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user moves their finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touch' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上移動手指時將會觸發。'touch' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user begins interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse button down, touch begin, keyboard button down, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置開始互動時（按下滑鼠鍵、開始觸控、按下鍵盤鍵等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user changes interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse move, touch move, mouse wheel, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置變更互動時（移動滑鼠、移動手指、移動滾輪等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user stops interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse button up, touch end, keyboard button up, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置停止互動時（放開滑鼠、停止觸控、放開鍵盤鍵等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user clicks/taps on a textbox to begin text entry. Argument is the textbox that was put in focus. This also fires if a textbox forces focus on the user. This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者按下或觸控文字方塊開始輸入文字時將會觸發。引數為設為焦點的文字方塊。文字方塊強迫使用者設其為焦點時也會觸發。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user stops text entry into a textbox (usually by pressing return or clicking/tapping somewhere else on the screen). Argument is the textbox that was taken out of focus. This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者停止在文字方塊裡輸入文字時將會觸發（例：使用者按下返回、使用者按下或點選螢幕其它地方）。引數為失去焦點的文字方塊。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user moves a device that has an accelerometer. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Accelerometer, and position that shows the g force in each local device axis. This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者移動配有加速規的裝置時將會觸發。此事件只會在本機觸發。觸發會透過 InputObject，type 為 Enum.Input.Type.Accelerometer，position 表示本機裝置每一個軸的 G 力。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when the force of gravity changes on a device that has an accelerometer. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Accelerometer, and position that shows the g force in each local device axis. This event only fires locally.
translation: 重力在配有加速規的裝置上變更時將會觸發。觸發會透過 InputObject，type 為 Enum.Input.Type.Accelerometer，position 表示本機裝置每一個軸的 G 力。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user rotates a device that has an gyroscope. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Gyroscope, and position that shows total rotation in each local device axis.  The delta property describes the amount of rotation that last happened. A second argument of Vector4 is the device's current quaternion rotation in reference to it's default reference frame. This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者旋轉含有陀螺儀的裝置時觸發。觸發此函式的 InputObject 的 type 為 Enum.InputType.Gyroscope，position 會顯示每一個本機裝置的軸的總旋轉量。Delta 屬性描述最後進行的旋轉量。第二個 Vector4 引數是以預設參考影格為基準的目前四元數旋轉值。此事件只會在本機上觸發。

english: Returns an InputObject that describes the device's current acceleration. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Accelerometer, and position that shows the g force in each local device axis.  The delta property describes the amount of rotation that last happened. This event only fires locally.
translation: 傳回描述裝置目前加速度的 InputObject。此事件只會在本機觸發。觸發此函式的 InputObject 的 type 為 Enum.Input.Type.Accelerometer，position 會顯示本機裝置每一個軸的 G 力。Delta 屬性描述最後進行的旋轉量。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Returns an InputObject that describes the device's current gravity vector. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Accelerometer, and position that shows the g force in each local device axis. The delta property describes the amount of rotation that last happened. This event only fires locally.
translation: 傳回描述裝置目前重力向量的 InputObject。此事件只會在本機觸發。觸發此函式的 InputObject 的 type 為 Enum.Input.Type.Accelerometer，position 會顯示本機裝置每一個軸的 G 力。Delta 屬性描述最後進行的旋轉量。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Returns an InputObject and a Vector4 that describes the device's current rotation vector. This is fired with an InputObject, which has type Enum.InputType.Gyroscope, and position that shows total rotation in each local device axis. The delta property describes the amount of rotation that last happened. The Vector4 is the device's current quaternion rotation in reference to it's default reference frame. This event only fires locally.
translation: 傳回 InputObject 與描述裝置目前旋轉向量的 Vector4。觸發此函式的 InputObject 的 type 為 Enum.InputType.Gyroscope，position 會顯示每一個本機裝置的軸的總旋轉量。Delta 屬性描述最後進行的旋轉量。Vector4 是以預設參考影格為基準的目前四元數旋轉值。此事件只會在本機上觸發。

english: Attempts to move the Humanoid and it's associated character to 'part'. 'location' is used as an offset from part's origin.
translation: 嘗試將 Humanoid 與其相關角色移動到 'part'。'location' 用為 part 原點的的偏移量。

english: Decreases health by the amount.  Use this instead of changing health directly to make sure weapons are filtered for things such as ForceField(s).
translation: 將生命值降低指定值。為了確認武器會經過 ForceField(s) 等篩選，請勿直接變更生命值，而改用此方式。

english: Takes any active gear/tools that the Humanoid is using and puts them into the backpack.  This function only works on Humanoids with a corresponding Player.
translation: 將 Humanoid 正在使用的裝備與工具放到背包裡。此函式只適用於擁有對應 Player 的 Humanoid。

english: Takes a specified tool and equips it to the Humanoid's Character.  Tool argument should be of type 'Tool'.
translation: 取指定工具並裝備在 Humanoid 的 Character 上。工具引數的類型應為 'Tool'。

english: Replaces the desired bodypart on the Humanoid's Character using a specified Enum.BodyPartR15 and BasePart. Returns a success boolean.
translation: 以指定 Enum.BodyPartR15 與 BasePart 取代 Humanoid 的 Character 的某一身體部位。傳回成功布林值。

english: Returns a Enum.BodyPartR15 given a body part in the Humanoid's Character.
translation: 傳回 Humanoid 的 Character 上的身體部位的 Enum.BodyPartR15。

english: Sets how to display other humanoid names to this humanoid's player. More info
translation: 設定如何向此人形的玩家顯示其他人形的名稱。更多資訊

english: How many hit points the Humanoid has.  When this number reaches 0 or goes below 0, the Humanoid's character falls apart and will respawn.
translation: Humanoid 的生命值。當此值為 0 以下時，Humanoid 的腳色會分裂並重生。

english: The maximum number of hit points a Humanoid's health can reach.  If the Humanoid's health is set over this amount, the health gets set to this value.
translation: Humanoid 的生命值可達的上限。若 Humanoid 的生命值設定為此值以上，生命值會被設定為此值。

english: The location that the Humanoid is trying to walk to.
translation: Humanoid 正在嘗試走向的位置。

english: Humanoid.RootPart will be the preferred way of getting a character's humanoid root part.
translation: Humanoid.RootPart 為取得角色的人形根零件的主要方式。

english: In R6 this property get the player's left leg. In R15 this gets nothing.
translation: 此屬性在 R6 會取得玩家的左腳。在 R15 無作用。

english: In R6 this property get the player's right leg. In R15 this gets nothing.
translation: 此屬性在 R6 會取得玩家的右腳。在 R15 無作用。

english: An emum that selects the collision type for R15 and Rthro characters. InnerBox is classic style collisions for all characters, OuterBox is dynamically sized collisions based on Mesh size.
translation: 選擇 R15 與 Rthro 角色碰撞類型的列舉。InnerBox 為套用在所有角色的正常碰撞方式，OuterBox 為根據 Mesh 大小使碰撞改變的動態碰撞方式。

english: Determines whether or not an Instance can be saved when the game closes/attempts to save the game. Note: this only applies to games that use Data Persistence, or SavePlaceAsync.
translation: 決定遊戲關閉或嘗試儲存時 Instance 是否可以儲存。注意：僅適用於使用資料永存或 SavePlaceAsync 的遊戲。

english: The string name of this Instance's most derived class.
translation: 此 Instance 最底層衍生類別的字符串名稱。

english: The Instance that is directly above this Instance in the tree.
translation: 個體樹上在此 Instance 之上的 Instance。

english: This function is for internal testing. Don't use in production code
translation: 此函式為內部測試用。請勿在生產程式碼裡使用

english: Returns a copy of this Object and all its children. The copy's Parent is nil
translation: 傳回此物件及其所有子物件的複製品。複製物件的 Parent 為 nil

english: Returns a boolean if this Instance is of type 'className' or a is a subclass of type 'className'. If 'className' is not a valid class type in ROBLOX, this function will always return false. More info
translation: 此 Instance 是 'className' 類型或是 'className' 類型的子類別時將傳回布林值。若 'className' 非 Roblox 裡的有效類別類型，此函數將永遠傳回 false。更多資訊

english: Returns the first child of this Instance that matches the first argument 'name'.  The second argument 'recursive' is an optional boolean (defaults to false) that will force the call to traverse down thru all of this Instance's descendants until it finds an object with a name that matches the 'name' argument.  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡符合第一個引數 'name' 的子個體。第二個引數 'recursive' 為可選布林值（預設為 false），將強迫呼叫經過此 Instance 所有後代個體，直到找到名稱與引數 'className' 相符的物件為止。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns the first child of this Instance that with a ClassName equal to 'className'.  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡 ClassName 與 'className' 相同的第一個子類別。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns the first child of this Instance that :IsA(className).  The second argument 'recursive' is an optional boolean (defaults to false) that will force the call to traverse down thru all of this Instance's descendants until it finds an object with a name that matches the 'className' argument.  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡符合 :IsA(className) 的第一個子類別。第二個引數 'recursive' 為可選布林值（預設為 false），將強迫呼叫經過此 Instance 所有後代類別，直到找到名稱與引數 'className' 相配的物件為止。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns the first ancestor of this Instance that matches the first argument 'name'.  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡與第一個引數 'name' 相同的第一個祖先。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns the first ancestor of this Instance with a ClassName equal to 'className'.  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡 ClassName 與 'className' 相同的第一個祖先。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns the first ancestor of this Instance that :IsA(className).  The function will return nil if no Instance is found.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 裡為 :IsA(className) 的第一個祖先。找不到 Instance 時此函式將傳回 nil。

english: Returns a string that shows the path from the root node (DataModel) to this Instance.  This string does not include the root node (DataModel).
translation: 傳回 顯示根節點（DataModel）到此個體的路徑的字符串。此字符串不包括根節點（DataModel）。

english: Returns a read-only table of this Object's children
translation: 傳回此 Object 的子物件的唯讀表格

english: Returns an array containing all of the descendants of the instance. Returns in preorder traversal, or in other words, where the parents come before their children, depth first.
translation: 傳回包含個體所有後代的矩陣。傳回順序為前序遍歷，也就是深度優先，先傳回父個體再傳回其子個體。

english: Deprecated. Use ClearAllChildren() to get rid of all child objects, or Destroy() to invalidate this object and its descendants
translation: 已棄用。請使用 ClearAllChildren() 移除所有子物件，或使用 Destroy() 使此物件及其後代無效

english: Removes all children (but not this object) from the workspace.
translation: 從工作區移除所有子件（不會移除此物件）。

english: Removes object and all of its children from the workspace. Disconnects object and all children from open connections. Object and children may not be usable after calling Destroy.
translation: 從工作區移除該物件及其所有子物件。這些物件的開放連接將會斷開。這些物件在 Destroy 後將無法使用。

english: Fired when any of this object's ancestors change.  First argument 'child' is the object whose parent changed.  Second argument 'parent' is the first argument's new parent.
translation: 此物件的任一組先變更時將會觸發。第一個引數 'child' 是父件變更的物件。第二個引數 'parent' 是第一個引數新的父引數。

english: Fired after an Instance is parented to this object, or any of this object's descendants.  The 'descendant' argument is the Instance that is being added.
translation: 當 Instance 依附在此物件或其任一後代時將會觸發。增加的 Instance 為引數 'descendant'。

english: Fired after an Instance is unparented from this object, or any of this object's descendants.  The 'descendant' argument is the Instance that is being added.
translation: 當 Instance 脫離此物件或其任一後代時將會觸發。增加的 Instance 為引數 'descendant'。

english: Fired after a property changes value.  The property argument is the name of the property
translation: 屬性的質變更時將會觸發。屬性引數為該屬性的名稱

english: Attempts to maintain a fixed orientation of its parent Part
translation: 嘗試維持父 Part 的固定方向

english: The maximum torque that will be exerted on the Part
translation: 將會施加在零件上的最大力矩

english: The dampening factor applied to this force
translation: 施加在此例的阻尼係數

english: The power continually applied to this force
translation: 持續施加在此力的力量

english: The cframe that this force is trying to orient its parent Part to.  Note: this force only uses the rotation of the cframe, not the position.
translation: 此力要使其父零件導向到的 CFrame。注意：此力只使用 CFrame 的旋轉，不使用其位置。

english: The maximum force that will be exerted on the Part
translation: 將會施加在零件上的最大力

english: The dampening factor applied to this force
translation: 施加在此例的阻尼係數

english: The power factor continually applied to this force
translation: 持續施加在此力的力量係數

english: The Vector3 that this force is trying to position its parent Part to.
translation: 此力要使其父零件定位到的 Vector3。

english: A propulsion system that mimics a rocket
The maximum force that will be exerted on the Part in each axis
translation: 在每一個軸上將會施加在零件上的最大力

english: The amount of power we add to the system.  The higher the power, the quicker the force will achieve its goal.
translation: 加到系統裡的力量。力量越高，力會越快達到目標。

english: The velocity this system tries to achieve.  How quickly the system reaches this velocity (if ever) is defined by P.
translation: 此系統嘗試到達的速度。系統達到此速度的快慢（若可以達到此速度）由 P 定義。

english: When parented to a physical part, BodyForce will continually exert a force upon its parent object.
translation: 依附在實體零件時，BodyForce 將會持續對其父件施力。

english: The power continually applied to this force
translation: 持續施加在此力的力量

english: The Vector3 location of where to apply the force to.
translation: 要將力量施加到的 Vector3 位置。

english: This Service-level object is the container for all Team objects in a level. A map that supports team games must have a Teams service. More info
translation: 此 Service 層級物件為一個層級裡所有 Team 物件的容器。支援團隊遊戲的地圖必須擁有 Teams 服務。更多資訊

english: Returns a read-only table of players which are on this team.
translation: 傳回在此隊伍的玩家的唯讀表格。

english: The Team class is used to represent a faction in a team game. The only valid location for a Team object is under the Teams service. More info
translation: Team 類別用來代表團對遊戲裡的隊伍。Teams 服務底下為 Team 物件的唯一有效位置。更多資訊

english: The name of the player who is currently editing the script in Team Create.
translation: 目前正在團隊創作裡編輯指令碼的玩家名稱。

english: This property is under development. Do not use
translation: 此屬性正在開發中。請勿使用

english: A script that runs on clients, NOT servers.  LocalScripts can only run when parented under one of the following:1) A player's Backpack.2) A player's Character model.3) A player's PlayerGui.4) A player's PlayerScripts.5) The ReplicatedFirst service.
translation: 不在伺服器上運作，但在用戶端上運作的指令碼。LocalScripts 只可以在依附在下列其中一項時運作：1) 玩家的 Backpack。2) 玩家的 Character 模型。 3) 玩家的 PlayerGui。4) 玩家的 PlayerScripts。5) ReplicatedFirst 服務。

english: A construct used to group Parts and other objects together, also allows manipulation of multiple objects.
translation: 用來將 Part 與其它物件組合在一起的建構，並允許操作多個物件。

english: Breaks all surface joints contained within
translation: 斷開所有包含在內的表面接合

english: Returns a CFrame that has position of the centroid of all Parts in the Model.  The rotation matrix is either the rotation matrix of the user-defined PrimaryPart, or if not specified then  a part in the Model chosen by the engine.
translation: 傳回包含 Model 裡所有 Part 的重心位置的 CFrame。旋轉矩陣為使用者定義的 PrimaryPart，未指定時則為引擎選擇的 Model 裡的零件。

english: Returns a Vector3 that is union of the extents of all Parts in the model.
translation: 傳回模型裡所有零件的範圍聯集的 Vector3。

english: Creates the appropriate SurfaceJoints between all touching Parts contrained within the model. Technically, this function calls MakeJoints() on all Parts inside the model.
translation: 在模型裡有接觸平面的零件之間建立合適的 SurfaceJoint。以技術層面解釋的話，此函式會對模型裡所有零件呼叫 MakeJoints()。

english: Moves the centroid of the Model to the specified location, respecting all relative distances between parts in the model.
translation: 將 Model 的重心移到指定位置，不影響模型裡所有零件之間的相對距離。

english: Rotates all parts in the model to the orientation that was set using SetIdentityOrientation().  If this function has never been called, rotation is reset to GetModelCFrame()'s rotation.
translation: 將模型裡所有物件旋轉到使用 SetIdentityOrientation() 設定的方向。此函式從未呼叫時，旋轉值將會重置為 GetModelCFrame() 的旋轉值。

english: Takes the current rotation matrix of the model and stores it as the model's identity matrix. The rotation is applied when ResetOrientationToIdentity() is called.
translation: 取模型目前的旋轉矩陣，並儲存為該模型的單位矩陣。呼叫 ResetOrientationToIdentity() 時將會套用旋轉值。

english: Similar to MoveTo(), except instead of moving to an explicit location, we use the model's current CFrame location and offset it.
translation: 與 MoveTo() 相似，但不是移動到明確的位置，而是使用模型目前的 CFrame 位置進行偏移。

english: Returns the cframe of the Model.PrimaryPart. If PrimaryPart is nil, then this function will throw an error.
translation: 傳回 Model.PrimaryPart 的 CFrame。若 PrimaryPart 為 nil，此函式將會生出錯誤。

english: Sets the cframe of the Model.PrimaryPart. If PrimaryPart is nil, then this function will throw an error. This also sets the cframe of all descendant Parts relative to the cframe change to PrimaryPart.
translation: 設定 Model.PrimaryPart 的 CFrame。若 PrimaryPart 為 nil，此函式將會生出錯誤。所有後代 Part 的 CFrame 也會根據 PrimaryPart 的 CFrame 變量而設定。

english: A Part that serves as a reference for the Model's CFrame. Used in conjunction with GetModelPrimaryPartCFrame and SetModelPrimaryPartCFrame. Use this to rotate/translate all Parts relative to the PrimaryPart.
translation: 做為 Model 的 CFrame 的參考 Part。與 GetModelPrimaryPartCFrame 和 SetModelPrimaryPartCFrame 一起使用。用來旋轉 / 平移所有與 PrimaryPart 相對的 Part。

english: The root of ROBLOX's parent-child hierarchy (commonly known as game after the global variable used to access it)
translation: ROBLOX 長幼階級的根（俗稱「遊戲」，因許多人使用此通用變數存取它）

english: Returns true if the game has finished loading, false otherwise.  Check this before listening to the Loaded signal to ensure a script knows when a game finishes loading.
translation: 遊戲載入完成時將傳回 true，否則將傳回 false。聽取 Loaded 訊號之前請先檢查此值，確保指令碼知道遊戲載入完成的時間。

english: Fires when the game finishes loading.  Use this to know when to remove your custom loading gui.  It is best to check IsLoaded() before connecting to this event, as the game may load before the event is connected to.
translation: 遊戲載入完成時將會觸發，可以用來判斷移除自訂載入 GUI 的時間。因此連接到此事件之前建議先檢查 IsLoaded()，避免遊戲在連接到事件之前載入。

english: Responsible for storing data across multiple user created places
translation: 負責在多個使用者創作的地點之間儲存資料

english: Returns a data store with the given name and scope
translation: 傳回指定名稱與範圍的資料存放區

english: Returns an ordered data store with the given name and scope
translation: 傳回指定名稱與範圍的已排序資料存放區

english: Exposes functions for saving and loading data for the DataStoreService
translation: 顯示為 DataStoreService 儲存與載入資料的函式

english: Sets callback as a function to be executed any time the value associated with key is changed. It is important to disconnect the connection when the subscription to the key is no longer needed.
translation: 將回調設為每一次與鍵關聯的值變更時執行的函式。若不需要綁定鍵值，請務必斷開連接。

english: Returns the value of the entry in the DataStore with the given key
translation: 傳回 DataStore 裡指定鍵對應的條目的值

english: Increments the value of a particular key amd returns the incremented value
translation: 增加特定鍵的值，並傳回增加後的值

english: Sets the value of the key. This overwrites any existing data stored in the key
translation: 設定鍵的值，此操作會覆寫鍵裡目前的資料

english: Retrieves the value of the key from the website, and updates it with a new value. The callback until the value fetched matches the value on the web. Returning nil means it will not save.
translation: 從網站取得鍵的值，並更新城新的值。值擷取之前的回調會與網路上的值相符。傳回 nil 時表示不會儲存。

english: A type of DataStore where values must be positive integers. This makes OrderedDataStore suitable for leaderboard related scripting where you are required to order large amounts of data efficiently.
translation: 一種值必須為正整數的 DataStore 類型。這將使 OrderedDataStore 適用於排行榜相關的指令碼操作，可以有效率地排序大量資料。

english: Returns a DataStorePages object. The length of each page is determined by pageSize, and the order is determined by isAscending. minValue and maxValue are optional parameters which will filter the result.
translation: 傳回 DataStorePages 物件。每個頁面的長度由 pageSize 決定，順序由 isAcending 決定。另外可以使用 minValue、maxValue maxValue 參數篩選結果。

english: Where the Camera's focus is.  Any rotation of the camera will be about this subject.
translation: Camera 的焦點所在位置。攝影機將會圍繞此焦點旋轉。

english: Defines how the camera will behave. More info
translation: 定義攝影機的行為模式。更多資訊

english: The current position and rotation of the Camera.  For most CameraTypes, the rotation is set such that the CoordinateFrame lookVector is pointing at the Focus.
translation: Camera 目前的位置與旋轉。大部分 CameraType 的旋轉設定會使 CoordinateFrame lookVector 指向 Focus。

english: The current position and rotation of the Camera.  For most CameraTypes, the rotation is set such that the CoordinateFrame lookVector is pointing at the Focus.
translation: Camera 目前的位置與旋轉。大部分 CameraType 的旋轉設定會使 CoordinateFrame lookVector 指向 Focus。

english: The current angle, or width, of what the camera can see.  Current acceptable values are from 20 degrees to 80.
translation: 攝影機目前可看到的角度或寬度。目前有效的值為 20 到 80 度之間。

english: The current CoordinateFrame that the camera is looking at.  Note: it is not always guaranteed that the camera is always looking here.
translation: 攝影機目前對準的 CoordinateFrame。注意：攝影機不一定永遠對準此處。

english: Holds the x,y screen resolution of the viewport the camera is presenting (note: this can differ from the AbsoluteSize property of a full screen gui).
translation: 攝影機目前呈現的視角的 x,y 螢幕解析度。（注意：這可能與全螢幕 GUI 的 AbsoluteSize 屬性有異）

english: The negative z-offset of the view frustum's near clipping plane.
translation: 視體近裁剪面的負 z 軸偏移值。

english: Returns the camera's current roll. Roll is defined in radians, and is stored as the delta from the camera's y axis default normal vector.
translation: 傳回攝影機目前的滾動值。滾動值以弧度表示，並儲存為從 y 軸預設法向量的 Delta 值。

english: Takes a 3D position in the world and projects it onto x,y coordinates of screen space. Returns two values, first is a Vector3 that has x,y position and z position which is distance from camera (negative if behind camera, positive if in front). Second return value is a boolean indicating if the first argument is an on-screen coordinate.
translation: 取得世界上一個 3D 位置，並將它投射在螢幕空間的 x,y 座標上。傳回兩個值。第一個值是 Vector3，有 x,y 位置和代表與攝影機距離的 z 位置。（位置在攝影機後方時 z 位置為負數，在攝影機前方時則為正數。）第二個值是布林值，表示第一個引數是否為螢幕上座標。

english: Takes a 2D screen position and produces a Ray object to be used for 3D raycasting. Input is x,y screen coordinates, and a (optional, defaults to 0) z position which sets how far in the camera look vector to start the ray origin.
translation: 取得一個 2D 螢幕位置，並生出用在 3D 光線投射的 Ray 物件。輸入為 x,y 螢幕座標與 z 位置（z 位置不必填寫，預設值為 0）。z 位置用來設定攝影機方向向量上開始射線原點的距離。

english: Same as ScreenPointToRay, except no GUI offsets are taken into account. Useful for things like casting a ray from the middle of the Camera.ViewportSize
translation: 與 ScreenPointToRay 相同，但不考量 GUI 偏移。可以用來執行從 Camera.ViewportSize 中心發出射線等操作。

english: Same as WorldToScreenPoint, except no GUI offsets are taken into account.
translation: 與 WorldToScreenPoint 相同，但不考量 GUI 偏移。

english: Sets the camera's current roll. Roll is defined in radians, and is stored as the delta from the camera's y axis default normal vector.
translation: 設定攝影機目前的滾動值。滾動值以弧度表示，並儲存為從 y 軸預設法向量的 Delta 值。

english: Set to true, when a player joins a game, they get a character automatically, as well as when they die.  When set to false, characters do not auto load and will only load in using Player:LoadCharacter().
translation: 設為 true 時，玩家加入遊戲與死亡時都會自動獲得角色。設為 false 時，角色不會自動載入，只會在使用 Player:LoadCharacter() 時載入。

english: A container whose contents are replicated to all clients and the server.
translation: 一個裡面內容複製到所有用戶端與伺服器的容器。

english: A container whose contents are replicated to all clients (but not back to the server) first before anything else. Useful for creating loading guis, tutorials, etc.
translation: 裡面內容會首先被複製到所有用戶端（但不會複製回伺服器）的容器。可以用來創作載入 GUI、教學等等。

english: Removes the default Roblox loading screen from view. Call this when you are ready to either show your own loading gui, or when the game is ready to play.
translation: 隱藏預設 Roblox 載入畫面。當你要顯示自己的載入 GUI 或遊戲準備好開放時，你可以進行呼叫。

english: A container whose contents are only on the server.
translation: 一個裡面內容只在伺服器上的容器。

english: A container whose contents should be scripts. Scripts that are added to the container are run on the server.
translation: 一個裡面內容應為指令碼的容器。加到容器的指令碼會在伺服器上執行。

english: A service for interfacing with the current studio state from Lua.
translation: 一個透過 Lua 與目前 Studio 狀態工作的服務。

english: Responsible for all lighting aspects of the world (affects how things are rendered).
translation: 負責世界所有照明系統（影響遊戲成像方式）。

english: The number of minutes that the current time is past midnight.  If currently at midnight, returns 0.  Will return decimal values if not at an exact minute.
translation: 目前時間離凌晨 12:00 離過後的分鐘數。若目前時間為凌晨 12:00，傳回值將為 0。若目前時間非準確分鐘，傳回值將包含小數。

english: Returns the lookVector (Vector3) of the moon. If this lookVector was used in a CFrame, the Part would face the moon.
translation: 傳回月球的 lookVector（Vector3）。若此 lookVector 在 CFrame 中使用，Part 將會朝向月球。

english: Currently always returns 0.75. MoonPhase cannot be edited.
translation: 目前返回的值必為 0.75。MoonPhase 無法編輯。

english: Returns the lookVector (Vector3) of the sun. If this lookVector was used in a CFrame, the Part would face the sun.
translation: 傳回太陽的 lookVector（Vector3）。若此 lookVector 在 CFrame 中使用，Part 將會朝向太陽。

english: Sets the time to be a certain number of minutes after midnight.  This works with integer and decimal values.
translation: 將時間設為離凌晨 12:00 離過後的分鐘數。此數可為整數，也可包含小數。

english: The hue of the global lighting.  Changing this changes the color tint of all objects in the Workspace.
translation: 通用照明的色相。此值將會影響 Workspace 裡所有物件的色調。

english: How much global light each Part in the Workspace receives. Standard range is 0 to 2 (0 being little light), but can be increased all the way to 10 (colors start to be appear very different at this value).
translation: Workspace 裡每一個 Part 接收通用照明的程度。標準範圍為 0 到 2（0 為極少照明），但可以一值增加到 10（但顏色呈現方式會非常不同）。

english: Exposure compensation amount. Applies a bias to the exposure level prior to the tonemap step. +1 indicates twice as much exposure and -1 means half as much exposure.
translation: 曝光補償值。在進行色調映射前套用曝光度偏值。+1 表示曝光量加倍，-1 表示曝光量減半。

english: This property controls how blurry the shadows are.
translation: 此屬性控制陰影的模糊程度。

english: The hue of global lighting on the bottom surfaces of an object.
translation: 物件底部表面的通用照明色相。

english: The hue of global lighting on the top surfaces of an object.
translation: 物件頂部表面的通用照明色相。

english: A Color3 value that changes the hue of the atmosphere, mixed with the sky color.
translation: 改變大氣圈與天空顏色混合的色相的 Color3 值。

english: The distance at which fog completely blocks your vision. This distance is relative to the camera position. Units are in studs
translation: 迷霧完全阻擋視線的距離。此距離為與攝影機位置的距離。單位為磚塊

english: The distance at which the fog gradient begins. This distance is relative to the camera position. Units are in studs.
translation: 迷霧漸變開始的距離。此距離為與攝影機位置的距離。單位為磚塊.

english: The latitude position the level is placed at. This affects sun position. More info
translation: 層面所在的緯度位置，將會影響太陽位置。更多資訊

english: Flag enabling shadows from sun and moon in the place
translation: 啟用地點裡太陽和月亮造成的陰影的標幟

english: Effective ambient value for outdoors, effectively shadow color outdoors (requires GlobalShadows enabled)
translation: 戶外有效環境值、戶外有效陰影顏色（需要啟用 GlobalShadows）

english: Flag enabling or disabling outlines on parts and terrain
translation: 啟用或停用零件與地形的輪廓的標幟

english: Color the shadows appear as. Shadows are drawn mostly for characters, but depending on the lighting will also show for Parts in the Workspace.  Rendering settings can also affect if shadows are drawn.
translation: 陰影顯示的顏色。大部分陰影會為角色繪製，但 WorkSpace 裡的 Part 也可能依照明程度擁有陰影。成像設定也會影響陰影的繪製。

english: A string that represent the current time of day. Time is in 24-hour clock format "XX::YY:ZZ", where X is hour, Y is minute, and Z is seconds.
translation: 代表當天時間的字符串。時間採用 24 小時格式「XX:YY:ZZ」，X 為小時，Y 為分鐘，Z 為秒。

english: Fired whenever a property of Lighting is changed, or a skybox or atmosphere is added or removed. Skyboxes are of type 'Sky' these and 'Atmosphere' should be parented directly to lighting.
translation: Lighting 屬性變更、新增或移除天空盒、新增或移除大氣圈時將會出發。天空和類行為 'Sky'，與 'Atmosphere' 應直接依附在照明底下。

english: A service that provides utility in cleaning up objects
translation: 可以更加順暢地清理物件服務

english: Adds an Instance into the debris service that will later be destroyed.  Second argument 'lifetime' is optional and specifies how long (in seconds) to wait before destroying the item. If no time is specified then the item added will automatically be destroyed in 10 seconds.
translation: 在廢棄物服務裡增加一個之後將會銷毀的 Instance。第二個引數 'lifetime' 為可填引述，指定個體銷毀之前等待的秒數。若未指定時間，增加的個體在 10 廟後將會自動銷毀。

english: An enum that describes how a Player's camera is allowed to behave. More info.
translation: 形容 Player 的攝影機允許的行為的列舉。更多資訊。

english: Read-only. If true, this Player's persistent data can be loaded, false otherwise. Info on Data Persistence.
translation: 唯讀。若為 true，Player 的保存資料可以被載入，false 則無法。關於資料保存的資訊。

english: Loads in a new character for this player.  This will replace the player's current character, if they have one. This should be used in conjunction with Players.CharacterAutoLoads to control spawning of characters. This function only works from a server-side script (NOT a LocalScript).
translation: 為此玩家載入新的角色，玩家目前的角色將會被取代。此函式應與 Players.CharacterAutoLoads 搭配使用，控制角色的生成。此函式只會從伺服器端指令碼（而非 LocalSript）運作。

english: Yields until the persistent data for this Player is ready to be loaded. Info on Data Persistence.
translation: 在 Player 的保存資料準備好載入之前將會暫停。關於資料保存的資訊。

english: Fired periodically after the user has been AFK for a while.  Currently this event is only fired for the *local* Player.  "time" is the time in seconds that the user has been idle.
translation: 使用者閒置一段時間之後將會定期觸發。此事件目前只會對*本機*玩家觸發。「time」為使用者閒置的秒數。

english: Returns parts in the area defined by the Region3, up to specified maxCount or 100, whichever is less
translation: 傳回 Region3 定義的區域裡的零件，數量為指定 maxCount 與 100 兩者較小的數量

english: Returns parts in the area defined by the Region3, up to specified maxCount or 100, whichever is less
translation: 傳回 Region3 定義的區域裡的零件，數量為指定 maxCount 與 100 兩者較小的數量

english: Return type is (BasePart, Vector3) if the ray hits.  If it misses it will return (nil, PointAtEndOfRay)
translation: 射線擊中時傳回類型為 (BasePart, Vector3)，否則為 (nil, PointAtEndOfRay)

english: Return type is (BasePart, Vector3) if the ray hits.  If it misses it will return (nil, PointAtEndOfRay)
translation: 射線擊中時傳回類型為 (BasePart, Vector3)，否則為 (nil, PointAtEndOfRay)

english: Boolean used to enable the new physics solver
translation: 啟用新的物理處理器的布林值

english: Sets the height at which falling characters and parts are destroyed. This property is not scriptable and can only be set in Studio
translation: 設定降落中的角色和零件銷毀的高度。無法為此屬性編寫指令碼。此屬性只能在 Studio 中設定。

english: Contains information regarding the Part's position and a matrix that defines the Part's rotation. Can read/write. More info
translation: 包含 Part 位置的資訊及定義 Part 旋轉值的矩陣。可讀寫。更多資訊

english: Determines whether physical interactions with other Parts are respected.  If true, will collide and react with physics to other Parts.  If false, other parts will pass thru instead of colliding
translation: 決定是否遵守與其他 Part 的物理相互作用。若為 true，Part 將會與其他 Part 進行物理碰撞核反應。若為 false，其他 Part 將會穿過而不碰撞

english: Determines whether or not physics acts upon the Part.  If true, part stays 'Anchored' in space, not moving regardless of any collision/forces acting upon it.  If false, physics works normally on the part.
translation: 決定 Part 是否受到物理作用。若為 true，零件將會「固定」在空間中，不會受到碰撞或作用力影響。若為 false，零件將會受到正常物理作用。

english: If true the part will be massless when welded to another part that is not massless. The part will still have mass like a normal part if it is an assembly root part according to GetRootPart().
translation: 若為 true，零件在接合到另一個有質量的零件時將會無質量。若 Part 為 true，零件在接合到另一個有質量的零件時將會無質量。若零件根據 GetRootPart() 為組合的根零件，零件將會與其他整常零件一樣擁有質量。

english: An integer from -127 to 127. Compares before other all other part properties besides massless for deciding which part is the assembly root part according to GetRootPart().
translation: -127 到 127 之間的整數。為了決定哪一個零件根據 GetRootPart() 為組合的根零件而在無質量以外的所有零件屬性之前進行比較。

english: A float value ranging from 0.0f to 1.0f. Sets how much the Part will rebound against another. a value of 1 is like a superball, and 0 is like a lead block.
translation: 0.0f 到 1.0f 之間的浮點數，決定 Part 與其他零件之間的彈力。為 1 時彈力將與彈力球類似，為 0 時彈力將與鉛塊類似。

english: A float value ranging from 0.0f to 1.0f. Sets how much the Part will be able to slide. a value of 1 is no sliding, and 0 is no friction, so infinite sliding.
translation: 0.0f 到 1.0f 之間的浮點數，決定 Part 的滑動能力。為 1 時 Part 不會滑動，為 0 時 Part 因無摩擦力而可以無限滑動。

english: Determines whether building tools (in-game and studio) can manipulate this Part.  If true, no editing allowed.  If false, editing is allowed.
translation: 決定遊戲內與 Studio 內的建造工具能否編輯此 Part。true 則不允許編輯，false 則允許編輯。

english: Determines whether this Part casts a shadow.
translation: 決定此 Part 是否投射陰影。

english: Specifies the look and feel the Part should have. Note: this does not define the color the Part is, see BrickColor for that. More info
translation: 指定 Part 應有的外觀與質感。注意：此函式不會定義 Part 的顏色，請使用 BrickColor 調整顏色。更多資訊

english: Specifies how shiny the Part is. A value of 1 is completely reflective (chrome), while a value of 0 is no reflectance (concrete wall)
translation: 指定 Part 的反射程度。值為 1 時代表完全反射（鉻），值為 0 時代表無反射（混凝土牆）

english: Sets the value for the smallest change in size allowable by the Resize(NormalId, int) function.
translation: 設定 Resize(NormalID, int) 函式調整大小的最小允許值。

english: Sets the value for the faces allowed to be resized by the Resize(NormalId, int) function.
translation: 設定 Resize(NormalID, int) 函式允許調整大小的面的值。

english: Sets how visible an object is. A value of 1 makes the object invisible, while a value of 0 makes the object opaque.
translation: 設定物件的可見度。值為 1 時物件將會隱形，值為 0 時物件將完全不透明。

english: How fast the Part is traveling in studs/second. This property is NOT recommended to be modified directly, unless there is good reason.  Otherwise, try using a BodyForce to move a Part.
translation: Part 的移動速度，以磚塊 / 秒表示。不建議在非必要情況下直接修改此屬性。若要移動 Part，請嘗試使用 BodyForce。

english: Position relative to parent part, or global space if there is no parent.
translation: 與父零件的相對位置，無父零件時則是整體空間內位置。

english: Orientation relative to parent part, or global space if there is no parent.
translation: 與父零件的相對方向，無父零件時則是整體空間內方向。

english: Rotation around X, Y, and Z axis.  Rotations applied in YXZ order.
translation: 環繞 X 、Y 和 Z 軸的旋轉值，旋轉順序依序為 YXZ。

english: Creates the appropriate SurfaceJoints with all parts that are touching this Instance (including internal joints in the Instance, as in a Model). This uses the SurfaceTypes defined on the surfaces of parts to create the appropriate welds. More info
translation: 與所有觸碰此 Instance 的零件（包括 Model 等的 Instance 內部接合，）建立對應的 SurfaceJoint。此函式將會使用零件表面定義的 SurfaceType 建立對應的接合。更多資訊

english: Destroys SurfaceJoints with all parts that are touching this Instance (including internal joints in the Instance, as in a Model).
translation: 摧毀所有觸碰此 Instance 的零件的 SurfaceJoint（包括 Instance 裡的內部接合，例如 Model）。

english: Returns a number that is the mass of this Instance.  Mass of a Part is immutable, and is changed only by the size of the Part.
translation: 傳回此 Instance 質量的數字。Part 的質量不變，除非 Part 的大小變更。

english: Resizes a Part in the direction of the face defined by 'NormalId', by the amount specified by 'deltaAmount'. If the operation will expand the part to intersect another Instance, the part will not resize at all.  Return true if the call is successful, false otherwise.
translation: 往 'NormalId' 定義的面的方向調整 Part 的大小，大小的變更量為 'deltaAmount'。若零件展開後會與另一個 Instance 相交，零件的大小將不會變更。呼叫成功時將會傳回 true，否則將會傳回 false。

english: Fired when the part stops touching another part
translation: 零件停止觸碰另一物件時觸發

english: A plastic building block - the fundamental component of ROBLOX
translation: 一個塑膠物體，ROBLOX 最核心的元素

english: A container instance that syncs data between a single player and the server.  ScreenGui objects that are placed in this container will be shown to the Player parent only
translation: 同步單一玩家與伺服器之間的資料的容器葛體。放進此容器的 ScreenGui 物件只會向父 Player 顯示

english: Overrides the default selection adornment (used for gamepads). For best results, this should point to a GuiObject.
translation: 複寫預設選取附件（手把用）。此函式指向 GuiObject 時效果最佳。

english: A container instance that contains LocalScripts.  LocalScript objects that are placed in this container will be exectue only when a Player is the parent.
translation: 包含 LocalScript 的容器個體。放入此容器的 LocalScript 物件只會在 Player 是父類別時執行。

english: A container instance that contains LocalScripts.  LocalScript objects that are placed in this container will be copied to new Players on startup.
translation: 包含 LocalScript 的容器個體。放入此容器的 LocalScript 物件將會在啟動時複製給新 Player。

english: A container instance that contains LocalScripts.  LocalScript objects that are placed in this container will be copied to new characters on startup.
translation: 包含 LocalScript 的容器個體。放入此容器的 LocalScript 物件將會在啟動時複製給新角色。

english: The base class of ScreenGui, BillboardGui, and SurfaceGui.
translation: ScreenGui、BillboardGui 與 SurfaceGui 的基礎類別。

english: The core GUI object on which tools are built.  Add Frames/Labels/Buttons to this object to have them rendered as a 2D overlay
translation: 工具會在此核心 GUI 物件上建造。若在此物件增加框架、標籤及按鈕，以上項目即可以 2D 面板形式成像。

english: A GUI that adorns an object in the 3D world.  Add Frames/Labels/Buttons to this object to have them rendered while attached to a 3D object
translation: 裝飾 3D 世界物件的 GUI。若在此物件增加框架、標籤及按鈕，以上項目即可在依附 3D 物件時成像。

english: The Object the billboard gui uses as its base to render from.  Currently, the only way to set this property is thru a script, and must exist in the workspace.  This will only render if the object assigned derives from BasePart.
translation: 廣告牌 GUI 將會以此物件作為成像的基準。目前只能透過指令碼設定此屬性，指令碼亦必須在工作區裡。只有在指派物件從 BasePart 衍生時才會成像。

english: A read-only Vector2 value that is the GuiObject's current position (x,y) in pixel space, from the top left corner of the GuiObject.
translation: 表示 GuiObject 目前在像素空間中的位置 (x,y) 的唯讀 Vector2 值，原點為 GuiObject 左上角。

english: A read-only Vector2 value that is the GuiObject's current size (width, height) in pixel space.
translation: 表示 GuiObject 目前在像素空間中的大小（寬，高）的唯讀 Vector2 值。

english: If true, this GuiObject can fire mouse events and will pass them to any GuiObjects layered underneath, while false will do neither.
translation: 若為 true，此 GuiObject 將可以觸發滑鼠事件，並將其傳到更底層的 GuiObject。若為 false，以上情況將不會發生。

english: If true, billboard gui does not get occluded by 3D objects, but always renders on the screen.
translation: 若為 true，廣告牌 GUI 將不會被 3D 物件遮蔽，而永遠會在螢幕上成像。

english: If true, billboard gui will render, otherwise rendering will be skipped.
translation: 若為 true，廣告牌 GUI 將會成像，否則將會跳過成像。

english: A Vector3 (x,y,z) defined in studs that will offset the gui from the extents of the 3d object it is rendering from.
translation: 以磚塊定義，將會對 GUI 從成像來源 3D 物件聯集進行偏移的 Vector3 (x,y,z)。

english: Specifies a Player that the BillboardGui will not render to.
translation: 指定 Player，BillBoardGui 將不會對其成像。

english: A Vector3 (x,y,z) defined in studs that will offset the gui from the centroid of the 3d object it is rendering from
translation: 以磚塊定義，將會對 GUI 從成像來源 3D 物件重心進行偏移的 Vector3 (x,y,z)。

english: A Vector2 (x,y) defined in studs that will offset the gui size from it's current size.
translation: 以磚塊定義，將會對 GUI 大小從目前大小進行偏移的 Vector2 (x,y)。

english: A UDim2 value describing the size of the BillboardGui. More information on UDim2 is available here. Relative values are defined as one-to-one with studs.
translation: 描述 BuillBoardGui 大小的 UDim2 值。若要了解更多關於 UDim2 的資訊，請前往此處。相對值與磚塊以一比一定義。

english: Specifies the amount of influence lighting has on the billboard gui. A value of 0 is unlit, 1 is fully lit. Fractional values blend from unlit to lit.
translation: 指定照明對廣告牌 GUI 的影響。值為 0 時表示粒子亮度不受照明影響，值為 1 時表示完全受到照明影響，值為分數時表示受到照明局部影響。

english: Renders its contained GuiObjects flat against the face of a part.
translation: 將其包含的 GuiObject 在零件的平面上成像。

english: The Object the surface gui uses as its base to render from.  Currently, the only way to set this property is thru a script, and must exist in the workspace.  This will only render if the object assigned derives from BasePart.
translation: 表面 GUI 將會以此物件作為成像的基準。目前只能透過指令碼設定此屬性，指令碼亦必須在工作區裡。只有在指派物件從 BasePart 衍生時才會成像。

english: If true, this GuiObject can fire mouse events and will pass them to any GuiObjects layered underneath, while false will do neither.
translation: 若為 true，此 GuiObject 將可以觸發滑鼠事件，並將其傳到更底層的 GuiObject。若為 false，以上情況將不會發生。

english: If true, surface gui will render, otherwise rendering will be skipped.
translation: 若為 true，表面 GUI 將會成像，否則將會跳過成像。

english: Specifies the amount of influence lighting has on the surface gui. A value of 0 is unlit, 1 is fully lit. Fractional values blend from unlit to lit.
translation: 指定照明對表面 GUI 的影響。值為 0 時表示粒子亮度不受照明影響，值為 1 時表示完全受到照明影響，值為分數時表示受到照明局部影響。

english: A read-only Vector2 value that is the GuiObject's current position (x,y) in pixel space, from the top left corner of the GuiObject.
translation: 表示 GuiObject 目前在像素空間中的位置 (x,y) 的唯讀 Vector2 值，原點為 GuiObject 左上角。

english: A read-only Vector2 value that is the GuiObject's current size (width, height) in pixel space.
translation: 表示 GuiObject 目前在像素空間中的大小（寬，高）的唯讀 Vector2 值。

english: An object that describes a particular user input, such as mouse movement, touches, keyboard, and more.
translation: 描述特定使用者輸入（移動游標、觸碰螢幕、按下鍵盤等等）的物件。

english: An enum that describes what kind of input this object is describing (mousebutton, touch, etc.).  See Enum.UserInputType for more info.
translation: 描述此物件正在描述的輸入（移動游標、觸碰螢幕等等）的列舉。若要了解更多資訊，請查看 Enum.UserInputType。

english: An enum that describes what state of a particular input (touch began, touch moved, touch ended, etc.). See Enum.UserInputState for more info.
translation: 描述特定輸入的狀態的列舉（觸控開始、觸控移動、觸控結束等等）。若需更多訊，請查看 Enum.UserInputState。

english: A Vector3 value that describes a positional value of this input. For mouse and touch input, this is the screen position of the mouse/touch, described in the x and y components. For mouse wheel input, the z component describes whether the wheel was moved forward or backward.
translation: 表示此輸入的位置值的 Vector3 直。輸入為滑鼠或觸控時，此為滑鼠 / 觸控的螢幕位置，以 x 與 y 值表示。輸入為滾輪時，z 值表示滾輪向前或向後移動。

english: An enum that describes what kind of input is being pressed. For types of input like Keyboard, this describes what key was pressed. For input like mousebutton, this provides no additional information.
translation: 描述按下的輸入的種類的列舉。若輸入為鍵盤等，此列舉將會描述按下的鍵。若輸入為滑鼠等，此列舉不會提供額外資訊。

english: Smoothly moves a GuiObject from its current position to 'endPosition'. The only required argument is 'endPosition'. More info
translation: 將 GuiObject 順暢地從目前位置移動到 'endPosition'。唯一必要的引數為 'endPosition'。更多資訊

english: Smoothly translates a GuiObject's current size to 'endSize'. The only required argument is 'endSize'. More info
translation: 將 GuiObject 順暢地從目前大小轉換到 'endSize'。唯一必要的引數為 'endSize'。更多資訊

english: Smoothly translates a GuiObject's current size to 'endSize', and also smoothly translates the GuiObject's current position to 'endPosition'. The only required arguments are 'endSize' and 'endPosition'. More info
translation: 將 GuiObject 順暢地從目前大小轉換到 'endSize'，並順暢地從目前位置移動到 'endPosition'。兩個必要的引數為 'endSize' 與 'endPosition'。更多資訊

english: If true, this GuiObject can fire mouse events and will pass them to any GuiObjects layered underneath, while false will do neither.
translation: 若為 true，此 GuiObject 將可以觸發滑鼠事件，並將其傳到更底層的 GuiObject。若為 false，以上情況將不會發生。

english: A Color3 value that specifies the background color for the GuiObject. This value is ignored if the Style property (not found on all GuiObjects) is set to something besides custom.
translation: 指定 GuiObject 背景顏色的 Color3 值。若 Style 屬性（不一定所有 GuiObject 都會擁有）設定為自訂以外的屬性，此值將會被忽略。

english: A number value that specifies how transparent the background of the GuiObject is. This value is ignored if the Style property (not found on all GuiObjects) is set to something besides custom.
translation: 指定 GuiObject 背景透明度的 number 值。若 Style 屬性（不一定所有 GuiObject 都會擁有）設定為自訂以外的屬性，此值將會被忽略。

english: A Color3 value that specifies the color of the outline of the GuiObject. This value is ignored if the Style property (not found on all GuiObjects) is set to something besides custom.
translation: 指定 GuiObject 輪廓顏色的 Color3 值。若 Style 屬性（不一定所有 GuiObject 都會擁有）設定為自訂以外的屬性，此值將會被忽略。

english: A number value that specifies the thickness (in pixels) of the outline of the GuiObject. Currently this value can only be set to either 0 or 1, any other number has no effect. This value is ignored if the Style property (not found on all GuiObjects) is set to something besides custom.
translation: 指定 GuiObject 輪廓厚度的 number 值（已向素為單位）。此值目前只能設為 0 或 1，設為其他值時將不會有作用。若 Style 屬性（不一定所有 GuiObject 都會擁有）設定為自訂以外的屬性，此值將會被忽略。

english: If set to true, any descendants of this GuiObject will only render if contained within it's borders. If set to false, all descendants will render regardless of position.
translation: 若設為 true，此 GuiObject 的後代只會在位在 GuiObject 邊框內時成像。若設為 false，所有後代將不論位置而統一成像。

english: If true, allows a GuiObject to be dragged by the user's mouse. The events 'DragBegin' and 'DragStopped' are fired when the appropriate action happens, and only will fire on Draggable=true GuiObjects.
translation: 若為 true，GuiObject 將會允許被使用者的游標拖曳。'DragBegin' 和 'DragStopped' 事件將會在對應動作執行時觸發，並只會在 Draggable=true 的 GuiObject 上觸發。

english: A UDim2 value describing the size of the GuiObject on screen in both absolute and relative coordinates. More information on UDim2 is available here.
translation: 以絕對與相對座標描述螢幕上 GuiObject 大小的 UDim2 值。若要了解更多關於 UDim2 的資訊，請前往此處。

english: A UDim2 value describing the position of the top-left corner of the GuiObject on screen. More information on UDim2 is available here.
translation: 描述螢幕上 GuiObject 左上角位置的 UDim2 值。若要了解更多關於 UDim2 的資訊，請前往此處。

english: The direction(s) that an object can be resized in. More info.
translation: 物件可以調整大小的方向。更多資訊。

english: Describes the ordering in which overlapping GuiObjects will be drawn. A value of 1 is drawn first, while higher values are drawn in ascending order (each value draws over the last).
translation: 描述重疊的 GuiObject 繪製的順序。值為 1 的 GuiObject 將會首先繪製，其他 GuiObject 將會以由低到高的順序繪製（每一個值將會在前一個值上繪製。）。

english: Overrides the default selection adornment (used for gamepads). For best results, this should point to a GuiObject.
translation: 複寫預設選取附件（手把用）。此函式指向 GuiObject 時效果最佳。

english: Fired when a GuiObject with Draggable set to true starts to be dragged. 'InitialPosition' is a UDim2 value of the position of the GuiObject before any drag operation began.
translation: Draggle 設為 true 的 GuiObject 開始被拖曳時將會觸發。'InitialPosition' 是 GuiObject 被拖曳前的位置的 UDim2 值。

english: Always fired after a DragBegin event, DragStopped is fired when the user releases the mouse button causing a drag operation on the GuiObject. Arguments 'x', and 'y' specify the top-left absolute position of the GuiObject when the event is fired.
translation: DragStopped 永遠會在 DragBegin 事件後觸發，觸發條件為使用者放開滑鼠按鈕造成 GuiObject 被拖曳。引數 'x' 和 'y' 指定事件觸發時 GuiObject 左上角的絕對位置。

english: Fired when the mouse enters a GuiObject, as long as the GuiObject is active (see active property for more detail). Arguments 'x', and 'y' specify the absolute pixel position of the mouse.
translation: 只要 GuiObject 活躍（請參考活躍屬性了解更多資訊），游標進入 GuiObject 時將會觸發。引數 'x' 和 'y' 指定游標的絕對像素位置。

english: Fired when the mouse leaves a GuiObject, as long as the GuiObject is active (see active property for more detail). Arguments 'x', and 'y' specify the absolute pixel position of the mouse.
translation: 只要 GuiObject 活躍（請參考活躍屬性了解更多資訊），游標離開 GuiObject 時將會觸發。引數 'x' 和 'y' 指定游標的絕對像素位置。

english: Fired when the mouse is inside a GuiObject and moves, as long as the GuiObject is active (see active property for more detail). Arguments 'x', and 'y' specify the absolute pixel position of the mouse.
translation: 只要 GuiObject 活躍（請參考活躍屬性了解更多資訊），游標在 GuiObject 內移動時將會觸發。引數 'x' 和 'y' 指定游標的絕對像素位置。

english: Fired when a user taps their finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the tap gesture. This event only fires locally.  This event will always fire regardless of game state.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上輕點螢幕時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表明所有與觸碰動作相關的手指的位置。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user pinches their fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the pinch gesture. 'scale' is a float that indicates the difference from the beginning of the pinch gesture. 'velocity' is a float indicating how quickly the pinch gesture is happening. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上捏合手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與捏合動作相關的手指的位置。'scale' 是一個浮點數，表示與捏合動作開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個浮點數，表示捏合動作進行的速度。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user swipes their fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'swipeDirection' is an Enum.SwipeDirection, indicating the direction the user swiped. 'numberOfTouches' is an int that indicates how many touches were involved with the gesture.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上滑動手指時將會觸發。'swipeDirection' 是 Enum.SwipeDirection，表示使用者滑動的方向。'numberOfTouches' 是表示與動作相關的觸碰次數的 int。此事件只會在本機觸發

english: Fired when a user holds at least one finger for a short amount of time on the same screen position on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上將至少一隻手指短時間內壓在同一個螢幕位置時將會觸發。'touchPositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user rotates two fingers on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'rotation' is a float indicating how much the rotation has gone from the start of the gesture. 'velocity' is a float that indicates how quickly the gesture is being performed. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上旋轉兩隻手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'rotation' 是一個浮點數，表示旋轉與動作開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個浮點數，表示動作進行的速度。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user drags at least one finger on a TouchEnabled device. 'touchPositions' is a Lua array of Vector2, each indicating the position of all the fingers involved in the gesture. 'totalTranslation' is a Vector2, indicating how far the pan gesture has gone from its starting point. 'velocity' is a Vector2 that indicates how quickly the gesture is being performed in each dimension. 'state' indicates the Enum.UserInputState of the gesture.
translation: 使用者在 TouchEnabled 裝置上至少拖曳一隻手指時將會觸發。'touchpositions' 是 Vector2 的 Lua 矩陣，每一個都會表示所有與動作相關的手指的位置。'totalTranslation' 是一個 Vector 2，表示平移動作與開始時的差距。'velocity' 是一個 Vector2，表示動作在每一個次元進行的速度。'state' 表示動作的 Enum.UserInputState。

english: Fired when a user begins interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse button down, touch begin, keyboard button down, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置開始互動時（按下滑鼠鍵、開始觸控、按下鍵盤鍵等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: Fired when a user changes interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse move, touch move, mouse wheel, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置變更互動時（移動滑鼠、移動手指、移動滾輪等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。

english: Fired when a user stops interacting via a Human-Computer Interface device (Mouse button up, touch end, keyboard button up, etc.). 'inputObject' is an InputObject, which contains useful data for querying user input.  This event only fires locally.
translation: 使用者透過人機互動裝置停止互動時（放開滑鼠、停止觸控、放開鍵盤鍵等等）將會觸發。'inputObject' 是一個 InputObject，包含對查詢使用者輸入有用的資料。此事件只會在本機觸發。此事件不論遊戲狀態都會觸發。

english: A container object used to layout other GUI objects
translation: 用來配置其他 GUI 物件的容器物件

english: Determines how a frame will look. Uses Enum.FrameStyle. More info
translation: 決定框架的外觀。將會使用到 Enum.FrameStyle。更多資訊

english: Determines whether or not scrolling is allowed on this frame. If turned off, no scroll bars will be rendered.
translation: 決定此框架上是否允許捲動。若關閉，捲軸不會成像。

english: Determines the size of the area that is scrollable. The UDim2 is calculated using the parent gui's size, similar to the regular Size property on gui objects.
translation: 決定可捲動的區域大小。UDim2 將會使用付 GUI 的大小計算，類似 GUI 物件上的一般 Size 屬性。

english: The absolute position the scroll frame is in respect to the canvas size. The minimum this can be set to is (0,0), while the max is the absolute canvas size - AbsoluteWindowSize.
translation: 捲動框架相對於畫布大小的絕對位置。此值的最小值為 (0,0)，最大值為畫布的絕對尺寸（AbsoluteWindowSize）。

english: The size in pixels of the frame, without the scrollbars.
translation: 框架不含捲軸的大小，以像素為單位。

english: How thick the scroll bar appears. This applies to both the horizontal and vertical scroll bars. Can be set to 0 for no bars render.
translation: 捲軸的厚度，橫向與縱向捲軸皆適用。設為 0 時捲軸將不會成像。

english: The "Up" image on the vertical scrollbar. Size of this is always ScrollBarThickness by ScrollBarThickness. This is also used as the "left" image on the horizontal scroll bar.
translation: 縱向捲軸的「上」圖像。此圖像的大小必為 ScrollBarThickness * ScrollbarThickness。此圖像也用在橫向捲軸的「左」圖像。

english: The "Middle" image on the vertical scrollbar. Size of this can vary in the y direction, but is always set at ScrollBarThickness in x direction. This is also used as the "mid" image on the horizontal scroll bar.
translation: 縱向捲軸的「中間」圖像。此圖像沿 y 軸的大小可能不一，但沿 x 軸方向的大小必為 ScrollBarThickness。此圖像也用在橫向捲軸的「中間」圖像。

english: The "Down" image on the vertical scrollbar. Size of this is always ScrollBarThickness by ScrollBarThickness. This is also used as the "right" image on the horizontal scroll bar.
translation: 縱向捲軸的「下」圖像。此圖像的大小必為 ScrollBarThickness * ScrollbarThickness。此圖像也用在橫向捲軸的「右」圖像。

english: A GUI object containing an Image
translation: 包含圖像的 GUI 物件

english: Specifies the id of the texture to display. More info
translation: 指定要顯示的紋理的 ID。更多資訊

english: Specifies how an image should be displayed. See ScaleType for more info.
translation: 指定圖像的顯示方式，若要了解更多資訊，請參考 ScaleType。

english: If ScaleType is set to Slice, this Rect is used to specify the central part of the image. Everything outside of this is considered to be the border.
translation: 若 ScaleType 設為 Slice，此 Rect 將會指定圖像的主體。主體以外的部分將被視為邊框。

english: If ScaleType is set to Tile, this sets the size of the tile.
translation: 若 ScaleType 設為 Tile，將會設定磚片的大小。
包含文字的 GUI 物件
包含文字的 GUI 按鈕

english: A GUI button containing an Image
translation: 包含圖像的 GUI 按鈕

english: Determines whether a button changes color automatically when reacting to mouse events.
translation: 決定按鈕對滑鼠事件做出反應時是否會自動變更顏色。

english: Allows the mouse to be free in first person mode. If a button with this property set to true is visible, the mouse is 'free' in first person mode.
translation: 允許滑鼠在第一人稱模式時自由移動。若看得到此屬性設為 true 的按鈕，滑鼠則在第一人稱模式為 'free'。

english: Determines how a button will look, including mouse event states. Uses Enum.ButtonStyle. More info
translation: 決定按鈕的外觀，包括滑鼠事件狀態。將會使用到 Enum.ButtonStyle。更多資訊

english: Fired when the mouse is over the button, and the mouse down and up events fire without the mouse leaving the button.
translation: 當游標在按鈕上，並在不離開按鈕的情況下觸發按下滑鼠、放開滑鼠兩個事件時將會觸發。

english: Fired when the mouse button is pushed down on a button.
translation: 游標在按鈕上按下滑鼠時將會觸發。

english: Fired when the mouse button is released on a button.
translation: 游標在按鈕上放開滑鼠時將會觸發。

english: This function currently does not work :(
This function currently does not work :(
This function currently does not work :(
A GUI that can show 3D objects
translation: 可以顯示 3D 物件的 GUI

english: A number value that specifies how transparent the rendered image of the ViewportFrame is
translation: 指定 ViewPortFrame 成像圖像的透明度的 number 值

english: The rendered image of the ViewportFrame will be multiplied by this color
translation: ViewportFrame 成像圖像將會使用此顏色

english: Changing this changes the color tint of all objects in the ViewportFrame.
translation: 此屬性將會變更 ViewportFrame 中所有物件的色調。

english: Directional light color for objects in the ViewportFrame.
translation: ViewportFrame 中物件的平行光顏色。

english: Light direction. Value will be normalized. All values valid except (0,0,0).
translation: 光線方向。值將會被標準化。(0,0,0) 以外的值皆有效。

english: A GUI button containing an Image
translation: 包含圖像的 GUI 按鈕

english: Specifies the asset id of the texture to display. More info
translation: 指定要顯示的紋理的素材 ID。更多資訊

english: Specifies how an image should be displayed. See ScaleType for more info.
translation: 指定圖像的顯示方式，若要了解更多資訊，請參考 ScaleType。

english: If ScaleType is set to Slice, this Rect is used to specify the central part of the image. Everything outside of this is considered to be the border.
translation: 若 ScaleType 設為 Slice，此 Rect 將會指定圖像的主體。主體以外的部分將被視為邊框。

english: If ScaleType is set to Tile, this sets the size of the tile.
translation: 若 ScaleType 設為 Tile，將會設定磚片的大小。

english: A 3D GUI object to represent draggable handles
translation: 代表可拖曳手把的 3D GUI 物件

english: A 3D GUI object to represent draggable arc handles
translation: 代表可拖曳弧形手把的 3D GUI 物件

english: A 3D GUI object to represent the visible selection around an object
translation: 代表物件周圍可見的選擇項目的 3D GUI 物件

english: A 3D GUI object to represent the visible selection around an object
translation: 代表物件周圍可見的選擇項目的 3D GUI 物件

english: A 3D GUI object to represent the visible selection around a face of an object
translation: 代表物件周圍可見的選擇項目的 3D GUI 物件

english: An object that can be placed under parts to hold Value objects that represent that part's configuration
translation: 可以放在零件底下，儲藏代表該零件設定的 Value 物件的一個物件

english: An object that specifies the appearance of Humanoid characters
translation: 指定 Humanoid 角色外觀的物件

english: An object that can be created to hold and organize objects
translation: 建立後可以儲藏與整理物件的一個物件

english: A visual line drawn representation between two part objects
translation: 兩個零件物件之間的參考用直線

english: A visual line drawn representation between two positions
translation: 兩個位置之間的參考用直線

english: A visual line drawn representation between two parts.
translation: 兩個零件之間的參考用直線。

english: The pose of a joint relative to it's parent part in a keyframe
translation: 一個關鍵格裡接合相對於其父接合的姿勢

english: Represents when an event should be fired in an animation
translation: 代表動畫中的事件應觸發的時間

english: Represents a linked animation object, containing keyframes and poses.
translation: 代表連結的動畫物件，裡面包含關鍵格與姿勢。

english: Returned by a call to LoadAnimation. Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid.
translation: 呼叫 LoadAnimation 之後將會傳回。控制 Humanoid 動畫的播放。

english: Allows animations to be played on joints of the parent object.
translation: 允許動畫在父物件的接合上進行。

english: Modifies the appearance of a body part.
An object used to make dialog trees to converse with players
translation: 用來建立與玩家對話的對話樹的物件

english: The maximum distance that the player's character can be from the dialog's parent in order to use the dialog.
translation: 玩家角色要使用對話框時，最遠可以離對話框的父類的距離。

english: Indicates whether or not an extra choice is available for the player to exit the dialog tree at this node.
translation: 表示玩家在對話樹目前節點是否擁有可以離開對話的額外選項。

english: The prompt text for an extra choice that allows the player to exit the dialog tree at this node.
translation: 允許玩家在此對話樹節點離開對話的額外選項的提示文字。

english: Indicates whether or not the dialog is currently being used by one or more players.
translation: 表示是否有玩家正在使用對話。

english: The chat message that is displayed to the player when they first activate the dialog.
translation: 玩家第一次啟動對話時看到的聊天訊息。

english: Describes the purpose of the dialog, which is used to display a relevant icon on the dialog's activation button.
translation: 描述對話的用途，用來在對話的啟動按鈕上顯示相關圖示。

english: Describes the tone of the dialog, which is used to display a relevant color in the dialog interface.
translation: 描述對話的語氣，用來在對話介面上顯示相關顏色。

english: Indicates how the dialog may be used by players. Use Enum.DialogBehaviorType.SinglePlayer if only one player should interact with the dialog at a time, otherwise use Enum.DialogBehaviorType.MultiplePlayers.
translation: 表示玩家可以使用對話的方式。若一次只允許一名玩家進行對話，請使用 Use Enum.DialogBehaviorType.SinglePlayer，否則請使用 Enum.DialogBehaviorType.MultiplePlayers。

english: Returns an array of the players currently conversing with this dialog.
translation: 傳回目前正在使用此對話的玩家的陣列。

english: An object used to make dialog trees to converse with players
translation: 用來建立與玩家對話的對話樹的物件

english: A UnionOperation is a union of multiple parts
translation: UnionOperation 是多個零件的聯集

english: Override the colors of the mesh with the part color.
translation: 使用零件顏色覆寫網格顏色。

english: A NegateOperation can be used to create holes in other parts
translation: NegateOperation 可以用來在其他零件製作洞孔

english: Override the colors of the mesh with the part color.
translation: 使用零件顏色覆蓋網格顏色。

english: A MeshPart is a physically simulatable mesh
translation: MeshPart 為可模擬物理特性的網格

english: Object representing a high performance bounded grid of static 4x4 parts
translation: 代表高效能靜態 4x4 零件綁定網格的物件
所有照明物件的父類別

english: Makes the parent part emit light in a spherical shape
translation: 使父零件發出球狀光線

english: Makes the parent part emit light in a conical shape
translation: 使父零件發出錐狀光線

english: Makes the parent part emit light in a frustum shape from rectangle defined by part
translation: 使父零件從零件定義的矩形發出錐台狀光線

english: Allow functions defined in one script to be called by another script across client/server boundary
translation: 允許在一個指令碼中定義的函式被另一個橫跨用戶端與伺服器界線的指令碼呼叫

english: Allow events defined in one script to be subscribed to by another script across client/server boundary
translation: 允許在一個指令碼中定義的事件被另一個橫跨用戶端與伺服器界線的指令碼訂閱

english: Object representing a snapshot of the region of terrain
translation: 代表地形區域快照的物件

english: A script fragment. Only runs when another script uses require() on it.
translation: 指令碼片段。只有在其他指令碼對其使用 require() 時才會執行。

english: If 'functionToBind' from ContextActionService:BindAction() returns Enum.ContextActionResult.Sink, the input event will stop at that function and no other bound actions under it will be invoked. This is the default behavior if 'functionToBind' does not return anything or yields in any way.
translation: 若 ContextActionService:BindAction() 的 'functionToBind' 傳回 Enum.ContextActionResult.Sink，輸入事件將在該函式停止，底下的綁定操作也不會執行。此為 'functionToBind' 未傳回函式或以任何形式暫停時的預設行為。

english: If 'functionToBind' from ContextActionService:BindAction() returns Enum.ContextActionResult.Pass, the input event is considered to have not been handled by 'functionToBind' and will continue being passed to actions bound to the same input type.
